title: Itty Bitty UFO's - Bag of 4
Description: Itty Bitty UFO's can only abduct insects and tiny fish. The truth is not only out there, but also much smaller than we imagined. This set of four different UFO's, 1-1/4" tall, is made of soft vinyl. Each UFO has its own unique pattern and a mysterious beam emanating from its base, serving as a stand. The purpose of that beam is unknown. It could be to keep the UFO aloft, a tractor beam to abduct subjects for experimentation, or some sort of hypnotic suggestion to buy more Itty Bitty UFO's. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Bag of Black Cats
Description: Black cats are notoriously difficult to photograph. The details of their cuteness can’t be fully captured by technology, and they are sometimes called "void cats" online. This bag of black cats contains 12 cats, from 1/2" to 1-1/4" tall, in six different styles that you can use for Halloween decorating, lurking in the dark, or for irritating your own black kitties. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Bag of Cats
Description: Sometimes, itty bitty is too small. This bag of cats contains 12 cats, from 1/2" to 1-1/4" tall, in six different styles that you can use for decorating, keeping you company, or for putting on your vision board to manifest even more cats in your life. Two different colors so that each style is more unique. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Back Kraken
Description: Ahoy matey! Pirates were known for their various dermatological issues and were thus constantly itchy. This Back Kraken not only recalls the medical needs of pirates, but also pays homage to one of the great oceanic cryptozoological creatures. Grasp the comfortable handle, extend the 8" tall telescopic rod to its max length of 22-1/2" and use the Kraken’s fearsome tentacles to take care of your itches! Could be used as a pointer during a marine biology lecture! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Axolotl Back Scratcher
Description: The fronds on an axolotl’s head aren’t just stylish, they’re also practical. Those feathery branches are actually gills to help them breathe, but the Axolotl Back Scratcher uses them for an entirely different medicinal purpose. Just grasp the comfortable handle, extend the 8" tall telescopic rod to its max length of 22" and use the axolotl’s head to take care of your itches! It could also be used as a baton if you’re leading an axolotl marching band. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Shrimp Back Scratcher
Description: Who knew that shrimp could be effective dermatologists? Sure, this prawn on a stick looks a little weird when you display it on your desk, but wait until you use it. Grasp the comfortable handle, extend the 7-7/8" tall telescopic rod to its max length of 22", and use the shrimp’s various bits and bobs to take care of your itches! Plus, it looks like the scepter of the queen of prawns. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Bigfoot Back Scratcher
Description: This Bigfoot Back Scratcher uses Bigfoot’s most famous body part to scratch your back, his big ol’ foot. Made of plastic and stainless steel, you use his hoof to scratch all your itches. Let Dr. Bigfoot take care of that for you. Bigfoot did want to be a dermatologist at one time, but is icked out by rashes. Hold the comfort grip handle and extend it; it goes from 7-7/8" tall to 22" tall. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Baby Hippos
Description: This set of Baby Hippos means you can have the best part of a zoo on your desk at work! There are some famous hippo social media influencers these days. People are traveling everywhere, from Cincinnati to Thailand, just to get a peek at one of these wrinkly little cuties. Our Baby Hippos set comes with three soft vinyl, 1-3/4" to 2-1/4" long hippos being especially cute. One even has a tiny pumpkin in its mouth! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Camping Frogs
Description: Out in the forest, no one expects you to smile, which means the Camping Frogs feel right at home. This box contains a group of frogs who love the great outdoors! We think, but it’s hard to tell from their expressions. Sure, frogs live outside already, but this soft vinyl set of four, 1-3/8" to 1-7/8" tall rain frogs is properly outfitted for glamping in the forest. Includes a 3/4" tall campfire for night frogging. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Merry Christmas Frogs
Description: These frogs love Christmas! Christmas Frogs are the decoration you didn’t know you needed, but now you’ll need to make your holiday complete. They resemble our own family during the holidays after a few glasses of fortified eggnog. This is a soft vinyl set of four, 1-1/2" (3.8 cm) to 2-1/8" (7.3 cm) tall rain frogs that will celebrate year-round. The looks on their faces either hide or reveal how they actually feel about the holidays. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Foot Race Bulk Box
Description: You’ve heard of a foot race? Well, this display box is an entire marathon. Each 2-3/4" (6.9 cm) long, soft vinyl and plastic foot has wheels on its sole for racing! Pull this foot back a few inches and release. Illustrated display box with 24 feet. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy a set of 2 Foot Racers here.

title: Racing Wiener Dogs Bulk Box
Description: How many Racing Wiener Dogs do you need? One thing we know is that one wiener is never enough, you need them in bulk. Each of these 3-3/8" (8.5 cm) long soft vinyl and plastic wieners is a winner. They come in four different colors for easy identification. 24 Racing Wiener Dogs included in an illustrated display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy a set of 4 Racing Wiener Dogs here.

title: Racing Wiener Dogs - Set of 4
Description: Racing Wiener Dogs are an internet sensation! Every year, local dachshund groups gather and race their low-hanging, extra-long dogs against one another. Now you can reenact that race on your very own living room table as many times as you want. Then, after the race, you can rank them from best to wurst. Each 3-3/8" long soft vinyl and plastic wiener is a winner. They come in four different colors for easy identification during tense racing moments. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy Racing Wiener Dogs in bulk here.

title: Jalapeño Candy
Description: As the cherry is to a sundae, the pickled jalapeño is to nachos. This savory Jalapeño Candy captures the pickled flavor of jalapeño peppers with just a kiss of the heat. These green and white striped hard candies should probably come in a jar, but instead, they’re in a 3-1/4" x 2-1/2" x 2" tin filled with 2.5 oz. of individually wrapped jalapeño-flavored candy.

title: Chicken Soup Candy Canes
Description: If eating chicken soup is like getting a hug from mom, these candy canes are like a bear hug from Santa himself. This set of six candy canes tastes like chicken soup. It’s not nutritious at all, but it gives the illusion of being nutritious. A great gift for someone with that bug going around during the holiday. Each candy cane is 5-1/4" tall with yellow and white stripes.

title: Pacific Northwest Salmon Candy Canes
Description: It’s obvious that Archie McPhee is based in Washington state when we think it’s a good idea to make candy canes that taste like salmon. Getting people to try these Salmon Candy Canes is like swimming upstream—difficult, but totally worth it. A set of six candy canes, 5-1/4" tall with pink and white stripes that taste like they would be at home in a fancy restaurant or on a fresh bagel with a schmear.

title: Bigfoot Drink Markers
Description: These Bigfoot Drink Markers are perfect for your favorite cryptid-themed cocktail; ours is the Mothman Mule. As a well-known introvert, Bigfoot is not necessarily an expert at parties. These Bigfoot Drink Markers are his attempt to be useful by keeping all the drinks straight. Each styrene Bigfoot is between 2-5/8" to 2-7/8" tall and is designed to hang on the side of your glass. There are three different poses, each in two different colors.

title: Golden Girls Mug
Description: You should buy four of these so that when you sit with your three besties, you can all drink from them. Each ceramic Golden Girls Mug holds 14 ounces of liquid, which could be anything from tea to tequila. Officially licensed merch from a show that never gets old.

title: Fidget Intestines
Description: Fidget Intestines are both a stress-relieving toy and an excellent symbol of what stress does to your digestive system. We’ve all had times when it felt like we had a gurgle in our guts that needed to be worked out. Why not turn that idea into a fidget toy? You put your thumbs on the intestines and squish away as the liquid sploshes around inside. Fidget Intestines let you turn IBS into R&R. It’s a 6-1/2" x 7-1/2" set of vinyl intestines filled with squishable liquid and food shaped confetti! Great gift for your favorite stressed-out gastroenterologist. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Liquid Cats Bulk Box
Description: This is an illustrated display box of 24 of our Liquid Cats. These soft vinyl and plastic figures are between 2" to 2-1/8" tall and come in three different styles of kitties in bowls, each more adorable than the last. When you see a cat in a glass container, it makes you disappointed in the fish in your aquarium. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy individual Liquid Cats here.

title: Itty Bitty Goldfish - Bag of 10
Description: Famed for their bright color and short memories, we’re pretty sure you’ll remember these Itty Bitty Goldfish for more than three seconds. These soft vinyl fishies are tiny, 1" long versions of the real thing. Plus, you get 10, which by our estimation, constitutes a school of goldfish. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Cryptid Bouncing Balls
Description: Every cryptozoologist dreams of finding a complete set of cryptid balls. Our set of three different 1-3/4" diameter Cryptid Bouncing Balls are made of rubber and soft vinyl. Each set includes Bigfoot, Mothman and the Jersey Devil. We gave these to Bigfoot and he can’t stop playing with them. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. TOY CONTAINS A SMALL BALL. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Gilly the Bath Axolotl
Description: While rubber duckies maintain their popularity, we’d like to add the Bath Axolotl to the discussion. Gilly the Bath Axolotl floats in your tub and looks great posed on a soap dish. This pink, 4-1/2" long soft vinyl bathtub buddy is really glad you’re keeping it clean. Gilly is non-judgmental, tidy and happy to see you. All good qualities to have in a bath buddy. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Finger Shrimp
Description: How will you look while wearing Finger Shrimp? Are crustaceans cute? Of course they are! These delightful decapods turn your hand into a cocktail of shrimp puppets. Each soft vinyl shrimp is 4-1/4" long, transparent and comes in a set of two colors. Just a wiggle of your finger and you’ll imagine yourself skittering along the bottom of the sea, chomping down on algae. Wow! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy Finger Shrimp in bulk here.

title: Finger Shrimp Bulk Box
Description: An illustrated display box of 36 Shrimp Finger Puppets. Each soft vinyl shrimp is 4-1/4" long, transparent and comes in two colors. It’s just like that dream where you lived under the sea and spent all your time skittering on the ocean floor. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy individual Finger Shrimp here.

title: Meditating Venus Flytrap Bulk Box
Description: An illustrated display box of 24 hungry and mindful Meditating Venus Flytraps. These 3-3/4" tall, soft vinyl spiritually hungry plants come in two colors. They look like they are meditating and trying to attract flies. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy individual Meditating Venus Flytraps here.

title: Devil Duckie
Description: Nothing is sweeter or more innocent than a rubber duckie, right? Wrong. This little 4-1/2" long, red rubber Devil Duckie is one sinful squeaker. You'll think you're soaking in the hot magma pools of Hades when he leers at you with his arched eyebrow in your evening bath. He may be a representative of the dark side, but it's hard to resist his tiny horns and cute, chubby red body.Place the Devil Duckie in the tub with a regular rubber duck for the ultimate showdown of good cuteness vs. evil cuteness. Add bubbles to the water to make the duel truly epic and, well, even cuter. Get a bunch of friends together and hold Devil Duckie races. Don't assume the demon duckies won't cheat. It's in their evil nature. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Capybara in a Peanut
Description: After getting TikTok famous and having a capybara theme song, this Capybara in a Peanut spent his influencer money on a luxury car. Capybaras don’t need to be anywhere in a hurry, so the measured pace of the peanut vehicle is perfect. This pull-back peanut driven by a capybara balancing an orange on its head is 5" long, has four wheels and is made of soft vinyl and plastic. You can pretend this capybara is driving to your house to provide emotional solace and moral support. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Furrybones Sock Munky
Description: Furrybones Sock Munky is a 2-1/4" tall collectible figurine featuring a skeleton wearing a sock monkey costume. He’s eating a personified banana, which is very disturbing! Does the banana scream as it’s swallowed? Also, how does a skeleton eat? Where does the banana go? Cute!

title: Space Needle Building Blocks
Description: We love the retro futuristic style of the Space Needle. It points to the Seattle sky as a permanent symbol of the optimism brought by the 1962 World’s Fair. This Seattle Space Needle mini building block set has 821 tiny pieces and is 9-7/8" tall when complete. Of course, it's so small that the observation deck is not going to attract any tourists, but it will serve as a reminder of a time when the future looked bright. They recommend you glue it together to make it permanent, but surely you’d rather assemble it ten to twenty times at different points in your life. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Party Frog T-shirt
Description: A t-shirt featuring one of our Party Frogs. We think his dour expression and obviously festive accoutrements are an apt metaphor for our age. Just think how adorable you’ll look in this shirt while frowning. This 100% cotton Port & Company shirt is a shield against toxic positivity.

title: Aquarium Fish Finger Puppets Bulk Box
Description: This is a bulk box of 36 Aquarium Fish Finger Puppets. They come in four different styles: Cowfish, Red Passion Discus, Bicolor Angelfish and the ever-popular Seahorse. They are the showboats of the aquatic world! They are made of soft vinyl and are between 3" and 4-1/4" long. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy individual Aquarium Fish Finger Puppets here.

title: Itty Bitty Balloon Animals - Bag of 8
Description: Making balloon animals is a clowning skill we can all appreciate! We like to imagine that these are made by itty bitty clowns. (Product idea!) This set of eight styrene Itty Bitty Balloon Animals is between 7/8" and 1-1/2" tall and comes in four styles and colors that are transparent enough to look like tiny balloon animals. From swans to dogs, we’ve got a whole balloon zoo. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Itty Bitty Surfers - Bag of 8
Description: This is our gnarliest itty bitty yet, dudes! If Itty Bitty Surfers could float, they could surf the ripples caused by a pebble cast into a puddle. These Itty Bitty Surfers are 7/8" tall, made of soft vinyl and come in four different bodacious styles. You get two of each style for a total of eight different little guys to get stoked about. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Corn Multi-Tool
Description: This Corn Multi-Tool is freshly husked for folks who want to do a little home repair. It’s a 7" long, soft vinyl screwdriver shaped just like corn! You can unscrew the end to reveal a magnetized, built-in compartment for screwheads/bits. Comes with eight single-end screwheads/bits that we refer to as kernels. If you are looking for a gift, get this corn for your pop. It’s the cob for the job! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Opera Corn
Description: Opera Corn is the starch that can sing. In fact, it creams the competition! When it comes to an a-maize-ing aria, we’re all ears! This electronic Opera Corn sings when you press the button! Figaro! Figaro! It’s a hard vinyl ear of corn that is 6-1/4" tall that produces one of five ear-resistable operatic sounds at the push of a button. It’s a regular Luciano Cobarotti. You wouldn’t expect such highbrow music from corn, but we went against the grain. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Stress Mushrooms
Description: Stress Mushrooms are the best gift for mindful mycologists. This bag of three soft rubber (TPR) funguses is a tempting trio of mushy mushrooms! The three styles of mushroom range in size from 2-7/8" to 3-1/2" tall, but all of them are equally squishable. Now when someone says they’re stressed out, you can say, “Did you try mushrooms, man?” WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Orange Tabby Cat Coin Purse
Description: It’s a coin purse shaped like a little orange tabby cat. This soft vinyl, 5-1/4" long purse has a paw zipper pull and is the perfect size for cords, earbuds or actual coins! So adorable! Designed by a real purr-fessional cat appreciator! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Tuxedo Cat Coin Purse
Description: It’s a coin purse shaped like a little tuxedo cat. This soft vinyl, 5-1/4" long purse has a paw zipper pull and is the perfect size for cords, earbuds or actual coins! So cute! This is more properly called a coin purr-se! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Party Frogs
Description: Ok, so rain frogs might not look like they’re having a good time, but this box is guaranteed to contain a real frog party. Not all frogs are qualified to be Party Frogs, but this soft vinyl set of four, 1-1/2" to 2-1/4" tall rain frogs is built for one rager after another. You can tell from their hats that they are true, grumpy, party amphibians. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Casio G-Shock G-Steel Black Dial Black Resin Strap Watch GBM2100-1A
Description: Metal-clad daring meets sophisticated gleam in a GBM2100 that delivers Smartphone Link via Bluetooth® and Tough Solar charging system, all in a meticulously finished metal design with iconic octagonal bezel. Choose from a basic black dial or metallic vapor deposition in blue or green, each complemented by a band made of environmentally responsible bio-based resin. Welcome to a whole new level of metal-clad 2100 functionality — tough construction and stylish design in a timepiece that takes you from casual settings to business meetings without a thought. Basic Information Case size (L× W× H) 49.3 × 44.4 × 11.9 mm Weight 72 g Case and bezel material Resin (Bio-based) / Stainless steel Band Bio-based resin band Construction Shock Resistant, Water title: TISSOT EVERYTIME MEDIUM T109.410.16.032.00
Description: Brand: Tissot Water Resistance Rating: 30 m (3 ATM) Year of Manufacture: 2010-Now Features: Silver Dial, Arabic Numerals MPN: T109.410.16.032.00 Display: Analog Gender: Men's Model: T109.410.16.032.00 Style: Dress Case Material: Stainless Steel Movement: Quartz Movement Band Material: Leather Water Resistant: 30M Water Resistance

title: My Melody Mascot Fork
Description: Make mealtime more enjoyable with these cheerful, eating utensils featuring your favorite Sanrio Characters! A cute mascot sits up top while the comfortable handle shows off a sweet print, while you eat! ♡ Character fork ♡ ABS resin, stainless steel ♡ Hand wash only ♡ Approx. 7”

title: Hello Kitty x Madhappy Midweight Fleece Crewneck (Campus)
Description: Experience the perfect fusion of friendship and fashion with the Hello Kitty x Madhappy collection. Featuring Hello Kitty in the iconic Madhappy stitched hoodie, embroidered accessories, and exclusive elevated loungewear designs, this charming lineup is a must-have for anyone looking to combine comfort with standout style. Madhappy is a clothing brand for a community of optimists. Born in Los Angeles, 2017, the brand has built itself around an optimistic ideology, expressed through apparel, events, and experimental retail spaces around the world. ♡ Relaxed Unisex Fit ♡ Midweight Fleece ♡ 100% Cotton ♡ Madhappy & Hello Kitty Embroidered Logo at Front Chest and Printed Logo at Back ♡ Madhappy & Hello Kitty Label at Left Side Seam ♡ Mending Stitch at Neck ♡ Ribbed Collar, Cuffs & Hem ♡ Made In Los Angeles

title: Hello Kitty x Madhappy Emotions Midweight Fleece Hoodie (Noir)
Description: Experience the perfect fusion of friendship and fashion with the Hello Kitty x Madhappy collection. Featuring Hello Kitty in the iconic Madhappy stitched hoodie, embroidered accessories, and exclusive elevated loungewear designs, this charming lineup is a must-have for anyone looking to combine comfort with standout style. Madhappy is a clothing brand for a community of optimists. Born in Los Angeles, 2017, the brand has built itself around an optimistic ideology, expressed through apparel, events, and experimental retail spaces around the world. ♡ Relaxed Unisex Fit ♡ Midweight Fleece ♡ 100% Cotton ♡ Madhappy & Hello Kitty Printed Logo at Front Chest ♡ Madhappy & Hello Kitty Label at Left Side Seam ♡ Blanket Stitch Around Hood ♡ Ribbed Cuffs & Hem ♡ Made In Los Angeles

title: Kuromi x GUND 10" Plush (20th Anniversary)
Description: Celebrate 20 years of Kuromi with GUND! Kuromi rocks her signature punk style with a cute black and gray outfit, wearing a skirt made from soft ruffled layers of black plush and gray icy velour. She also features a black satin ribbon bow tied around her neck and smaller matching bows on her ear, complemented by a black embroidered heart and her iconic pink skull clip. Kuromi stands upright with sturdy feet that keep her balanced, ready to stand out in any kawaii toy collection or cause mischief for My Melody. With rosy cheeks and a twinkle in her eye, this unique commemorative plush makes an exciting gift for any Hello Kitty or pop culture fan. Complete your Sanrio collection and celebrate 20 years of the icon with this adorable plush toy! ♡ Premium plush ♡ 20th Anniversary special-edition ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10"

title: Hello Kitty x GUND Mini Zipper Pouch (Philbin Teddy Bear)
Description: Celebrate 125 years of GUND with an adorable collaboration between Hello Kitty and Philbin, one of GUND’s all-time best-selling classic teddy bears: a soft and cuddly plush pouch! Hello Kitty pouch features Philbin’s super-soft, chocolate-brown swirled plush and face, with Hello Kitty’s red bow and embroidered details. With its bright red zipper and lining, as well as its convenient size, this pouch is perfect for storing your belongings on the go and fits seamlessly with any GUND or Sanrio collection. ♡ Zipper closure ♡ Premium textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 5.5"

title: Hello Kitty x GUND 10" Plush (Philbin Teddy Bear)
Description: Celebrate 125 years of GUND with an adorable collaboration between Hello Kitty and Philbin, one of GUND’s all-time best-selling classic teddy bears. In this special edition plush, Hello Kitty is dressed up as Philbin, featuring his signature super-soft, chocolate-brown swirled plush, designed in a seated position, perfect for playtime and display. The kawaii plush also showcases Hello Kitty’s bright red bow and embroidered facial details, as well as Philbin's adorable curious expression, soft plush muzzle, and embroidered paw pads. This eye-catching and distinctive plush toy will delight collectors and GUND fans of all ages! ♡ Sitting position ♡ Premium swirled textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10"

title: Badtz-maru x GUND 6" Classic Mascot Plush
Description: Bad Badtz-maru might wear a frown, but one hug from this cuddly penguin will make you smile! The mischievous penguin from the world of Sanrio is joining playtime as a cuddly 6” plush, looking adorably unamused as ever. This seated Bad Badtz-maru toy has super-soft curly black and white plush with a spiky feather hairdo, his iconic expression with black embroidery, and soft yellow icy velour on his feet and beak. His short wings hang to the side while a tailfeather in back helps keep him balanced upright and display ready. Perfect for Sanrio fans and kawaii plush collectors of all ages! ♡ Sitting position ♡ Premium textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: Cinnamoroll x GUND 6" Latte Bears Mascot Plush
Description: Have a sweet, snuggly coffee break with Hello Kitty and Friends! Cinnamoroll is here in an adorable beige latte-inspired teddy bear outfit, complete with extra-fluffy plush, brown, pink, and blue embroidered accents, and a faux suede blue bowtie around his neck. His long ears flop downward and he sits inside a soft white plush coffee mug, peering out in an adorable pose that makes this plush a wonderful addition for coffee lovers of every taste! ♡ Latte Bears theme ♡ Premium textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: My Melody x GUND 10" Latte Bears Plush
Description: Have a sweet, snuggly coffee break with Hello Kitty and Friends! My Melody is here dressed as an adorable teddy bear, sporting a soft and extra-fluffy bear costume. Her long pink ears flop down to the side under a set of teddy bear ears, and a cute embroidered teddy bear face rests on top of her hood. She also features a long, soft faux-suede bow tied around her neck and sits 10” tall. This plush is a cute gift for coffee lovers and My Melody fans alike and makes a fun addition for the office, kitchen, or on display in any plush toy collection. ♡ Latte Bears theme ♡ Premium textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10”

title: Hello Kitty x GUND 6" Latte Bears Mascot Plush
Description: Have a sweet, snuggly coffee break with Hello Kitty and Friends! Hello Kitty is here in an adorable white latte-inspired teddy bear outfit, complete with extra-fluffy white plush, brown facial details and teddy bear accents, and pink bows that Hello Kitty wears on her ear and around her neck. She sits inside a soft beige plush coffee mug, peering out in an adorable pose that makes it a wonderful addition for coffee lovers of every taste! ♡ Latte Bears theme ♡ Premium textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: Hello Kitty x GUND 10"Rainbow Onesie Plush
Description: Hello Kitty loves to dress up in adorable outfits like this striped, pastel rainbow onesie pulled over her head with matching purple bow! This colorful standing plush features Hello Kitty with high-quality embroidered details on her face and extra kitty face on the outfit's hood. Collect Hello Kitty and all of her friends as adorable GUND plush! ♡ Standing position ♡ Rainbow onesie costume ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10"

title: Tuxedosam x GUND 6" Classic Mascot Plush
Description: Tuxedosam, the dapper blue penguin with an amazing fashion sense from the world of Sanrio, is ready to join playtime as a cuddly 6” plush! This Tuxedosam plush toy features soft, bright blue plush, adorable little flippers, and embroidered eyes. This fashionable fellow also wears an icy white sailor cap with pink satin ribbon lining, tipped to the side for flare. He also features a matching bright pink satin bowtie! Perfect for Sanrio fans and kawaii plush collectors of all ages. ♡ Sitting position ♡ Premium plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: Pochacco x GUND 6" Classic Mascot Plush
Description: Pochacco, the curious and sporty puppy dog from the world of Sanrio, is joining playtime as a cuddly 6” plush! This Pochacco plush features short, super-soft curly white plush with floppy black ears, a tuft of black plush on top of his head, embroidered paw pads, and black facial embroidery. Pochacco also wears his signature red t-shirt and sits in a playful waving pose, eager to say hello and join your collection! Perfect for Sanrio fans and kawaii plush collectors of all ages. ♡ Sitting position ♡ Premium textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: My Melody x GUND 6" Ice Cream Mascot Plush
Description: My Melody is extra sweet and dressed up as a tasty ice cream cone! This 6-inch seated plush features My Melody, Hello Kitty’s best friend from the world of Sanrio, in a colorful dessert-inspired outfit with velvety-soft pink plush and chocolate-brown embroidered facial details. My Melody looks lovely in a waffle cone-pattern skirt, a strawberry-pink collared shirt with sprinkles, and bright pink bows on her ears My Melody also wears a delicious swirl of vanilla ice cream as a hat, accented by pink and blue sprinkles. This My Melody plush features uniquely cute, display-ready details to impress foodies, pop culture, and Sanrio fans alike! ♡ Sitting position ♡ Surface-washable plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: My Melody x GUND 10" Plush (Pink Hood)
Description: Hello Kitty's best friend My Melody is a sweet, honest white rabbit who always wears a pink hood knit by her beloved grandma! This standing plush features My Melody's classic look with floppy ears, white flower attached to her pink hood, and big embroidered smile on her face! Collect Hello Kitty and all her friends as adorable GUND plush! ♡ Standing position ♡ Coordinating pink hood ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10"

title: Gudetama x GUND 9" Pudding Flan Plush
Description: Gudetama is here as a lazy, delicious flan and ready for an eggcellent adventure with you! This 9” plush shows Gudetama as a large caramel pudding flan, one of the many iconic food forms from the egg restaurant in the Netflix series, Gudetama: An Eggcellent Adventure. Gudetama has a tan plush base, brown caramel syrup oozing down its face, a dollop of whipped cream with rainbow sprinkles, and a cherry on top. Perfect for foodies and collectors alike! Explore the whole GUND Sanrio collection for more Gudetama plush, including more styles based on the hit Netflix series Gudetama: An Eggcellent Adventure! ♡ Pudding flan theme ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 9"

title: Gudetama x GUND Mascot Plush (Eggshell)
Description: Gudetama just needs five more minutes in its shell. The lazy egg from the world of Sanrio arrives as a 5” yolk inside a cracked eggshell, with an alarmed expression and raised arms. The soft, structured eggshell has a white plush exterior and Velcro enclosure. Best of all, this Gudetama plush comes completely out of its shell, making it a fun and humorous display piece in any collection. You can let Gudetama hide in its shell or easily attach the shell to help it feel whole again. Perfect for foodies and collectors alike! ♡ Removable eggshell, velcro closure ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 5"

title: Gudetama x GUND Mascot Plush (Noodles)
Description: Gudetama is here as the main course! This huggably squishy plush features everyone’s favorite egg looking hilariously apathetic, with its adorable signature expression and open mouth. With its legs crossed and arms tucked behind its head, this lazy egg couldn’t be more relaxed, even as it swims in noodle soup. ♡ Noodle bowl theme ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 5"

title: Gudetama x GUND Mascot Plush (Spicy)
Description: Gudetama’s feeling spicy! This super-cute Gudetama plush features the lazy egg with velvety-soft plush, sitting on an egg white while holding a large, bright red chili pepper. This plush also features embroidered facial details, including a single drop of sweat dripping down Gudetama’s face, which complements its signature exasperated expression. Perfect for collectors! ♡ Sitting position, spicy accent ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 5"

title: Hello Kitty 2025 Halloween Treat Bag
Description: Grab your friends and dress up—it’s time for some trick-or-treating fun! Hello Kitty and Friends are ready for spooky adventures, especially when candy and treats are part of the excitement. These spooky goodie bags are perfect for holding all your Halloween treasures. Pick one or collect them all to celebrate one of the best holidays—Halloween! ♡ Printed canvas body ♡ Nylon webbing strap ♡ 2025 Halloween motif ♡ Approx. 8 x 4 x 8”

Description: Everyone loves the thrill of a fun blind box, especially when the surprise is met with a supercute Hello Kitty smartphone charm! These beaded charms easily attach to your phone or can bring a bit of joy to your keys, bags, or anywhere your heart desires! ♡ 1 Blind box ♡ Assortment varies (8 styles, 1 chosen at random) ♡ Smartphone charm, chosen at random ♡ Approx. 5” *Note: Blind boxes are chosen at random. They are considered final sale, non-returnable.

title: Hello Kitty Halloween Ornament (White Ghost)
Description: Hovering and gliding through the air, Halloween wouldn’t be complete without a scary-cute ghost featuring Hello Kitty! These pint-sized hanging ornaments are highly giftable and ready to make your holiday decor spookier! ♡ Halloween character accents ♡ White ghost costume, hanging loop ♡ Embroidered and applique details ♡ Approx. 3.25”

title: Hello Kitty Mascot Clip (Cheerleader Squad Series)
Description: Ra-ra-ra! Grab your poms and let’s cheer in the name of fun! Enjoy your favorite Sanrio Characters dressed as cheerleaders as they root for their biggest fan - you! These mini mascots make wonderful gifts when someone needs some encouragement straight from the Sanrio sidelines! ♡ Clip attachment ♡ Embroidered and applique details ♡ Cheerleader outfit, pompom accents ♡ Approx. 4.75”

Description: Welcome to the University of CUTE! Let’s head to class and walk the halls with the Sanrio crew! Welcome to the University of CUTE! Let’s head to class and walk the halls with the Sanrio crew! Chococat is dressed in fancy collegiate blazer and bow tie - ready to hit the books! title: Hello Kitty x GUND 6" Unicorn Mascot Plush
Description: Hello Kitty and friends are here to bring a little magic to playtime! Hello Kitty has never looked cuter than as a soft, cuddly pastel yellow unicorn with rainbow details. This 6-inch plush features the beloved Sanrio character in a sitting pose, with velvety-soft pink hooves that match her iconic bow. Her eye-catching, shiny gold metallic horn and sleepy unicorn embroidered eye details make this plush a unique piece for Sanrio fans and kawaii plush collectors of all tastes. ♡ Sitting position ♡ Premium plush, metallic horn ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: Hello Kitty x GUND 6" Sashimi Mascot Plush
Description: Hello Kitty, the beloved star from the world of Sanrio, is here as a soft sashimi! This 6-inch soft white plush features Hello Kitty lying down on a bed of fluffy white sherpa rice, boasting a shiny two-tone velour back. The sashimi is striped with a bold red-and-pink pattern and features an adorable tiny fishtail in the back. This Hello Kitty plush is perfect for cuddling or showing off in any kawaii plush collection! ♡ Premium plush ♡ Lying down pose ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: Gudetama x GUND Mascot Plush (Lazy Egg)
Description: Ugh. This lazy egg would much rather be lying down, but so it goes. This huggably squishy plush features everyone’s favorite egg looking hilariously apathetic, with its adorable signature expression and open mouth. Gudetama sits comfortably on a super-soft plush egg white. ♡ Sitting position ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 4"

title: Hello Kitty x GUND 10" Sushi Roll Plush
Description: Hello Kitty is a classic Japanese delicacy! This whimsical 10” plush features Hello Kitty as a large piece of sushi with embroidered facial details and several bright veggie sticks tucked behind her head. She sports her signature red bow and sits comfortably on a bed of fluffy white rice, which is wrapped in a dark green piece of crushed-velvet nori. The bottom of the plush also features a bright red silhouette of Kitty’s head as an extra treat for collectors. This unique, eye-catching Hello Kitty plush is a must-have for collectors and foodies alike! ♡ Sushi roll theme ♡ Premium textured plush ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10" *Note: Last image shown for reference only.

title: Hello Kitty x GUND 10" Plush (Keroppi Costume)
Description: Hello Kitty is ready for playtime… as Keroppi! This adorable plush features Hello Kitty dressed up as Keroppi, her energetic and adventurous froggy friend from Donut Pond, sporting his iconic satin red-and-white striped outfit. Her lime-green plush is detailed with classic Keroppi features, such as his large, sweet eyes, rosy cheeks, and V-shaped smile. Hello Kitty even completes the outfit with more accessories: her own signature red bow and Keroppi’s black satin bowtie! This unique plush is perfect for Hello Kitty and Keroppi fans alike! ♡ Premium plush ♡ Hello Kitty dressed as Keroppi ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10"

title: Kuromi x GUND 6" Unicorn Mascot Plush
Description: Hello Kitty and friends are here to bring a little magic to playtime! Kuromi looks less mischievous than usual as a soft, cuddly pastel purple unicorn with rainbow details. This 6-inch plush features Kuromi in a sitting pose, wearing her signature black outfit style with velvety-soft pink hooves that match her skull bow and the soft pink baubles on her iconic jester’s hat. Her eye-catching, shiny gold metallic horn and sleepy unicorn embroidered eye details make this plush a unique piece for collectors and Sanrio fans of all styles. ♡ Sitting position ♡ Premium plush, metallic horn ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 6"

title: Gudetama x GUND 10" Takeout Plush
Description: Gudetama is here as a lazy takeout container! This large, huggably squishy plush features everyone’s favorite egg as the main dish, looking hilariously apathetic with its adorable signature expression and open mouth. The super-soft plush takeout container also features red details and a pair of tan chopsticks that pops out from behind Gudetama’s head. Perfect for fans and collectors alike! ♡ Takeout food theme ♡ Embroidered and applique detailing ♡ Approx. 10"

title: Lilas Dress Pattern
Description: Lilas is a romantic, feminine dress that shifts effortlessly from casual to elegant depending on your choice of fabric. It features a fitted bodice shaped with sculpting vertical seams; fully lined, the bodice can be made in three cup sizes. Lengthening skirt panels gently flare out from the hip down, with pockets inserted at the side seam. The dress is secured with an invisible zipper at center back. View A is a sweetheart-necked midi-length dress with full sleeves that finish with built-in fabric ties below the elbow. Elastic channels help the sleeves lay close to the body around the shoulder and chest. View B is a fitted mini-length sundress with straps that tie at the shoulder. Please know this is a duplicate product. To access the correct product go here.

title: Marine Knit Top + Dress Pattern
Description: Channel your inner “je ne sais quoi” with the Marine Top + Dress, our twist on an iconic Breton marinière. With a gently flared sleeve, slouchy fit, dropped shoulder, and classic details like a wide bateau neckline, topstitched facing, and split hem, you’ll feel like you stepped right out of a French New Wave film in this chic knit top or dress. View A is a top with a wrist-skimming sleeve and a shoulder-wide facing enclosed in the armscye. View B is a dress with 3/4 length sleeves and a standard neckline facing. Learn how to make this dress with a complete sewalong in our Serger + Coverstitch Basics class!

title: Sepia Pants + Shorts Pattern
Description: The Sepia Pants + Shorts have a clever design that blends style and comfort. Functional double pockets in the front are sewn to create a floating effect, with additional topstitched pockets in the back. A traditional elastic waistband is elevated with a fluted paperbag edge and optional drawstring. View A features barrel leg pants ending at the ankle, shaped with darts at the knee and hem. View B features wide leg, full-length pants. View C features shorts ending at mid-thigh. Please know this is a duplicate product. To access the correct product go here.

title: Azure Dress, Skirt + Top Pattern
Description: With five distinct views, Azure is a mini wardrobe in one tidy package! With a dress and skirt in two lengths and a separate sleeveless top, you'll love mixing and matching pieces. The Azure bodice is semi-fitted with a jewel neckline and button closure in the back; it can be lined or finished with an all-in-one facing. The skirt is striking with alternating diagonal gathered panels and can be worn on its own or integrated into a breezy tiered dress. View A is a below-knee dress with two tiers that ends just below the knee. View B is a maxi-length dress with three tiers that ends below the ankle. View C is a cropped sleeveless top that hits just below the natural waist. View D is a below-knee skirt with an elasticized back and two tiers that ends just below the knee. View E is a maxi-length skirt with an elasticized back and three tiers that ends below the ankle. Please know this is a duplicate product. To access the correct product go here.

title: Magnolia Dress Pattern
Description: The Magnolia Dress is sure to be a showstopper (while still being comfortable and easy to wear, the Deer&Doe trademark!) With its statuesque silhouette and killer neckline, the maxi length is ideal for formal events; the long skirt length and sleeves balance the depth of the mock-wrap neckline, and a slit adds interest and movement to the ample skirt. The shorter version is more casual and flirty with a unique butterfly sleeve and higher neckline. Both versions feature a bodice with princess seams, a structured waist, back tie, invisible zipper in the side seam, and flared + paneled skirt. Version A is maxi length with a low-cut bust and a long set-in sleeve. Version B is above knee length with a higher-cut neckline and fluttery butterfly sleeve.

title: Couturière Hat -Black
Description: Sewist? Seamstress? Dressmaker? Fashion Designer! Couturière means all those things – you decide which one best describes you! Keep the sun off your face and reveal your superpower with the perfect accessory for all your me-made outfits! Made from 100% cotton twill, this 6-panel hat with a pre-curved visor is easy to adjust with a matching buckle closure. Production details: This hat was produced in Bangladesh in a Higgs and WRAP-certified manufacturing facility. The embroidery was done here in Montreal.

title: Sewcialism Hat - White + Lavender
Description: Keep the sun off your face while letting everyone know your personal sewing philosophy - sewcialism for all! (Be sure to wear on Thanksgiving if you feel like getting into a fight with your uncle about how awesome sewing is). Made from 100% cotton twill with a distressed/enzyme washed finish this 6-panel hat with a pre-curved visor is easy to adjust with a matching buckle closure. Production details: This hat was produced in Bangladesh in a Higgs and WRAP-certified manufacturing facility. The embroidery was done here in Montreal.

title: Phoebe Coat
Description: Please note you get Phoebe included with our new Coat Making 101 class! Modern yet timeless, Phoebe is a double-breasted coat with a cocoon shape. Fully lined, it features a dramatic notched collar and lapel that can also be worn closed to stop drafts. The dropped shoulder, roomy two-piece sleeve, and oversized fit make this coat ideal for layering over bulky winter layers. Destined to keep you warm on the coldest of days, this pattern is a great introduction to sewing tailored garments. View A is below-knee length with large patch pockets. View B ends at mid-thigh with inseam pockets. Please note this pattern is available in Alpha Sizing, a new addition to our size range. This pattern spans from XXS (31" bust, 33" hip) to 4X (60" bust, 62" hip).

title: Rika Pants Pattern
Description: One pants pattern, two looks! The Rika Pants are a timeless and versatile design that can feel like tailored trousers or utilitarian workwear depending on your choice of details. Featuring a high rise sitting just below the natural waist, a three-piece waistband, angled front pockets, a fly front zipper, and a straight leg, Rika has you covered coming and going. View A is cropped and tailored with deep hem cuffs, a tabbed waistband, angled belt loops, and rounded back pockets with flaps. View B is full-length and utilitarian with a classic waistband, wide belt loops, and carpenter-style pockets in the back.

title: Dressed ebook With 9 Patterns!
Description: The Dressed ebook was born from the desire to create the ideal wardrobe – one that is quick to sew, easy to mix and match, and super wearable for a busy daily life. Dressed consists of a thoughtful and fun method to build that ideal wardrobe, with nine staple patterns (in sizes 34-52) that will allow you to create a personalized capsule wardrobe based on your personal taste and lifestyle. Here are some of the topics explored in Dressed, which you can explore and work through using included worksheets: Analyzing your lifestyle Defining your personal style Finding your colours Making peace with your body image Planning your projects Choosing the right fabric Intended for sewists of all levels (including beginners!), Dressed is a timeless resource you can use to personalize your look for seasons and years to come. With detailed instructions and multiple variations included with each pattern, the 9 exclusive designs in this ebook can be combined to create over 100 different outfits! Patterns included with the Dressed ebook: A chic knit t-shirt with cut-on sleeves and a scoop or V neckline. A slightly flared, high-waisted woven skirt with an elastic waist and two length options. Form-fitting knit top with a mock neck and long sleeve or sleeveless option. Boatneck woven dress with dropped shoulders and an elastic waist. Flared skirt includes two lengths. Chic, understated woven blouse with a rounded collar and short sleeves, and can be made as a blouse with curved hem or dress with straight hem. Button-up woven blouse with V-neck blouse and two sleeve lengths. Straight-cut woven pants taper to the ankle with pockets, mock fly, and a mid-rise elastic waist. Pants + shorts option. Duster jacket for wovens with dropped shoulders, large patch pockets, and optional belt. Includes two lengths. Cullotes for wovens with high waist, invisible zipper, side slant pockets, and wide legs. Please note this product is a downloadable ebook with patterns you must print yourself.

title: Zéphyr Dress, Top + Skirt Pattern
Description: Comfortable, feminine and effortless, Zéphyr is a sleeveless knit dress that works for many occasions thanks to its different variations. It has a skater dress shape with princess seams and a flared skirt. Super quick to sew and versatile, it’s the perfect pattern to build a wardrobe of basics! Version A: High crew neck Version B: V neck Version C: Crop top and skirt set

title: Sirocco Jumpsuit Pattern
Description: Comfort and glamour in one tidy package, the Sirocco jumpsuit is designed for knit fabrics. It features a mock-wrap bodice, short sleeve, and pleated pants (and yes, there are pockets!) Version A is a jumpsuit with tapered pants. Version B is a romper with shorts.

title: American Girl® 2025 Glimmering Gold™ Holiday Collector Doll
Description: A gleaming jewel in any light, this limited-edition American Girl® 2025 holiday collector doll sparkles with celestial wonder. Her golden floor-length gown is draped in cascading stars and she glitters with more than 100 Crystal Moonlight Swarovski® crystals, mirroring the depth and glow of a night sky. This beautiful American Girl® Collector Series doll features brown eyes and long curly black hair. No more than 11,000 American Girl® 2025 Glimmering Gold™ Holiday Collector Dolls have been created worldwide.Premium features: An 18” Truly Me™ doll with brown eyes that open and close smoothly. Her long curly black hair—the first introduction of this curl style for American Girl—is styled with a crystal-adorned golden metal headband. She comes with gold glitter eye makeup, pink lips, and a pair of golden star-shaped earrings with Swarovski crystals in her pierced ears. The doll has a soft cotton body, and her movable head and limbs are made of smooth vinyl. She features a heart face shape. An enchanting golden metallic mesh gown featuring glittery and metallic starburst appliques, cream-colored satin lining with a golden foil-print star pattern, and a three-layer mesh skirt adorned with Swarovski crystals along the hem A golden metal headband with a celestial-inspired design accented with Swarovski crystals, a golden metal star necklace with Swarovski crystals, and a golden metal star bracelet embellished with Swarovski crystals A pair of golden sandals with a silvery glitter starburst detail and Swarovski crystals A crescent moon-shaped purse with a golden metal strap, a silvery glitter starburst detail, and Swarovski crystals Also includes: A numbered certificate of authenticity A pair of cotton underwear

title: WICKED Elphaba Doll by American Girl® Collector Series
Description: Magically gifted but misunderstood, Elphaba Thropp is smart, fiery, and full of extraordinary talent. The WICKED Elphaba Doll by American Girl® Collector Series captures her spellbinding style, complete with a beautiful ombre-print dress that moves from green to black. As seen in Wicked: For Good, this positively green witch is ready to defy gravity with her signature hat and broom in hand. This limited-edition 18-inch collector doll features dark-brown hair and green eyes. No more than 6,000 WICKED Elphaba Collector Dolls have been created worldwide.Premium features: An 18” doll with green skin, custom freckles, and green eyes that open and close smoothly. Her custom green skin tone (an American Girl first) was designed in partnership with Universal to match the Elphaba character. She is the first American Girl doll to feature micro-braided hair, which is dark brown and styled with the ends slightly undone. She bewitches with custom green eyeshadow and green polish on her fingernails and toes. Her custom details include unique eyebrows, lip color, and baby-hair details near her hairline. The doll has a soft cotton body with green fabric to match her skin tone, and her movable head and limbs are made of smooth vinyl. She features a round face shape. A green and black ombre-print dress featuring raised fabric details and an asymmetrical, undone hem A full-length black coat featuring a metallic brocade, ruffled shoulders, an asymmetrical button front, and patchwork panels A removable ombre-print chiffon cape that buttons onto the coat A black witch hat with patchwork panels and textured fabric details A faux broom that can stand on its own or be held by the doll, featuring a wood-grain texture and Art Deco-style details Also includes: A pair of kitten-heel black boots with an asymmetrical faux lace-up detail A pair of black cotton underwear A numbered certificate of authenticity

title: WICKED Glinda “Popular” Pajamas by American Girl® Collector Series
Description: At Shiz University, when someone needs a makeover, Glinda simply has to take over. Celebrate Wicked with Glinda’s glamorous nighttime fashion. title: WICKED Glinda Doll by American Girl® Collector Series
Description: Charming, bubbly, and popular, Glinda Upland learns the power of goodness through an unlikely friendship. The WICKED Glinda Doll by American Girl® Collector Series arrives in an iridescent ball gown with embroidered details, layered tulle, and shiny butterfly-wing print as seen in Wicked: For Good. As she travels by bubble, her pink-manicured hand holds her magic wand—an essential for this glamorous gal. This limited-edition 18-inch collector doll features blonde hair and brown eyes. The doll has a soft cotton body, and her movable head and limbs are made of smooth vinyl. She features a diamond face shape. title: Raquel™ 18-inch Doll & Journal (Girl of the Year™ 2026)
Description: Raquel Reyes™ loves DJing, taste-testing paletas at her family’s shop in Kansas City, and spending time with her lovable rescue pup, Luzita™. For the summer, she’s heading to the East Coast for a big family reunion and wedding. Amid the fun-in-the-sun days with her cousins, she encounters a few surprises—including her great-great-grandmother’s diary. Enjoy hours of play with our 2026 Girl of the Year™, Raquel, an American Girl 18-inch doll with brown eyes and dark-brown hair. Create matching moments with Raquel’s™ Gingham Ruffle Outfit for Girls (sold separately).Premium features: An 18" Raquel doll with brown eyes that open and close, and dark-brown hair styled in a front ponytail with a gingham bow. She has a soft cotton body, and her movable head and limbs are made of smooth vinyl. An outfit inspired by Raquel’s great-great-grandmother Samantha Parkington’s iconic look: a pink-and-plum gingham-print top with a ruched front, puff sleeves with attached purple bows, and a ruffled bottom hem; a gingham-print full skirt with gathers at the waist; and a matching hair tie with a gingham-print fabric bow Also includes: A golden cuff bracelet with a bow, a pair of pink platform shoes with ankle straps and purple bows at the toes, and a pair of underwear An illustrated paperback book, The Diary of Raquel Reyes, that tells how Raquel shares her passion for music and family history, reconnects with her relatives, and springs into action with her cousin Sloan for an important rescue mission

title: Raquel Reyes™ Gift Set (Girl of the Year™ 2026)
Description: This all-in-one gift set brings Raquel’s story to life for hours of imaginative play! Whether she’s playing with her rescue pup, taste-testing her family’s paletas (Mexican frozen treats), or exploring East Coast beaches, it’s “shore” to be a summer to remember.Raquel™ 18-inch Doll & Journal: An 18" Raquel doll with brown eyes that open and close, and dark-brown hair styled in a front ponytail with a gingham bow. She has a soft cotton body, and her movable head and limbs are made of smooth vinyl. The Raquel doll arrives in an outfit inspired by her great-great-grandmother Samantha Parkington’s iconic look: a pink-and-plum gingham-print top, a gingham-print full skirt, and a matching hair tie with a fabric bow. Also includes a bracelet, a pair of pink platform shoes, and a pair of underwear, plus the illustrated paperback book The Diary of Raquel Reyes.Raquel's™ Accessories for 18-inch Dolls: A golden necklace that matches Samantha’s™ original brooch locket, a diary that used to belong to Samantha with some of her writing inside, a photo of Samantha, a photo of Samantha’ house, and a recipe card, a canvas tote bag with Raquel’s name embroidered on the front, a pair of pink sunglasses, and a faux cell phone Raquel’s™ Dog, Luzita™: A plush Pomeranian dog with fluffy light-brown fur and a white chest, a tote-bag dog carrier with Luzita’s name embroidered, a poop bag holder, and a water bowlRaquel’s™ Beach Outfit for 18-inch Dolls: A 2-in-1 swim outfit featuring a light pink floral-print swimsuit top with flutter sleeves, matching floral swim bottoms with ruffles at the legs, and a matching wrap swim-skirt, a straw hat with a light-pink satin-ribbon band, and a pair of pink sandalsRaquel’s Summertime Treats Set™ for 18-inch Dolls: A bright-pink beach cooler with rolling wheels, an extendable handle dolls can hold, a removable tray, and space to store all the included items inside, plus stickers to customize the exterior; a circular beach blanket; a set of six paletas: two orange, two blue, and two pink; two bottles of orange soda; and two sandwich wraps

title: Raquel's™ Piney Point Pickleball Outfit for 18-inch Dolls (Girl of the Year™ 2026)
Description: Raquel Reyes™ learns how to play pickleball in Mount Bedford with the help of her relatives. Her cousin Sloan picks out this outfit for her to wear when they play. This American Girl 5-piece 18-inch doll outfit with accessories pairs with the 2026 Girl of the Year Raquel’s Pickleball Bag & Paddle Set (sold separately).Includes: A pink knit short-sleeved top with a Piney Point center graphic, a nod to the summer house Samantha Parkington loved to visit A white pleated skirt with a pink-and-teal stripe, plus pink-and-teal bows on the side A pair of pink knee socks and a pair of white tennis shoes with contrasting pink side details A hair tie with a pink ribbon bow

title: Raquel's™ Pickleball Bag & Paddle Set for 18-inch Dolls (Girl of the Year™ 2026)
Description: Raquel Reyes™ tries pickleball for the first time on vacation and later DJs at a pickleball tournament. This American Girl 8-piece set of 18-inch doll accessories pairs with the 2026 Girl of the Year™ Raquel’s Piney Point Pickleball Outfit (sold separately).Includes: A pair of pickleball paddles dolls can hold, featuring pink handles, a white and teal star graphic, and golden edges A white pickleball bag with pink piping, a side mesh pocket, a pickleball graphic, and a front zipper pocket that can hold the racket Three pink pickleballs A water bottle with a blue-green gradient print and pink lid A teal visor with a transparent pink bill and an embroidered American Girl logo

title: Raquel's™ Beach Party Dress for 18-inch Dolls (Girl of the Year™ 2026)
Description: At the family reunion talent show, Raquel Reyes™ wears this dress as she showcases her special talent as a DJ. title: Raquel’s™ Vintage Vanity for 18-inch Dolls (Girl of the Year™ 2026)
Description: Raquel Reyes™ is excited for her cousin Harper’s wedding as she gets ready at this vintage-inspired vanity in her great-great-grandmother Samantha’s old bedroom. This American Girl 12-piece playset for 18-inch dolls pairs perfectly with the 2026 Girl of the Year™ Raquel™ 18-inch doll and Raquel's Accessories (each sold separately)Premium features: A vintage-inspired blue vanity with a wooden top, "turned"-style legs, a functional oval-shaped mirror, drawers that open and close, and golden drawer pulls shaped like bows A pink metal chair dolls can sit in, featuring a seatback shaped like a bow A round trinket box that belonged to Raquel’s great-great-grandmother Samantha, featuring a domed lid with a vintage-inspired rose pattern Also includes: A faux curling iron that the doll can hold, featuring a pink handle and a metallic barrel with a spring-clamp function, just like the real thing! A large light-blue hairstyling clip, two makeup brushes with pink handles and real bristles, and a clear two-section caddy with a golden base to store them A pink cushioned headband Raquel wears while getting ready A pink compact with a mirror and faux makeup inside, a pretend bottle of blue nail polish, and a pink faux perfume bottle

title: Raquel's™ Beach Outfit for 18-inch Dolls (Girl of the Year™ 2026)

title: Raquel's™ Seaside Car for 18-inch Dolls (Girl of the Year™ 2026)
Description: This cool vintage-style car lets Raquel Reyes™ feel the ocean breeze as she cruises with her cousin crew during her family’s beach vacation. title: Trucker Hat - Maple Syrup
Description: Look, we could explain the deep cultural significance of this patch, but honestly? Sometimes a hat is just a hat with syrup on it. At some point in our design meetings, someone said "you know what this hat needs? A breakfast condiment" and instead of calling security, we all nodded and made it happen. The fact that you're even reading this description suggests you're exactly the kind of person who gets it. Welcome to the club. Why You'll Love It: Permanently Attached: Our full grain leather patches stay put, come rain or shine, ensuring they'll never come off with regular wear. Crafted with care: We apply and stamp our full-grain leather patches in our Canadian workshop, adding a rugged, custom finish to premium Yupoong hats. Yupoong, a globally trusted South Korean brand, manufactures its hats in ethically run, internationally certified factories in Bangladesh and Vietnam, ensuring responsible sourcing, worker safety, and high production standards. Versatile Design: A nod to the classic trucker silhouette, our cap features breathable mesh panels and a structured design, ready for whatever your day brings. Custom Fit: Equipped with an adjustable snapback closure, ensuring a comfortable fit for any head size. Crafted for Durability: Made from a sturdy blend of 65% Polyester and 35% Cotton, this cap is built to last through all your daily journeys. Detailed Craftsmanship: From the matching under visor to the precision 8-row stitching on the visor, every detail is carefully considered.

Description: Featherlight fabric & laser-cut ventilation for no-gi grappling. Secure fit, tear-resistant design. Built for MMA, BJJ, and intense training.

title: Hayabusa Men’s Apex 3/4 Thigh Fight Shorts
Description: Built for no-gi grappling & MMA, Hayabusa’s Apex 3/4 Thigh Shorts feature tear-resistant fabric, a locked-in silicone waistband, laser-cut ventilation & stretch panels for maximum mobility. Shop now!
