Scan your surroundings for clues, make the most of your equipment and weapons, and use Samus’s newfound psychic abilities—and her technologically advanced bike, the Vi-O-La—to traverse and explore the environment. Operate mechanisms, control your charge beam, and more—you’ll need every tool at your disposal to survive and escape Viewros! Play with mouse controls, enhanced visuals, and two different display modes—only on the Nintendo Switch 2 system. Aim with a Joy-Con 2 controller as a mouse! The Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition game also features enhanced resolution, framerate, and load times. Two display modes let you choose how to experience the adventure. Enjoy more detail in Quality Mode, which runs at 60 frames per second in 4k while docked and in 1080p while in handheld, or prioritize super-smooth action with a higher frame rate in Performance Mode, which runs at 120 frames per second in 1080p while docked and 720p in while in handheld. Both choices are HDR compatible. Explore the mysterious planet Viewros as the renowned bounty hunter Samus Aran Scan your surroundings for clues and make the most of your equipment and weapons to survive Use Samus’s newfound psychic abilities And her technologically advanced bike, the Vi-O-La—to traverse and explore the environment. Aim with a Joy-Con 2 controller as a mouse Experience enhanced resolution, framerate, and load times in the Nintendo Switch 2 edition of the game

title: Hades II - Nintendo Switch 2 (PRE-ORDER)
Description: RELEASE DATE: NOVEMBER 20, 2025 Battle beyond the Underworld using dark sorcery to take on the Titan of Time in this bewitching sequel to the award-winning rogue-like dungeon crawler. The first-ever sequel from Supergiant Games builds on the best aspects of the original god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler in an all-new, action-packed, endlessly replayable experience rooted in the Underworld of Greek myth and its deep connections to the dawn of witchcraft. BATTLE BEYOND THE UNDERWORLD As the immortal Princess of the Underworld, you'll explore a bigger, deeper mythic world, vanquishing the forces of the Titan of Time with the full might of Olympus behind you, in a sweeping story that continually unfolds through your every setback and accomplishment. MASTER WITCHCRAFT AND DARK SORCERY Infuse your legendary weapons of Night with ancient magick, so that none may stand in your way. Become stronger still with powerful Boons from more than a dozen Olympian gods, from Apollo to Zeus. There are nearly limitless ways to build your abilities. MINGLE WITH (MORE) GODS, GHOSTS, AND MONSTERS Meet a cast of dozens of fully-voiced, larger-than-life characters, including plenty of new faces and some old friends. Grow closer to them through a variety of new interactions, and experience countless unique story events based on how your journey unfolds. EVERY RUN IS ITS OWN ADVENTURE New locations, challenges, upgrade systems, and surprises await as you delve into the ever-shifting Underworld again and again. Reveal the mysteries of the Arcana Altar, tame witchy familiars, and gather reagents using Tools of the Unseen to get closer to your goal. THE PERKS OF IMMORTALITY Thanks to a variety of permanent upgrades and the return of God Mode, you don't have to be a god yourself to experience what Hades II has to offer. But if you happen to be one, you can brave escalating challenges for greater rewards, and prove just how divine you really are.

title: Hyrule Warriors Age of Imprisonment - Nintendo Switch 2 (PRE-ORDER) (FREE SHIPPING)
Description: RELEASE DATE: NOVEMBER 6, 2025 Battle hordes of enemies in the untold story of the Imprisoning War Fight the war for Ancient Hyrule! Step on to the battlefield as Princess Zelda, King Rauru, and other legendary heroes as you fight to reclaim your homeland-and live the story of Demon King Ganondorf’s invasion that was only briefly alluded to in The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom game. Fight alongside new and familiar heroes to defend Hyrule from the Demon King Princess Zelda is not alone in this war! Join Mineru, the Sages, and even some brand-new heroes in battles against Ganondorf’s forces. Combine powerful Zonai Devices with your heroes’ signature abilities to take down powerful bosses and their legions of minions. Team up with a friend in two-player local co-op via split screen or GameShare Join up with a friend for two-player local co-op, and you can spread out to cover more ground as the war unfolds-or stick together and combine your powers to smash the opposition. Play split-screen on a single system, or on two separate systems via GameShare-either way, only one person needs to have the game. Scan any The Legend of Zelda series amiibo figure to get in-game rewards including crafting materials and other items that you might find helpful in your quest to defeat the Demon King! Use save data from Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity or The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom to get additional weapons If you have save data from the Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity game on your system when you play, you’ll receive a High Guard’s Claymore. If you have save data from the Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom game, you receive a High Guard’s Sword. These weapons can be redeemed after returning to the Hyrule map upon completion of The Howling Tempest mission.

title: Super Mario Galaxy 1 + 2 - Nintendo Switch (PRE-ORDER) (FREE SHIPPING)
Description: RELEASE DATE: OCTOBER 2, 2025 Journey through space in two Super Mario adventures, now improved for the Nintendo Switch™ system!Travel the cosmos with Mario in these two classic games—now with enhanced resolution, improved UI, and additional content on Nintendo Switch!Use button, stick, and motion controls—adapted to the Joy-Con™ controllers from the original Wii™ versions—to jump, glide, swing, and more as you collect Power Stars and power-ups. Learn more about the Lumas from additional Storybook chapters, groove to a bit of additional music and give yourself additional Health and fall recovery with Assist Mode. The galaxy awaits!Save* on Super Mario Galaxy™ and Super Mario Galaxy™ 2 when you purchase the bundle!Save the galaxy from Bowser and his minions in the original planet-hopping adventureBowser has attacked the Star Festival, abducted Princess Peach, and put the whole galaxy in danger! Join up with Rosalina and the Lumas, protectors of the cosmos, to restore the Comet Observatory and rescue the princess in the Super Mario Galaxy™ game. Use power-ups like the Bee Mushroom to fly, the Boo Mushroom to float and move through certain types of barriers, and more on your journey to reclaim the Power Stars!Travel aboard Starship Mario to save the galaxy again…this time with Yoshi’s help!Bowser is at it again, but this time Mario has a little extra help in recovering the Power Stars. Join Lubba aboard Starship Mario for the duration of your journey, and team up with Yoshi to enhance your planet-hopping moves in the Super Mario Galaxy™. 2 game. With Yoshi by your side, you can jump higher and further—and you can even attack foes using his tongue! Yoshi has his own power-ups too, like the Dash Pepper and the Blimp Fruit, which allow him to sprint super quickly, float Mario high into the air, and more.Download the free update for improved visuals on the Nintendo Switch 2 systemEnhance your adventure even further with a free update to take advantage of the processing power of Nintendo Switch 2!• Journey through space in two classic adventures featuring Mario, now improved for the Nintendo Switch system• Travel the stars with enhanced resolution, improved UI, and additional content• Learn more about the Lumas from additional Storybook chapters, groove to a bit of additional music• Get additional Health and fall recovery in Assist Mode• Join Rosalina and the Lumas to restore the Comet Observatory and rescue Princess Peach in Super Mario Galaxy™.• Travel aboard Starship Mario and join up with Yoshi to save the cosmos again in Super Mario Galaxy™. 2• Download the free update for improved visuals on the Nintendo Switch 2 system

title: Tanuki Yukaku Playing Cards - Hanafuda Edition
Description: Tanuki Yukaku Playing Cards by Room One are inspired by Japanese tradition and the Hanafuda Edition features panoramic cards! The Court cards feature vibrant, detailed depictions of the Yukaku's wellers. Dive into the world of Tanuki courtesans, their captivating lives, and their mysterious charm as they unfold before your eyes.Panoramic Hanafuda Number Cards The Number Cards in our Hanafuda Edition offer a 4-piece panorama. When you put together 4 cards of the same number but from different suits, they form a beautifully detailed handscroll. But the experience doesn't stop there - immerse yourself in the traditional Japanese card game Koi Koi. Feel the charm and excitement of this classic game while connecting with Japanese culture. Features: Ume Matsuri Sliding Door Tuck Box Hot Foil Embossed Tuck Box Puzzle Playing Cards 55 Fully Customized Playing Cards Can Be Used as a Hanafuda Deck The 1st Deck of the 2nd Season of Room One Collection System

title: Tanuki Yukaku Playing Cards - Oiran-Dochu Edition
Description: Room One are inspired by the breathtaking beauty of blooming flowers. I Featuring a unique Ume Matsuri Tuck Box designed by Room One the tuck box has an elegant Japanese inspired door design adorned with delicate flowers that opens from both sides. Vibrant Tanuki Court Cards The Court cards feature vibrant, detailed depictions of the Yukaku's dwellers. Dive into the world of Tanuki courtesans, their captivating lives, and their mysterious charm as they unfold before your eyes. Makimono Number Cards The number cards in the Oiran-Dochu Edition form a beautiful scroll-like puzzle.Arrange each suit in order and watch as it transforms into an elegant makimono (handscroll), richly illustrated with charming Tanuki characters in the midst of a festive Oiran-Dochu parade. It's a delightful blend of storytelling, art, and play - all hidden within your deck. Features: Ume Matsuri Sliding Door Tuck Box Hot Foil Embossed Tuck Box Puzzle Playing Cards 55 Fully Customized Playing Cards The 1st Deck of the 2nd Season of Room One Collection System

title: Table Players Vol.26 Playing Cards
Description: If you are looking for playing cards with a nostalgic and vintage look then the Table Players Vol.26 Playing Cards are perfect for you! Produced by Kings Wild Project the No.13 Table Players Vol.26 Playing Cards feature a classic look with orange and white stripes on a semi borderless design. Each deck in the Table Players series showcases the elegant Kings Wild Standard Court cards, designed for smooth gameplay. The No.13 Table Players Vol.26 Playing Cards are crafted on premium Bicycle stock, offering a luxurious, silky-smooth air-cushioned texture. Elevate your collection with the refined style of the No.13 Table Players Vol.26 Playing Cards.

title: Ironsides Playing Cards - Table Players Vol.25
Description: The Ironsides Playing Cards from the Table Players Series by Kings Wild Project is one of our absolutes favorites. Designed by Jackson Robinson the No.13 Table Players Vol.25 Playing Cards features a classic look with well thought out design and color combination. Each Table Players deck features the beautiful Kings Wild Standard Court cards for easy table play. No.13 Table Players Vol.25 Playing Cards are printed on classic Bicycle stock with a silky smooth air-cushioned finish.

title: Cavett Playing Cards by Kings Wild Project
Description: Cavett represents the fourth installment in the six-volume Table Players subscription collection. The Cavett deck draws inspiration from early 20th-century vintage tobacco and cigarette packaging, consistent with the series’ theme. The letter-pressed tuck case, accented with subtle red foiling and a deep, refined color scheme, enhances the deck’s sophisticated and minimalist artwork.Cards printed by United States Playing Card CompanyTuck case printed and pressed by Clove St. Press

title: Bicycle Toy Story Playing Cards
Description: Bicycle Toy Story Playing Cards are inspired by Disney and printed by the United States Playing Cards Company. These Disney Pixar Playing Cards feature a fully custom card back designed inspired by Andy's quilt. The court cards feature many of your favorite Toy Story characters! A toybox full of friends await you with Disney Pixar Toy Story Inspired Playing Cards by Bicycle!

title: Bicycle Kuromi Playing Cards
Description: Bicycle Kuromi Playing Cards by USPCC will bring an adorable but rebellious flair to your next playing card game! Bursting with neon pink and purple against bold black backgrounds, this deck flaunts Kuromi's flashy style as she rocks her iconic hat.

title: Bicycle Hello Kitty Playing Cards
Description: If you are looking for the cutest pink playing cards then the Bicycle Hello Kitty Playing Cards by USPCC is the one for you!These pink Bicycle Hello Kitty Black and Pink Playing Cards will fill your next round of cards with adorable charm.

title: Bicycle Guns & Roses Playing Cards
Description: Bicycle Guns N’ Roses Playing Cards feature artwork inspired by the legendary Appetite for Destruction album cover. The tuck box is elegantly enhanced with gold foil accents, offering a striking and luxurious feel. Each shuffle invites the spirit of Paradise City into your game. Bicycle Guns & Roses Playing Cards by USPCC are officially licensed making them the perfect gift for fans!

title: Bicycle Wizard of Oz Playing Cards
Description: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz Playing Cards by Bicycle Cards celebrates 125 years of the worlds most beloved children's book by L. Frank Baum. With these Bicycle Wizard of Oz Playing Cards you will elevate your game nights out of Kansas with your favorite characters. You will note that on the court cards you will see Dorothy, Scarecrow, Tinman, the Cowardly Lion. These Bicycle Cards come in a gold-foiled tuck case shining as bright as the Emerald City, you may never want to go back home.

title: Bicycle Tokyo Revengers Playing Cards
Description: Bicycle Tokyo Revengers Playing Cards by USPCC are now available for sale. These Tokyo Revengers Playing Cards feature full size character art, and custom card back design making it the perfect for fans of the popular Anime series. Explore all your favorite Bicycle Cards HERE

title: Bicycle Stargazer 203 Playing Cards
Description: The Bicycle Stargazer collection by USPCC remains a highly sought-after series, with the Bicycle Stargazer 203 showcasing stunning images captured by the Hubble Telescope. Gaze into the awe-inspiring Jet in Carina Nebula on every card back with photography captured by the Hubble Telescope on April 13, 2022. With the constellation-inspired court card designs, and a green-foil inlayed tuck, you'll be dealing out a universe of entertainment.

title: Bicycle Disney Classic Goofy Inspired Playing Cards
Description: Bicycle Disney Classic Goofy Inspired Playing Cards by USPCC celebrate the timeless charm of Disney's most lovable goofball! Disney Classic Goofy Inspired Playing Cards by Bicycle capture the endearing clumsiness and warm-hearted fun of Goofy. With custom card backs and a spot varnished tuck case, this deck will have you saying "gawrsh!" with every hand drawn!

title: Bicycle Disney Moana Playing Cards
Description: Bicycle Disney Moana Playing Cards are especially designed to appeal to fans and children featuring all your favorite characters!

title: Bicycle Mickey and Friends Playing Cards
Description: Bicycle Mickey and Friends Playing Cards are adorable and the perfect deck of cards for children and grown ups alike! With these Bicycle Playing Cards you will not only find Mickey Mouse but all his friends on the cards such as Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, Daisy Duck, Goofy and Pluto!

title: Bicycle AC/DC Playing Cards
Description: The Bicycle AC/DC Playing Cards by USPCC feature all the legends from world famous AC DC rock band.Experience the thrill of rock and roll with the latest bicycle playing cards showcasing Angus Young and his legendary guitar. The tuck case, adorned with striking red foil, electrifies each deal, setting the stage for a game ready to hit the Highway to Hell.

title: Bicycle 140th Anniversary Playing Cards
Description: The world's famous and most prestigious playing cards company turns 140! The United States Playing Card Company proudly introduces the Bicycle 140th Anniversary Playing Cards, honoring a rich legacy by merging timeless design with contemporary craftsmanship. To celebrate their heritage USPCC blended classic style with modern technology. Beautiful Gold Metalluxe glimmers on both the tuck and the card backs, while the historic card faces evoke a nostalgic blast from the past.

title: Captain America Playing Cards
Description: Captain America Playing Cards by theory11 are the latest premium quality playing cards added to their Marvel Playing Cards line up. Featuring patriotic design the tuck box has Captain America's vibrant blue, red, and silver in foil that perfectly captures the essence of Captain America's iconic suit.The playing cards feature your favorite characters from the Marvel series such as Winter Soldier, Peggy Carter, Red Hulk, Baron Helmut Zemo, and more!

title: THE BEETLE BACKS PLAYING CARDS
Description: These Prestige Edition Beetle Backs Playing Cards by the GentleMan Wake are imited to 5000 pieces and were designed by Widakk Design. The Beetle Backs Prestige Edition features a gorgeously embossed tuck case with 3 foil layers printed on the highest quality 310 gsm cardstock. The cards within include a classic mirrored back design adorned in beautiful gold cold foil and metallic ink, contrasting with a deep black background. The faces of the cards are also printed with gold cold foil. A true collector's item that will amaze at the card table or on the shelf. A custom numbered seal will adorn the bottom of the tuck.

title: The Beetle Backs Cobalt Edition Playing Cards
Description: The Beetle Backs Cobalt Edition Playing Cards by TGW feature metallic pantone inks on the backs and faces. The cards within include a classic mirrored back design rendered in vibrant and eye-catching color that makes them perfect for gameplay, magic, or cardistry.

title: Beetle Backs Playing Cards - Crimson Edition
Description: The Beetle Backs Playing Cards by The Gentleman Wake were designed by Widakk Design and are the perfect cards for collectors, players and magic enthusiasts everywhere. .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } The Crimson Beetle Backs are housed in a gorgeously embossed tuck cases with 3 foil layers printed on the highest quality 310 gsm cardstock. The cards within include a classic mirrored back design rendered in vibrant and eye catching color that makes them perfect for gameplay, magic, or cardistry. Metallic Pantone inks are featured on the backs and faces of Crimson Edition.

title: Mantis Playing Cards
Description: The Mantis playing cards are marked playing cards that were created for magic and have a vintage inspired design with a touch of modern mantis twist. Being fully marked deck the cleverly designed markings let you identify the value of any card with a quick glance at its back. This feature is well-hidden, but once you find it, it will always be there, allowing you to perform amazing magic tricks using the one-way principle.

title: Atlantis Artist Boxset Playing Cards
Description: The luxurious Atlantis Artist Boxset Playing Cards by Ark Playing Cards! The Atlantis Artist Boxset Playing Cards arrive in an elegantly engineered canopy-style gift box featuring a secure closure with a precision snap-top mechanism. Its thoughtfully designed lower compartment accommodates both the deck and album, with a meticulously crafted central recess that displays the cards in horizontal formation. The unveiling process evokes the mystical emergence of Atlantis ascending from oceanic depths—a sophisticated and ethereal experience that captivates the imagination. Limited to 999 boxsets each set comes with a special holographic deck! Themed on the Legend of Atlantis Accordion creative ARK Case Ingenious card puzzle design Holographic Wave HOLO process

title: Atlantis Playing Cards
Description: Discover the enigmatic legend of Atlantis through this exquisitely crafted deck. Inspired by the fabled underwater civilization, each card features meticulously hand-drawn illustrations depicting the opulent palace that vanished beneath the waves. .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } The innovative folding box design invites exploration, revealing the submerged grandeur step by step. Marvel at the interlocking Joker cards portraying the guardian dragon of Atlantis, and admire the ornate cover resembling Poseidon's jewel-encrusted palace doors. This deck transforms the poignant myth of a lost paradise into a sophisticated artistic experience. The Standard Edition of the Atlantis Playing Cards are limited to 3333 with unique serial numbers.

title: Shanhai - Red Artist Boxset
Description: Limited to 999 units, the exquisite Red Shanhai Artist Box Set from Ark Playing Cards is a quintessential acquisition for any collector. Ark is known to create amazing art pieces and each Boxsets features two distinctive decks limited to 999 with matching serial numbers. My personal favorite deck from the ShanHai Series by Ark is the holographic deck which comes in this Red Artist Boxset.

title: Matchbox Label Art Playing Cards
Description: If you love the art style depicted on vintage matchboxes then the Striking Collection Matchbox Label Art playing cards are the perfect deck for you. Designed by Chet Phillips this deck includes 54 unique individual illustrations printed on high quality, plastic coated standard poker sized cards. Suits represent a variety of characters from pop culture, books, TV and movies emulating vintage matchbox label art. Each deck is sealed in cellophane wrapping and presented in a colorful heavy card stock custom box.

title: Cats Playing Cards
Description: If you love Cats and are looking for a deck of cards with adorable and unique cat designs then the Cat's Meow deck is the best deck for you! Designed by Chet Philips Cat's Meow playing cards is a high quality plastic coated poker sized deck. The Deck showcases 58 individual cat portraits that includes 4 suits, 2 jokers and 4 wild cards and custom card back.

title: Dogs Playing Cards
Description: With these unique dog themed playing cards by Chet Philips you can indulge in your love for all things canine. The Dogs: A Fetching Deck is our pick for those looking to celebrate the love they have for mans best friend! With fully custom poker sized cards each suit represents a variety of dogs as famous authors, artists, musicians and film stars. 52 individual portraits, 2 jokers and 4 suit cards with a custom back. Each pack is boxed with cards cello wrapped, ready for your first dog-themed poker night.

title: 1001 Nights Playing Cards 3D Aurora Signature Edition
Description: Encased in Room One's Signature Accordion 3D Tuck Box, behold King Shahryar and Scheherazade in it, each layered fold capturing their nightly dance of stories and suspense. Intricate embossing and hot foiling bring them to life, setting the stage for 55 custom cards steeped in the magic of the Arabian nights. .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } Features: - Silver Hot Foiling Tuck Box ⁠- Room One Cards' Accordion Tuck Box - Silver Cold Foil Playing Cards⁠- Pattern Gilded Edges - 55 Fully Customized Playing Cards The 1001 Nights Playing Cards invite you to step into a realm where the flicker of a lantern reveals boundless horizons, and where the art of storytelling transcends time and mortality.

title: 1001 Nights Playing Cards Aurora Qubba Edition
Description: Experience the enchantment of the 1001 Nights with a tuck box that evokes the grandeur of moonlit courtyards and whispered tales. title: The Beatles Special Edition Playing Cards
Description: BeatlesPlaying Cards by Theory 11 are now available in a brand new black and white color edition. Printed with glistening gold foil on each card these Special Edition playing cards are the most elegant and eye-catching editions of The Beatles Playing Cards. Dressed in the style of Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club Band, the boxes feature multi-level embossing and striking gold foil - with gold foil accents on the backs of each card inside.

title: Onda Playing Cards - Yellow
Description: The Onda Playing Cards by Jocu Playing Cards are designed by Alessandra Gagliano and are inspired by the mysteries of the undersea universe. Featuring unique artwork and Tropical Yellow color scheme the Yellow Onda deck of cards has new characters and brand-new artwork.

title: False Idols Playing Cards - Totem
Description: The Totem Edition of the False Idols Playing Cards by Joker and the Thief is the more luxurious variant in the False Idols series based on Mayan Legends. Impersonating the ancient gods of past civilizations this 100% custom deck of playing cards features unique back designs, aces, court cards, and jokers. Packaged in an elegant tuck box adorned with foil stamping and embossing for a stunning, textured feel.

title: False Idols Playing Cards
Description: False Idols Playing Cards by Joker and the Thief are inspired by the myth and mysteries that surround the Mayan world. The False Idols series boasts fully custom playing cards with a distinctive back design, individualized aces, court cards, and jokers. Packaged in a spectacular tuck box complete with foil stamping and embossing - creating a gorgeous, raised texture you can feel.

title: Draconian Crimson Playing Cards
Description: The Draconian Crimson Playing Cards are the latest playing cards by Midnight Cards the creators of Draconian Wildfire Printed by Legends Playing Cards the Draconian Crimson cards are printed on their Holographic Foil! The Draconian Crimson Back Card features a borderless optical illusion design formed from Dragon Scales. The Tuck Box highlights a closeup of the hero dragon. The dragon’s face fills most of the front of the Tuck and wraps around to the side and back of the Tuck. The Red and Gold Foils are printed on a premium Black Matte paper stock. The Draconian Crimson Deck is perfect for any Collector, Card Player, Magician, Flourisher or fan of Dragons!

title: Cyclopeans Cyrconium Playing Cards
Description: Cyclopeans Cyrconium by Stockholm 17 are one of the most unique playing cards ever produced. Forged in the crucible of myth, the legendary Cyrconium is no ordinary metal—it is the mystical, indestructible alloy crafted by the Cyclopean Alchemists, the divine smiths of the gods. A fusion of Chromium (Cr), Cobalt (Co), and Nickel (Ni), this arcane element embodies the raw power and mastery of an ancient civilization. Specifications: 56 poker-size cards Custom court cards and jokers Tuckbox with foil and embossing, printed by Gamblers Warehouse stamp-like custom paper seal Deck wrapped cellophane Cards printed by USPCC Made in the USA

title: ARW V4 Playing Cards
Description: ARW V4 Playing Cards by Luke Wadey is the latest deck of cards designed for cardistry Embrace the boldness of the 2-way design which features intricate paint swirls yet remains symmetrical. The iconic ARW arrows shine in white amidst a dynamic blend of neon yellow and green inks, creating a striking contrast against the dark black backdrop. An alluring and captivating deck for cardistry, this fully customized design includes extra cards that extend the narrative of the ARW collection, featuring improved face cards suitable for both traditional gameplay and contemporary magic. 4th deck in ARW series Limited to 800 decks Printing with neon yellow and green inks Manufactured by highly recommended WJPC Linen finished 300gsm German Black Core Paper 56 fully custom cards including 4 additional card 2-way back, fully custom deck and tuck

title: Strange Curiosities Playing Cards
Description: Strange Curiosities Playing Cards are designed by Waone Interesni Kazki a world renowned artist who has collaborated with the top brands such as Hermes and has sold paintings at Christie's. .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } Do not wait as this deck will be sold out quickly as you get to own your own private art gallery that features unique and beautiful illustrations of Interesni Kazki's curious creatures. A private art gallery and museum in a deck of cards the gorgeous tuck case of the Strange Curiosities deck is printed by Clove St Press. Strange Curiosities playing cards were produced in collaboration with December Boys and are printed by the United States Playing Card Company on premium-quality crushed stock and off-white paper

title: Lance Mountain Skating Skeletons Playing Cards
Description: The Lance Mountain Skating Skeletons Playing Cards features hand drawn illustrations by one of the most iconic skateboarding legends. Lance drew these skeletal renditions of iconic skateboard photos of himself with rapidograph pens. Each tuck box is printed on textured paper to replicate a vintage British Motorcycle booklet that Lance has in his archives. Each court card features a totally unique illustration. All the suits are hand created and aged accordingly. Produced by Fulton's Playing Cards. Printed on premium cardistry playing card stock in China.

title: Don’t Mess With Texas Playing Cards
Description: Don’t Mess With Texas Playing Cards by Fultons Playing Cards are officially licensed playing cards. The Don't Mess with Texas was a movement put in place by TX Department of Transportation to encourage those in the Lone Star State to "Keep Texas Beautiful." Featuring an iconic back design that celebrates this iconic ad campaign and slogan. Designed and produced in house by Fulton's Playing Cards. Packaged in an embossed tuck case that houses 56 "Texas Hold 'Em Sized Playing Cards." Printed in China on premium cardistry "thin stock" card material.

title: Fox's Wedding Playing Cards Shinto Edition - Vanishing Box
Description: The Fox's Wedding RedShinto Edition by Room One Playing Cards features a unique one of a kind vanishing tuck box. The Vanishing Tuck Box feature of Shinto edtion enhances magical allure of these cards because if the box is opened normally, it appears empty. Discover the hidden secret and unlock the mystery to reveal the deck within along with its unique puzzle themed design. .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; }

title: Fox's Wedding Playing Cards - SunShower Edition
Description: The Fox's Wedding Red SunShower Edition by Room One Playing Cards features a unique puzzle themed design. Inspired by the mystical allure of foxes and the captivating folklore surrounding them these cards are housed in a "Kitsuneveil" Case adorned with golden motifs, features delicate openings that reveal tantalizing glimpses of the captivating tuck box within. .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } Each suit within the deck represents a distinct season, capturing the essence of nature's transformation throughout the year. The integration of the four seasons not only adds depth and symbolism to the deck but also serves as a reminder of the perpetual cycles of life and nature.

title: Black Tortoise Black Gold Box Set
Description: The Black Tortoise Playing Cards by Ark Playing Cards are available in an upgraded Black Gold Box Set which are limited to 500 sets only! The decks and cards come in gold and silver color housed in black box, giving the set a striking visual effect when the box is opened!The metallic luster extends to the corners and edges of the cards, portraying luxurious details that represent the bold and unconstrained pinnacle of creativity. Limited to 500 with unique serial numbers Two decks gold & silver Full gold and silver foil playing cards Paper-carved 3D tuck box Self-elevating display box

title: Black Stellar Dread Playing Cards - AI Special Edition

title: Cranberry Orange Tea
Description: cran’t beat it Bold, juicy & sweet, this tea will have you puckering up! With tart cranberry and zesty orange, it’s a fruity explosion with a base of fresh oolong to tie it all together. Enjoy it hot, iced or even shaken (but not stirred) for a refreshing and party-worthy burst of flavour. Bonus: it looks as good as it tastes, with a ruby red colour that’s perfect for a punch bowl!

title: Teal Mini Tumbler
Description: Ever wish your favourite tumbler was even cuter? Got you covered with our Teal Mini Tumbler. It comes with a reusable Tritan™ straw, straw topper and cleaning brush—plus it’s made of double-walled stainless steel to keep your hot tea toasty and your iced tea fresh. With a straw-friendly, BPA-free lid that prevents splashbacks and a shape that was made to fit in your car’s cupholders, it’s the coolest way to hit the road in style. Care Instructions:This Mini Tumbler requires a little TEA-L-C, too. Be sure to handwash only; it's not dishwasher or microwave safe. Don’t scrub or soak.

title: Holiday Classics Mini Sachet Tea Chest
Description: Ah, the magic of classics! From festive candy canes to warming cinnamon and upbeat beetroot, you’re in for one tasty ride with our Holiday Classic Mini Sachet Tea Chest packed. Four sachets each, 16 sachets total.

title: All the Best Sachet Tea Chest
Description: What's in store for your tea-drinking routine? All the best! This Sachet Tea Chest features all organic, all fair trade and all top-rated sachets that are ready to steep, plastic-free, plant-based and biodegradable. From taking a mindful moment for yourself to soothing a stubborn cold and cozying up with a late-night cuppa, this one's got it all. Here's to sipping only the best!

title: Prancer’s Punch Tea
Description: santa’s coziest reindeer This is Prancer’s moment. Taste why this blend sleighs with its ensemble of baked apple and raisin, accompanied by natural flavours of warm cinnamon, maple and molasses. Enjoy this cozy treat with a bit of holiday magic. What makes it great: This caffeine-free tea is the ideal post-dinner dessert. High in holiday cheer, low on late-night jitters. Inspired by European style holiday fruitcakes, minus the stuffy candied fruit, we wanted to give a playful edge to our fan fave Sleigh Ride. Strong, alluring holiday aromas appear as this blend is steeping. Fill the room with warm scents for some extra cheer.

title: Manoomin Maple Tea Iconic Tin
Description: together we sipNestled in the wilderness and shallow waterways of Northern Canada is where manoomin (meaning wild rice in Ojibwe) is hand-harvested. In homage to this ancient Indigenous tradition, DAVIDsTEA x Tea Horse come together to bring you Manoomin Maple—a cozy blend of roasted manoomin, light maple and vanilla. Founded in 2017, Tea Horse is a woman-led Indigenous artisanal tea company located on the traditional territory of the Anishinaabe Peoples.What makes it great: This tea gives back! 10% of proceeds will go towards the Native Women's Association of Canada to support their mission of advocating for women, girls, 2SLGBTQQIA+ people and the families of many Indigenous nations. This limited-edition tin features the breathtaking work of Emily Kewageshig, an Anishnaabe artist and visual storyteller from Saugeen First Nation No. 29. We first launched Manoomin Maple in 2022, which was the very first time we developed a tea blend in partnership with another tea company.

title: Manoomin Apple Pie Tea Iconic Tin
Description: taste the harvest DAVIDsTEA x Tea Horse come together again to create Manoomin Apple Pie Tea! This of-the-earth inspired blend is made with toasted manoomin (meaning wild rice in Ojibwe) that’s harvested in the lakes of Northern Canada. And to give it that home-baked apple pie taste, we added sweet apple pieces, cozy cinnamon and warming nutmeg—so scrumptious! Packed in a limited-edition tin by Anishinaabe artist Emily Kewageshig, this tea gives back 10% of proceeds to the Native Women’s Association of Canada. What makes it great: Developed in partnership with Indigenous woman-owned company Tea Horse—a second-time tea collaboration! 10% of proceeds will go the Native Women’s Association of Canada to support their mission of advocating for women, girls, 2SLGBTQQIA+ people and the families of many Indigenous nations. Packed in a limited-edition tin, with exclusive artwork by Emily Kewageshig, an Anishinaabe woodland artist and visual storyteller from Saugeen First Nation No. 29.

title: Peach Passionfruit Cold Brew Tea Pack of 10 Sachets
Description: passionate about summerWe’re passionate about the ‘P’s of summer: Peach, Passion fruit & Pool Parties. Oh would you look at that, we made our perfect summer blend! Kick your pool parties up a notch with Peach Passionfruit Cold Brew Tea, a caffeine-free cold brew bursting with juicy peach nectar and tropical passion fruit. Sip it all day with the kids and well into the evening with friends, it’s a blend the whole family can enjoy! Steep in cold water for 10+ minutes and enjoy our juiciest summer blend with no bitterness and no sticky mess to clean up.What makes it great Contains 10 ready-to-steep sachets—the easiest & quickest way to make a cup of tea when you’re in a hurry. Plus, our sachets are plant-based and biodegradable, for a more sustainable steeping experience.

title: Organic David's Breakfast Blend Loose Leaf Tea Bag 250 g
Description: Good morning What if your morning had a bold beginning? We’ve carefully chosen our favourite organic Assam and Ceylon black teas to find the perfect balance of full-bodied flavours and subtle sweetness. It’s the kind of tea that puts you in a great mood, inspires harmonious relationships and makes you outrageously productive. We suggest it with a splash of milk. Is there a better way to start your day?

title: S’mores Chai
Description: gimme s'more Gooey toasted marshmallows, graham crackers, dark chocolate – it’s no wonder we live for s’mores. Our tempting pu’erh tea adds an extra dash of cinnamon to the campfire classic, so it’s rich, warming and packed with fudgy goodness. Brew it as a frothy tea latte for the ultimate cold-weather indulgence. Don’t worry – there’s s’more where that came from.

title: S'mores Chai Loose Leaf Tea Bag 250 g
Description: gimme s'more Gooey toasted marshmallows, graham crackers, dark chocolate – it’s no wonder we live for s’mores. Our tempting pu’erh tea adds an extra dash of cinnamon to the campfire classic, so it’s rich, warming and packed with fudgy goodness. Brew it as a frothy tea latte for the ultimate cold-weather indulgence. Don’t worry – there’s s’more where that came from. What makes it great S’mores are a popular campfire dessert made by squishing a toasted marshmallow and piece of chocolate between two graham crackers. Whip it up as a latte and top with fluffy marshmallows for a real treat.

title: Buddha's Blend Loose Leaf Tea Bag 100 g
Description: heaven can't wait We’re pretty sure we found the key to achieving nirvana, and it all starts with this fresh, delicate mix of white and green tea. What makes it so heavenly? We sprinkled in some jasmine pearls for their sweet floral perfume. Then we added the unexpected fruity aroma of white hibiscus blossoms. Just sit back, relax and take a sip. Pure bliss. What makes it great You can't get a tea more zen than this! It's our twist on a classic jasmine tea, with a hint of peach and beautiful jasmine pearls. This tea is easy to oversteep… make sure you keep the steep time short. Done right, it’s pure heaven.

title: Genmaicha Tea Loose Leaf Tea Bag 250 g
Description: simple ingredients, big comfort Our Genmaicha tea is a cozy blend of premium sencha green tea with toasted & popped rice. This tradition of adding rice to green tea dates back centuries; as the colder months started to settle in, rice was added to the last tea harvest in fall to ensure there was enough to sip all winter. The warm character of toasted rice brings a subtle nutty sweetness to your cup, balancing perfectly with the fresh vegetal flavour of sencha. What makes it great: Smooth premium blend of sencha green tea comes from Miyazaki and Kagoshima, Japan. Use hotter temperature water to highlight the toasty rice flavour or lower temperature water to focus on the vegetal sencha tea base. ICDYK Genmaicha directly translates to “brown rice tea”—how fitting!

title: Genmaicha Tea
Description: simple ingredients, big comfort Our Genmaicha tea is a cozy blend of premium sencha green tea with toasted & popped rice. This tradition of adding rice to green tea dates back centuries; as the colder months started to settle in, rice was added to the last tea harvest in fall to ensure there was enough to sip all winter. The warm character of toasted rice brings a subtle nutty sweetness to your cup, balancing perfectly with the fresh vegetal flavour of sencha.

title: Nutcracker Brittle Tea
Description: nut so traditional What makes Nutcracker Brittle so deliciously decadent? Well... this herbal tea is sweet & nutty, but not for the reasons you’d expect. But there’s no need to break out your nutcracker to crack this secret recipe wide open... we’ve swapped the peanuts for rich maple syrup and gently toasted walnuts. Serve it at your next holiday get-together for an instant festive classic your guests will go nuts over! What makes it great: So decadently delicious! Think of it as salted maple blondie meets nutty brittle. Featuring not one, but two types of nuts: hazelnut and walnut. If you love Caramel Shortbread, Forever Nuts or Maple Syrup Oolong, you’ll want to try this one!

title: Pumpkin Chai
Description: celebrate the harvest The forever fall must-have. Pumpkin Chai is the perfect way to kick off the season. It’s got all the warmth of cinnamon and cloves, plus the sweetness of caramel and pumpkin candy. For a truly unforgettable pumpkin chai latte experience, top it up with steamed milk and stir in a spoonful of brown sugar.

title: 24 Days of Tea Workshop Advent Calendar
Description: The DAVIDsTEA holiday workshop is open! We blended away to deliver you another iconic 24 Days of Tea Advent Calendar packed with 24 loose leaf teas & infusions. Counting down to the big day with chocolate? Not you. Behind each drawer, you’ll find a festive tea treat just waiting to be steeped! Loved last year's selection? For this Advent, we brought back the beloved blends you couldn't get enough of—freshly packed in a new festive look. If you were a fan of teas like Noggy & Nice, Snowball Fight and After Dinner Mint, this is the Advent for you. Two 8 oz servings each, 48 servings total.

title: Feel Good Teas Variety Bag of 20 Sachets
Description: Need a little tea to pick you up when you're not feeling your best? Our Feel Good Teas Variety Bag of 20 Sachets has what you need. We grabbed our most-loved lemon & orange detox blends, an immunity-loving elixir, an ultra hydrating rooibos and a natural sleep-supporting chamomile tea so you can sip on cloud 9. Plus, they're all individually wrapped for easy sipping! Five teas, four sachets each. Contains 20 ready-to-steep sachets—the easiest & quickest way to make a cup of tea when you’re in a hurry. Plus, our sachets are plastic-free, plant-based and biodegradable, for a more sustainable steeping experience.

title: Après-Ski Teas Sachet Variety Bag of 20 Sachets
Description: Who's up for some cozy campfire classics? Obviously everyone! Grab your blanket, your favourite mug and our AprèsSki Tea Sachets Variety Bag. It's got 20 sachets of sweet, cozy & cuddly blends you and your loved ones will love snuggling up with. Plus, they're individually wrapped for easy sipping! Five teas, four sachets each. Contains 20 ready-to-steep sachets—the easiest & quickest way to make a cup of tea when you’re in a hurry. Plus, our sachets are plastic-free, plant-based and biodegradable, for a more sustainable steeping experience.

Description: Whisk up some holiday spirit with our Season’s Best Matcha 4 Tea Sampler—you can count on these festive flavoured matchas to fill your cup with joy. Sourced from Japan, these powdered green teas are authentically delicious. Contains two servings of each, 8 servings total.

title: Santa's Secret Tea
Description: need a little helper? Ever wonder how Santa manages to deliver all those presents in just one night? He uses our Santa's Secret tea, a special combination of Chinese black tea, peppermint leaves and spices—all sprinkled with real little candy canes. It’s both energizing & remarkably soothing. All Santa needs is one cup and his motto changes from “ho ho ho” to “go go go.”

title: Santa's Secret Loose Leaf Tea 250 g Bag
Description: need a little helper? Ever wonder how Santa manages to deliver all those presents in just one night? title: Silent Night Tea
Description: sleep in heavenly tea All is calm, all is bright and all is slipping away into heavenly sleep. Our Silent Night tea is a soothing blend that wraps you in a light blanket of orange, cinnamon, and clove while the valerian root helps you ease into slumber with its relaxing properties. Turn off the lights and let a silent night take over. What makes it great: Valerian root is a natural relaxant that helps you unwind and ease into sleep. The light blend of orange and spices lulls you into a meditative rest while filling the room with holiday aromas. Caffeine-free, soothing and hydrating, Silent Night is the perfect way to take the stress out of the holiday season.

title: Sleigh Ride Tea
Description: giddy-up The ultimate holiday punch. With cinnamon, apples, almonds, hibiscus and popped rice, this sweet, tart & lightly spiced caffeine-free herbal tea is as nice & rosy as a caroler’s cheeks. Feeling the chill? Add a splash of brandy for a drink that’ll warm you from the inside out. It’s the perfect blend to snuggle up with while watching the snow fall.

title: Organic Candy Cane Matcha
Description: candy cane lane With Organic Candy Cane Matcha's blend of energizing finely ground green tea and cane sugar, it's refreshingly creamy & sweet, with a peppermint finish cooler than the North Pole. Sip it straight-up or as a holiday green tea latte topped with whipped cream and crushed candy cane pieces.

title: Organic Candy Cane Matcha Tea Printed Tin
Description: candy cane lane With Organic Candy Cane Matcha's blend of energizing finely ground green tea and cane sugar, it's refreshingly creamy & sweet, with a peppermint finish cooler than the North Pole. title: Candy Cane Crush Tea Pack of 15 Sachets
Description: your winter crush A minty wonderland in a cup. Rich & decadent, Candy Cane Crush is a peppermint black tea strewn with creamy white chocolate drops, crushed candy cane pieces and tons of cute little snowflake sprinkles. Perfectly sweetened with an icy-cool finish, it’s the ultimate winter indulgence. Add it to your next mug of holiday eggnog for a festive twist.

title: Jack Frosted Mocha Tea Pack of 15 Sachets
Description: love at frost sight Winter winds nipping at your nose? Trade the frosty weather for a festive mug of Jack Frosted Mocha instead. It’s got bold, full-bodied pu’erh tea, rich coffee bean and creamy milk chocolate topped off with a kiss of cooling peppermint from Jack Frost himself. Go on and brew a mug, it’ll mocha your day! What Makes It Great: With full-bodied pu’erh tea and bold black tea, for the perfect balance of sweet & earthy notes. Blended with real mint chocolate chips, coffee bean and chocolate curls. Sooo yummy and nice to look at! Try it as a latte with a shot of espresso, Baileys or peppermint schnaps!

title: Organic Mumbai Masala Tea
Description: mighty masala Soothe your soul with the bold & aromatic flavour of Organic Mumbai Masala. Inspired by the rich chai sold on the streets of India, it blends warming cinnamon, clove and cardamom—plus a zing of ginger. Our slight twist on the classic? A base of both earthy pu’erh and Indian black tea make it perfect for a rich & full-bodied latte. Give it a chai!

title: Organic Candy Cane Matcha
Description: candy cane lane With Organic Candy Cane Matcha's blend of energizing finely ground green tea and cane sugar, it's refreshingly creamy & sweet, with a peppermint finish cooler than the North Pole. title: Ruby Red Double Walled Glass Nordic Mug
Description: Sip your favourite blends in our iconic DAVIDsTEA mug and prepare to love them even more—now in a ruby red colour. With a glass lid that doubles as a saucer, it's the tea mug you've always dreamed of. Plus it comes with our Perfect Infuser for the ultimate teatime duo. Six 250ml (8oz) servings each, 48 servings total.

title: Supreme Hojicha Powder
Description: roasted to perfection Meet matcha’s cozy cousin, Supreme Hojicha Powder. This roasted Japanese green tea comes in micro-ground powder form for a super-smooth brew with a rich & nutty flavour. Naturally lower in caffeine, it’s the ideal go-to for afternoons or evenings when you want to skip the second (or third—we don’t judge) cup of matcha or coffee. Enjoy it hot or iced. Bonus, it also makes a delicious latte.

title: 24 Days of Tea Advent Calendar
Description: Make your holiday countdown more delicious with this 24 Days of Tea Advent Calendar. Ranging from fruity herbal tea to rich, aromatic chai and everything in between, this handpicked selection of blends is guaranteed to fill your cup with cheer and warm you up on a chilly day. 24 tins of loose leaf teas and infusions. Four 250ml (8oz) servings each, 96 servings total.

title: Hazelnut Chocolate Tea
Description: nuts about it Drum roll…. To say we’re excited about this new tea would be an understatement. A labour of love spanning over six years, Hazelnut Chocolate is the result of unflappable resolve to nail down this flavour. Think rich fudgy cacao meets toasted hazelnut warmth in a smooth & decadent pu’erh—and it tastes even more amazing as a latte. What makes it great This hazelnut chocolate-y tea is the culmination of 6 years of trial & error. Pro tip: try it as a tea latte to bring out the chocolate flavour! The hazelnut spread we all know & love was inspired by Gianduja, a sweet chocolate hazelnut candy originally from Italy.

title: Fruity Mix Variety Bag of 20 Sachets
Description: When you want a li'l bit of everything, our Fruity Mix Variety Bag of 20 Sachets has your back. From juicy pomegranate to zesty lemon and sweet strawberry, we packed five of our freshest & fruitiest teas you love to sip. And they're all individually wrapped for you to sip and enjoy any day, all day. Contains 20 ready-to-steep sachets—the easiest & quickest way to make a cup of tea when you’re in a hurry. Plus, our sachets are plastic-free, plant-based and biodegradable, for a more sustainable steeping experience. Five teas, four sachets each.

title: Earl Grey Variety Box of 12 Sachets
Description: There’s nothing like a classic earl grey tea... except maybe the subtle twists that kick it up a notch with hints of complementary flavours like vanilla. Whether you’re an earl grey purist or you like to shake things up a little, this Earl Grey Variety Box of 12 Sachets has something for everyone.

title: Organic Chai to Unwind Tea
Description: do not disturb Breathe in, breathe out… this is your sign to slow down and relax. Calm your mind and body with stress-melting reishi mushroom and pure white tea. Inspired by Ayurveda, Chai to Unwind is packed with warm and grounding spices like ginger and turmeric for the ultimate soothing cuppa that releases tension and quiets the mind. Sip it when life’s a lot. What makes it great-Heavily inspired by Ayurveda—a holistic wellness practice rooted in India that focuses on balance and harmony within the body and mind. -Reishi mushroom helps you unwind & relax—perfect for your quiet time.-Brings instant warmth to your heart and soul with spicy ginger and earthy turmeric.

title: Caffeine-free Iced Tea Bundle
Description: Let us make your life easier — five fruity flavours for five days of the week. Mondays are for tart raspberry with a hint of creamy yogurt. Wednesdays are for vibrant pink lemonade. Citrusy orange with a sunny dose of Vitamin C for Fridays. Includes: 5x 50g of loose leaf infusions.

title: Scaredy Cat Nordic Mug
Description: Calling all scaredy cats... Remember mood rings? We do too—which is why we created this eerie Halloween-inspired colour changing tea mug. Our ceramic Nordic Mug is clean, modern and sturdy. It also holds a lot of tea, and we mean a lot. With a stainless steel infuser and a lid that doubles as a saucer, it's the cup you've always wanted. So how does it work? Pour in hot tea and watch for a wicked surprise. Like you needed another excuse to refill your cup... Comes in a giftable illustrated box. Care Instructions:This Nordic Mug requires a little TEA-L-C. Be sure to handwash only; it's not dishwasher or microwave safe. Don’t scrub or soak.

title: Fruity Tea Bundle
Description: Fruit lovers rejoice! Our Fruity Tea Bundle is packed with six bright & juicy blends. From ripe tropical fruits to market-fresh berries, you’ll re-experience the sweetness in everyday sipping. Plus, they’re all delicious hot or iced! Includes: 6x 50 g of loose leaf teas and infusions.

title: Cozy Chai Tea Bundle
Description: Spice up your season with the Cozy Chai Tea Bundle, featuring three warming & decadent blends plus a double-walled stainless steel tumbler so you can take your treat on the go. Whether you’re crunching leaves on a walk or curling up with a blanket, this is your go-to for sipping into sweater weather. Includes: 3x 50 g of loose leaf teas and infusions, 1x Tumbler.

title: HAPPY CAMPER
Description: WHAT MAKES A CAMPER HAPPY?​ Freedom, adventure and a cracking good cup of coffee! That’s what makes a Happy Camper. This coffee is at home in the wild, & hey, a little wild in the home!

title: DECAF
Description: A decaffeinated coffee should be exactly like every other one of our blends: deep, dark and delicious. And that’s what this is, a tip-top taste with a mellow finish. Enjoy!

title: CLIFF HANGER ESPRESSO
Description: Get a grip on this chocolaty, smooth blend. There’s cocoa tones and a bold happy ending. Don’t hang in suspense, this blend reads like a manifesto of delicious coffee.

title: HOLA
Description: This blend knows how to dish up a warm welcome. It’s a hot, tropical storm, sailing in off the sea. It’s a high-five, a hug, and a good swift kick to the conventional, all at once. Hullo good mornings! Bring on the dawn!

title: THREE SISTERS
Description: The Three Sisters are a trio of towering Canadian Rocky Mountains. We pay homage to these powerful peaks with a triple punch of light, medium and dark roasts. Great taste hits new heights!

title: SMART ASS
Description: A half-full cup of wake up and wise up. No joke here, this is just a bright, chocolaty concoction for the smart-thinking, deep-drinking, good-at-their-game-in-the-morning crowd.

title: KICK ASS
Description: If there’s something worth doing, we think it’s worth doing great. This remarkable blend of beans is the spirit of Kicking Horse® Coffee, and a bold invitation to wake up and kick ass with us.

title: GRIZZLY CLAW
Description: From the heart of the mountains, a strong spirit roars. This is the most magical hand mother nature can deal, and it’s headed for a mug near you.

title: 454 HORSE POWER
Description: This smooth riding dark horse conjures up power from the depths of the shadows. This is the winner, the champion of taste. The one that goes the extra mile. Hop on, hold on, and head for the hills.

title: OpenDots ONE
Description: Light Clip, Powerful Sound. Open-Ear Clip-On Design Secure Fit & Lightweight Comfort (6.5g) Premium Sound Experience with Dolby Audio Up to 40 Hours of Listening & Wireless Charging

And with the Shokz Loop110 wireless adapter, you will always be connected to your devices, whether you use a Mac or a PC, in the office or at home. title: When the Sky Breaks—Signed Paperback
Description: Signed paperback copy! An alien artifact. A prison break. A rebel with a secret. When a young woman from Marix Desata’s past shows up at Crescent Five—a remote lunar lockup—she pulls him into a conspiracy that could topple a tyrant or destroy them both. A forbidden weapon, powerful and alive, ends up in Marix’s hands. It whispers at the edge of his thoughts, demanding loyalty, offering power… if he dares to wield it. But the closer Marix gets to freedom, the more dangerous the journey becomes. To survive, he’ll need to outrun assassins, outsmart spies, and navigate a world that wants to use him or kill him—starting with his own mother. 🌌 YA science fiction with a genderpunk twist🌊 Spies, sea serpents, super powers⚡When the sky breaks, no one falls gently Editorial Reviews ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐"When the Sky Breaks redefines the boundaries of imagination with its descriptive setting and ingenious world-building. It has a plot with astronomical stakes and deeply human moments. I could not put the book down. What an exhilarating read."—Jessica Barbosa, ReadersFavorite.com⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐"I unreservedly recommend When the Sky Breaks for YA (and adult) science fiction readers, as well as anyone who simply appreciates a good yarn with enough action and twists to keep the pages turning. The setting is unique, but familiar enough for us Earthlings to hang our hat on. Characters are well drawn, each with their own strengths and flaws that make them real and relatable. What Brown calls a “genderpunk” motif adds a subtle and satisfying upending of gender stereotypes and tropes, making them fresh and new in a way Gen Alpha readers will appreciate and find delightful. Be sure to grab this one when it hits the shelves!"—Jennifer Gadd, author of The Second Battle⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐"When the Sky Breaks is a rewarding and sharply written book that manages to maintain a brilliant, forward-moving pace and a strong sense of immediacy that never lets up. A lot of this is due to Brown’s style, which is lean but effective, with clean prose that, unlike most science fiction, doesn’t over-explain or get lost in ornamentation. This is a wonderful story. Very highly recommended."—Asher Syed, ReadersFavorite.com⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐"When the Sky Breaks skillfully explores the themes of identity, trust, and the corrupting influence of power. The story is packed with action, intrigue, exquisite prose, well-crafted dialogue, and characters that are, indeed, unforgettable."—Divine Zape, ReadersFavorite.com

title: Story Skeleton: The Classics (E-Book)
Description: The Blueprints of Brilliant Fiction In Story Skeleton: The Classics, we unlock the secrets of twenty-one enduring novels—from Pride and Prejudice to The Godfather—revealing the plot points and craft genius that make them masterpieces. Discover the method behind the magic, and learn how to apply these timeless techniques to elevate your own writing and captivate readers for generations.As Orson Welles said, “The absence of limitations is the enemy of art.”A novel’s structural elements can be organized strategically, creatively, unusually—but in a satisfying narrative, they’re all there in some form. That form might be surprising when you realize what the author has really done—which often isn’t clear the first or even second time you read a complex novel. But once you crack the code, it’s immensely satisfying.

title: Immersion & Emotion: The Two Pillars of Storytelling (Ebook)
Description: A great novel is honed, not hatched. There are two pillars to effective storytelling: immersion and emotional draw. Immersion is what transports readers into your story world. Emotional draw is what keeps them there.This book will take you deep into the craft workshop of the Darling Axe's two senior editors. Michelle and David's core editorial philosophy is simple: every element of a story must serve the reader's experience. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "I highly recommend it for writers of all skill levels." ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "Michelle Barker and David Griffin Brown have crafted a literary gem that deserves a permanent spot on every writer's bookshelf." ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "This book is a treasure trove for both aspiring writers and seasoned authors, offering profound insights into the art of creating immersive and emotionally resonant narratives." ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "If you aspire to craft stories that captivate and resonate, this book is an indispensable companion."

title: The First Page Challenge (entry only)
Description: Thanks for your interest in the First Page Challenge! It's only $5 CAD to enter. If you want to enter the contest and also purchase optional feedback for $45 CAD, click here. Once you have paid your entry fee, submit your entry to contest@darlingaxe.com. First place: $700 CAD Second place: $200 CAD Third place: $100 CAD All three finalists win publication on the Chopping Blog and receive complimentary access to a Darling Axe self-paced course. Submission guidelines One page, 12-point font, double spaced Multiple submissions accepted Only original, unpublished, unrepresented work may be submitted Word documents & PDFs accepted The winning submissions will be published on the Chopping Blog All entrants will be notified of winners and shortlist by email Prize money will be awarded via PayPal Conflict of interest: authors who have previously purchased a Darling Axe query critique or other editing service may not submit work with which we are already familiar (previous CONTEST FEEDBACK, however, is fine) Contest closes September 30 Judging Screening and judging will be done solely by Darling Axe editors. The entries will be screened by David Brown. The top submissions will be judged anonymously by Michelle Barker. A note on sincerity Some so-called editing websites host writing contests as a ruse to then up-sell contestants into paying to have their submissions edited. A shifty trick indeed! We attest that this is a legitimate annual writing contest, and if winning entries ever need some editing, we will gladly assist without charge. Liability The Darling Axe is not be liable for any loss or damage or for any personal injury sustained as a result of entering this contest or receipt of a prize or Chopping Blog publication. The Darling Axe is the sole sponsor of this contest. Copyright The three contest winners assign first publication rights to the Darling Axe, such that we may published your entry on our blog. Each author fully retains the copyright to his or her piece, and of course the full manuscript as well. Express agreement By entering this contest, participants expressly agree to the contest rules and guidelines.

title: Double Dip Query Critique
Description: A developmental edit of your first 5000 words and your choice: a query letter workshop as described above OR a synopsis critique. Cost: $250 USD ($350 CAD) What happens next: once we process your payment, one of our editors will be in touch. You can also reach us at editors@darlingaxe.com. Timeline: Darling Axe editors often have multiple projects on the go. Please allow up to three weeks for us to finish your critique. (Typical turnaround time is two weeks.) Please note the listed cost of this service is in US dollars. However, since the Darling Axe is a Canadian company, the invoice is in Canadian dollars. That being said, our payment gateway may convert the final amount to your local currency, based upon IP address (server location).

title: Editorial assessment: 5000 words
Description: Your query letter and synopsis are important parts of the submission package, but your writing sample is the true test. In fact, many agents read the sample first. This service includes a developmental edit of your first 5000 words. Cost: $200 USD ($280 CAD) What happens next: once we process your payment, one of our editors will be in touch. You can also reach us at editors@darlingaxe.com. Timeline: Darling Axe editors often have multiple projects on the go. Please allow up to three weeks for us to finish your critique. (Typical turnaround time is one week.) Please note the listed cost of this service is in US dollars. However, since the Darling Axe is a Canadian company, the invoice is in Canadian dollars. That being said, our payment gateway may convert the final amount to your local currency, based upon IP address (server location).

title: Synopsis Critique
Description: One of our editors will perform a developmental edit on your 500-word synopsis. This top-down analysis is useful for identifying structural issues and other red flags that will snag with agents. Cost: $80 USD ($110 CAD) What happens next: once we process your payment, one of our editors will be in touch. You can also reach us at editors@darlingaxe.com. Timeline: Darling Axe editors often have multiple projects on the go. Please allow up to three weeks for us to finish your critique. (Typical turnaround time is one week.) Please note the listed cost of this service is in US dollars. However, since the Darling Axe is a Canadian company, the invoice is in Canadian dollars. That being said, our payment gateway may convert the final amount to your local currency, based upon IP address (server location).

title: Zena Top
Description: Bold and sexy. The Zena Top is designed with a sculpted fit and classic collar. The Tiger’s Eye print delivers high-impact polish—wear it as a statement set or anchor it with tailored denim.

title: Alexander Pants
Description: Sleek and elongating. The Alexander Pant hugs through the hip and falls straight through the leg, creating a sculptural silhouette in our signature Tiger’s Eye print. Pair it with the matching Zena Top for a powerful head-to-toe look.

title: Ninette Sweater
Description: Minimal and essential. The Ninette Sweater features a clean polo neckline and relaxed silhouette. The rich chocolate tone makes it endlessly wearable—tuck it into denim or layer under suiting for a modern fall look.

title: Zarina Bodysuit
Description: Designed to flatter from every angle, the Zarina Bodysuit is defined by sculptural ruching and a sleek, asymmetrical overlay. Crafted in ultra-soft jersey, it shapes the frame with subtle drama.

title: Zenia Top - Tigers Eye
Description: Wild yet refined. The Zenia Top is crafted from a lightweight, semi-sheer chiffon with a bold animal print and gathered neckline. Blouson sleeves add softness, while the high collar keeps things elevated.

title: Tommy Bodysuit - Black
Description: Understated and undeniably sleek. The Tommy Bodysuit hugs the body with a flawless fit, featuring a clean crew neckline and short sleeves. It’s the perfect refined base layer—ideal for tucking into everything from jeans to leather minis.

title: Evian Knit Top - Grey
Description: The Evian Top plays with proportion—featuring a structured, shoulder-draped layer atop a form fitting knit body. It’s a bold, fashion-forward silhouette with built-in polish and undeniable comfort. Pre Order

title: Neoma Knit Shorts - Grey
Description: A luxe take on lounge, the Neoma Knit Short hugs the waist with a flattering high-rise fit. Pair with the matching Evian Top for a co-ord moment that’s cozy, elevated, and unapologetically chic. Pre Order

title: Bri Bodysuit - Dark Grey
Description: The Bri Bodysuit redefines modern layering with its slouchy turtleneck, long sleeves, and body-hugging base. Crafted in soft knit, it's effortless under tailoring or styled solo with confidence.

title: Ingrown Hair Serum
Description: Treats. Soothes. Prevents. Wondering how to get rid of hair bumps? Exfoliate and keep skin bump-free between waxes with our secret weapon in ingrown hair treatment. Its alcohol-free formula contains glycolic acid for gentle exfoliation plus lavender, vitamin E and chamomile to calm and soothe skin. Perfect for preventing ingrown armpit hair, ingrown hairs on legs, and ingrown pubic hair, our award-winning Ingrown Hair Serum is a favorite of guests and beauty editors alike, and is our #1 best selling product. BUMP-FREE SKIN CARE: Ingrown Hair Serum treats, soothes, and prevents ingrown hairs, bumps and breakouts on legs, underarms, and bikini line; Effective pre and post hair removal to calm skin after waxing, sugaring, shaving, and tweezing ALCOHOL-FREE GENTLE EXFOLIATION: Formulated for sensitive prone skin to calm and reduce skin irritation and discomfort; Contains Glycolic Acid (AHA) to gently exfoliate and soften skin, keeping it smooth and bump-free between treatments SOOTHING PH BALANCED INGREDIENTS: Infused with lavender oil for rehydration, vitamin E and Tea Tree oil to calm inflammation, and chamomile to soothe skin VERSATILE USE FOR ANY SKIN CARE ROUTINE: It’s not just for treating ingrown hair and breakouts, this proprietary formula is ideal for men and women after shaving to reduce razor bumps, nicks, and burns CRUELTY FREE SKIN CARE: For over 20 years, European Wax Center provides luxurious waxing services and a line of exclusive non-comedogenic dermatologist-tested products to enhance the waxing experience that reflects a commitment to comfort and quality

title: Travel Aloe Body Lotion
Description: Slows. Hydrates. Replenishes.​ Keep your skin soft and hydrated between waxes with our best body lotion. Lightweight yet luxurious, this moisturizer is bursting with aloe vera, which is known for its skin-soothing benefits. This fast-absorbing formula: ​ SLOWS hair regrowth and helps visibly reduce hair thickness with naturally derived narcissus bulb extract​ HYDRATES for 8+ hours without clogging pores​ REPLENISHES and soothes with aloe, chamomile and sea kelp

title: Travel Get Smooth Skin Clearing Body Wash
Description: Clarifies. Smooths. Nourishes.Keep your skin smooth and clear with our Get Smooth Skin Clearing Body Wash. This formula gently exfoliates powered by Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) and Salicylic Acid (BHA) to help smooth skin texture, unclogs pores, and prevent ingrown hairs, bumps and breakouts. This nourishing body wash is formulated to condition without stripping moisture from skin. BUMP-FREE SKIN CARE: This Body Wash is formulated for acne and ingrown hair prone skin with salicylic acid and PHA to treat and help prevent ingrown hairs, bumps, and acne breakouts all over the body including bikini, legs, shoulders, butt, & back GENTLE CHEMICAL EXFOLIATION: Our bump eliminating cleanser builds into a dense silky lather that unclogs pores, exfoliates dull, flaky skin, and clarifies impurities to prevent acne and ingrown hair breakouts while leaving skin clean and rejuvenated SOOTHING PH BALANCED INGREDIENTS: formulated for daily use, this shower gel will not over-dry or strip your skin; Free of mineral oil, phthalates, hydroquinone, triclosan, parabens, formaldehyde & gluten this body gel makes skin hydrated and radiant. VERSATILE USE FOR ANY SKIN CARE ROUTINE: It’s not just for treating ingrown hair and breakouts, this proprietary formula is ideal for men and women after shaving to help soothe razor bumps and helps with “strawberry skin,” “chicken skin,” and “KP” CRUELTY FREE SKIN CARE: For over 20 years, European Wax Center provides waxing services and exclusive non-comedogenic dermatologist and gynecologist-tested products to enhance the waxing experience that reflects a commitment to comfort and quality SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product. Directions:Massage over wet skin for 30-60 seconds. Rinse. Gentle enough for use daily. For external use only. Not intended for use on face. For best results, use in conjunction with our Skin Clearing Body Polish and Body Cream.

title: Travel Get Smooth Skin Clearing Body Polish
Description: Refines. Exfoliates. Reveals. ​Keep your skin soft and smooth with our Get Smooth Skin Clearing Body Polish. Polyhydroxy acid (PHA), Glycolic & Lactic acids (AHAs) help clear dead skin cells and impurities, while granulated pumice physically exfoliates problem areas to help prevent ingrown hairs, bumps, and breakouts. The result: radiant skin. BUMP-FREE SKIN CARE: This body scrub is formulated for acne and ingrown hair prone skin with glycolic acid, lactic acid and PHAs to treat and help prevent ingrown hairs, bumps, and acne breakouts all over the body: bikini, legs, shoulder, butt & back GENTLE EXFOLIANT: Our bump eliminating body polish offers the benefits of physical and chemical exfoliation in one treatment. PHA, Glycolic and Lactic Acid pair at a combined 12% breakdown dull skin and granulated pumice sloughs away dead skin cells. PH BALANCED INGREDIENTS: Use twice a week as tolerated, this body exfoliator refines pores & skin texture; Free of mineral oil, phthalates, hydroquinone, triclosan, parabens, formaldehyde & gluten this body gel makes skin hydrated and radiant. VERSATILE USE FOR ANY SKIN CARE ROUTINE: It’s not just for treating ingrown hair and breakouts, this exfoliating body scrubber is ideal for men and women after shaving to help soothe razor bumps, and helps “strawberry skin,” “chicken skin,” & “KP.” CRUELTY FREE SKIN CARE: For over 20 years, European Wax Center provides waxing services and exclusive non-comedogenic dermatologist and gynecologist-tested products to enhance the waxing experience that reflects a commitment to comfort and quality SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product. Directions:Apply onto wet skin, gently massage focusing on desired areas. Rinse. Use twice a week as tolerated. For external use only. Not intended for use on the face. For best results, use in conjunction with our Get Smooth Skin Clearing Body Wash and Body Cream.

Formulated to help maintain smoother-looking skin and visibly reduce hair thickness between waxes. Directions: Apply daily, or as needed, to neutralize odor. Intended for use all over the body such as underarms, bikini area, inner thighs, chest, and feet.

title: Exfoliating Mitts
Description: EXFOLIATES. CLEARS. PREPS. Keep skin smooth between waxes with our multi-use exfoliating mitts. Perfectly sized for all-over (glove sized mitt) or targeted use (finger sized mitt), each dual-sided, reusable mitt: EXFOLIATES with one cotton side for gentle, daily use, and a nylon side for a deeper, more abrasive scrub CLEARS away dead skin cells and impurities, excellent for those curious how to prevent ingrown hairs PREPS skin for optimal product application and allows products to penetrate into pores Directions: For best results, wet the mitt in the shower and use with your favorite EWC Body Wash or Body Polish. Use the large mitt on your hand for all-over exfoliation, and the mini mitt on your fingers to easily reach targeted areas. For ingrown treatment and prevention, immediately apply the EWC Ingrown Hair Serum or Wipes post-shower to dry skin. Refrain from using the abrasive side of the mitt for two to five days post-wax. Hang mitt to dry and machine wash regularly on delicate cycle.

Making The Switch From Aluminum to Aluminum-Free: What to Expect When you switch to aluminum-free deodorant, you might notice that you sweat more anywhere from 3 weeks to 30 days—and that’s normal, since your body is detoxing from the aluminum. In this adjustment period, you might also notice that aluminum-free deodorant feels like it’s wet during application. But don't worry—your underarm moisture levels will normalize as your body adapts to the change.

title: Wave Gift Card
Description: Wave gift cards make it easy to give the gift of digital business cards. Perfect for anyone who wants to share their contact details quickly and professionally. A great gift for coworkers, friends, or business partners.

title: Custom Metal Digital Business Card (Laser Engraved)
Description: Make a lasting impression with a metal digital business card that’s as bold as your brand. Choose from sleek black metal, timeless brushed silver, or eye-catching 24k gold for a card that’s truly unforgettable. Here’s why it’s a game-changer: Built-in NFC chip on the back for easy, contactless sharing—just tap and your details are instantly transferred. Laser engraving that adds a clean, professional touch to your design. Made from durable stainless steel, so it’s built to last and stand out. This isn’t just a business card—it’s your digital identity in a modern, electronic business card format. Whether you’re at a conference or closing a deal, this metal NFC business card lets you share your info effortlessly while leaving an impression of style and tech-savvy professionalism. Say goodbye to paper cards and hello to a custom NFC card that’s designed for modern business professionals.

title: Custom Phone Tap
Description: About Custom Phone Tap Tap or Scan Feature: Wave digital business card includes a smart tap feature and QR code, perfect for professional networking. No app is required to receive your information. Easy to set up: Connect your digital business card and build your profile in minutes. Once you receive your card, hold it to the back of your phone or scan the QR code to start creating your profile. Apply to Back of Phone: This digital business card can be easily applied to your phone and is equipped with an NFC tag for instant contact sharing. Tap on the back of an iPhone or center-back for Android. Compatible: Wave electronic business card works on all modern smartphones, including iPhone and Android devices. All Wave Taps include a QR code on the front of the business card. Free & Pro Versions: Share your digital business card unlimited times, and store an unlimited amount of contacts for free. You can also upgrade to PRO for $6.99 to access additional content.
