title: NFC Bracelet
Description: About Our NFC Bracelets Looking for a modern way to network? Look no further than our NFC bracelets. These bracelets aren't just stylish accessories but also a revolutionary way to share your personalized digital profiles from your wrist. NFC Bracelets blend fashion and functionality perfectly, providing a seamless networking experience while showcasing your brand. The sleek design, combined with smart technology, creates a style statement.Compatibility is key with our NFC bracelets. Whether your new connections are on iOS or Android, the integrated NFC and QR code technology ensures smooth interaction every time. The optional mobile app further enhances the user experience, making managing and sharing your digital profiles easier.Wave NFC bracelets are wearable tech accessories and smart networking tools that align with the modern-day professional's lifestyle. It's about making meaningful connections effortlessly and leaving a lasting impression that aligns with your brand's modern and progressive identity. Smart Bracelet Features Instant Sharing With just a tap, share your contact information instantly with potential clients, partners, or employers. No more fumbling around with paper cards or manual data entry. Easy Setup Setting up your digital business card is a breeze with our intuitive online platform. Get started in minutes and begin networking like a pro. Unlimited Scans There are no limitations on the number of times your card can be scanned. Share your professional details as often as you need without any additional cost. Dynamic Content Update your information on the go. Whether it’s a new job title or a fresh profile photo, your digital business card is always up-to-date. High-Quality Material Our NFC bracelets are made using a combination of high-quality polyester and nylon materials, resulting in a product that is not only durable but also stylish. Whether you're using them for promotional events or day-to-day operations, these bracelets are sure to leave a lasting impression of professionalism and reliability. Wide Compatibility Compatible with all NFC-enabled smartphones, making it a versatile choice for modern professionals. No app is needed for your information to be received by the other person. Eco-Friendly Our NFC bracelet is an eco-friendly alternative to traditional paper cards, helping to reduce waste and promote sustainability. Analytics Integration Track your networking efforts with built-in analytics. Understand how often your bracelet is being scanned and optimize your follow-up strategy. Secure and Private Your privacy is our priority. Share only the information you want with our secure interface. Wave is SOC 2 compliant, our security measures exceed industry standards for data protection, and we do not sell your data.

Description: The Transfer Pro™ Pocket with Handle is a slim, lightweight, and durable protective sleeve for 13″-14″ MacBook notebooks and other tablets. Just slip in your device and go knowing it’s protected from school to work to the cafe and everywhere in between. Made with recycled materials, a water-resistant heather fabric keeps your devices safe from the elements, while the interior foam and sturdy construction will protect against scratches and bumps. An additional zipper pocket is conveniently placed to hold any cables, wires, or accessories to stay more organized.

title: ShieldView Glass Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Screen Protector
Description: ShieldView™ Glass is our most protective screen protector that gives you more protection no matter what life throws at you. Thin, sensitive yet strong, think of it like your screen, but better. Made from the highest quality, ultra-thin 0.33 mm tempered glass, this durable and easy to install screen protector is highly sensitive to touch, and has 9H scratch-resistance coating to resist fingerprints and dirt, so you can keep your screen looking flawless without interrupting ease of use. ShieldView Glass also has a built-in antimicrobial treatment that reduces bacteria growth, creating a cleaner surface. Includes our GOOF PROOF® installation kit that includes instructions and special glass adhesive to ensure anyone can make a seamless application.

title: IMPACTHERO Slim Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Cases
Description: IMPACTHERO® SLIM is where slim design meets durability. Our super, single layer design keeps your phone light and sleek without compromising on protection. The soft-touch coating provides the ultimate comfort. It also has a built-in antimicrobial treatment that reduces bacteria growth, creating a cleaner surface. Plus, it also features an added edge for optimal screen protection. Our raised bezel protects your screen from scratching and shattering when your phone falls and lands face-down. Device-specific ports and buttons means every case fits exactly how it should.

title: Presidio2 Grip Magnet Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Cases
Description: Presidio®2 Grip Magnet is an ultra-protective and pocket-friendly case that has a soft-touch finish for ultimate comfort plus newly innovative no-slip inverted grips. Our inverted grip is designed to provide longevity, durability and a strong grip for more confidence when texting, talking, or taking photos. Not only is this case chic, but also now made with 50% recycled plastics, lessening our carbon footprint in our devotion to help the planet. Learn more at speckeco.com. Presidio®2 Armor Cloud™ Technology makes it tough for life’s rough moments. We’ve lined the perimeter of every case with air capsules that on impact, compress and suspend your phone on a cushion of air, just like an airbag. These cases have been tested in the real world to withstand drops of up to 13 feet, so you’ll be confident knowing your phone will be protected. Now even slimmer, this durable and sleek case is optimized to be wireless charging compatible. For ease of use you can feel, experience a precise fit tailor-made for your device with the addition of enhanced ultra-responsive buttons for smoother clicks and volume control. This magnetic case ensures proper alignment with Qi and other wireless chargers while securely connecting to magnetic accessories like wallets, battery packs, and car mounts. It also has a built-in antimicrobial treatment that reduces bacteria growth, creating a cleaner surface. Plus, it also features our raised bezel. This added edge helps protect your screen from scratching and shattering if, and/or when your phone falls and lands face-down.

title: Presidio Perfect-Clear Apple iPhone Air Case
Description: The Presidio® Perfect-Clear case combines powerful protection with sleek clarity, offering up to 13-foot drop protection thanks to advanced impact-compression technology that cushions your phone on contact. It’s been rigorously third-party tested to withstand drops, extreme temperatures, chemicals, and more—so you know it’s tough.The Perfect-Clear coating resists yellowing and discoloration, keeping your case crystal-clear over time. A redesigned button layout enhances tactile response for a more satisfying click, while the raised bezel offers extra screen protection against face-down falls. Best of all, it’s backed by a lifetime warranty—because awesome should last forever.

title: Presidio Perfect-Clear MagSafe Apple iPhone Air Case
Description: The Presidio® Perfect-Clear MagSafe® case is our clearest, most protective, and pocket-friendly design yet—crafted to deliver both stunning clarity and serious durability.Made with innovative materials that resist yellowing over time, it keeps your phone looking pristine longer. Despite its slim profile, this case offers powerful protection with our proprietary clear cushioning rubber that compresses on impact to help absorb shock and prevent damage from drops—proven to withstand falls from up to 13 feet.Built-in precision magnets ensure seamless compatibility with all Apple MagSafe® chargers and accessories, so charging and snapping on accessories is effortless. For added peace of mind, a raised bezel guards your screen against scratches and cracks from face-down drops. And with a newly redesigned button structure, you’ll enjoy a more satisfying click and responsive feel every time.

title: Presidio2 Grip Apple iPhone Air Case
Description: Say hello to your phone’s new best friend—the Presidio®2 Grip case! Built for bold moves, unexpected drops, and everyday adventures, this case is packed with protection and thoughtful design that you’ll actually feel excited about.First up: 13-foot drop protection with Presidio®2. Inside the case, hidden magic is at work—or rather, science. Tiny air capsules line the case, acting like airbags that cushion your phone when it takes a tumble. Whether it’s a quick slip from your hand or a heroic dive off a table, these smart shock-absorbing pockets protect your device from damage, your day uninterrupted.Tired of slippery cases that feel like they’re always trying to escape your grip? We’ve got you covered with our no-slip inverted grips. These cleverly designed ridges on the back give you that “just right” level of grip—not sticky, not rough, just secure. Whether you’re snapping a selfie, firing off texts, or scrolling, your phone stays right where it belongs: in your hand.Let’s talk buttons. We know how satisfying a good click feels, which is why we’ve built ultra-responsive buttons into the design. Every tap, toggle, and volume adjustment feels smooth and snappy, just the way it should. No squish, no stiffness—just effortless control right at your fingertips.And because life happens (like dropping your phone face-down—we’ve all been there), we’ve added raised bezel screen protection to help keep your display safe from cracks and scratches. It’s a small ridge, but a big deal when it comes to saving your screen from disaster.Best of all? It’s all backed by a lifetime warranty.So go ahead, live boldly. Your phone’s in good hands with the Presidio®2 Grip.

title: Presidio2 Pro MagSafe Apple iPhone Air Case
Description: Meet the Presidio®2 Pro MagSafe®—the phone case that’s as ready for adventure as you are. With up to 13-foot drop protection and our innovative clear impact technology, this case doesn’t just talk tough—it is tough. When life gets a little clumsy, the shock-absorbing design cushions your phone to help prevent cracks, breaks, or “oh no” moments.But it’s not just about protection; the soft-touch finish feels smooth in your hand and looks sleek while resisting scratches, so your case stays looking as sharp as day one. Built-in precision magnets ensure perfect alignment with all your Apple MagSafe® chargers and accessories, making charging a breeze and snapping on gear oddly satisfying. You’ll love the ultra-responsive button covers too as they’re designed for effortless clicks and better control.Add in raised bezel screen protection (because face-down falls happen) and a lifetime warranty, and you’ve got a case that works as hard as you do—with style, confidence, and a little fun.

title: Presidio Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe with ClickLock Apple iPhone Air Case
Description: Presidio® Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe® with ClickLock™ Interlock technology is our most protective case that we’ve ever designed. Our innovative new ClickLock™ Interlock no-slip technology allowed us to create a case that enhances MagSafe® Speck products. ClickLock™ Interlock no-slip technology has a bolt that locks accessories onto your phone or your phone into place creating less friction and therefore less chance of slippage. This case now features a new button design that provides a more satisfactory click and tactile response.Features our newly innovative no-slip inverted grips, offering great longevity, durability, and a strong grip, providing more confidence when texting, talking, or taking photos.Our clear impact technology is tough for life’s rough moments. Our proprietary, clear phone-cushioning rubber compresses on impact to protect your phone and resist damage. Naturally our Presidio® Perfect-Clear Grips with ClickLock™ technology case has been real-world tested to withstand drops of up to 13 feet, so you’ll be confident knowing your phone will be protected.Plus, it features our raised bezel. This added edge helps protect your screen from scratches, chips, and the dreaded spiderweb shatter if your phone ever falls and lands face-down. And if that isn’t enough peace of mind, all Presidio Perfect Clear cases coem the Speck Lifetime warranty.

title: Presidio Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe Apple iPhone Air Case
Description: Meet the Presidio® Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe®—our clearest, most protective case ever, and your phone’s new best friend. Engineered with cutting-edge materials, this case stays crystal clear longer, while offering unbeatable protection and durability.Enjoy a better grip on life (and your phone!) with our innovative inverted no-slip grips. They’re built to last and feel fantastic in your hand—perfect for confident texting, snapping pics, or catching up on calls. title: Presidio Lux MagSafe Apple iPhone Air Case

This raised bezel helps protect your screen from scratching and shattering if your phone falls and lands face-down.

title: Presidio Lux Grip MagSafe Apple iPhone 17 Pro Max Case
Description: If you’re looking for a phone case that offers serious protection without sacrificing style, the Presidio® Lux Grip MagSafe® case is a great pick. It’s built with clear impact technology that cushions your phone from drops up to 13 feet, helping prevent damage from everyday accidents. title: Presidio Perfect-Clear Apple iPhone 17 Pro Case
Description: The Presidio® Perfect-Clear case combines powerful protection with sleek clarity, offering up to 13-foot drop protection thanks to advanced impact-compression technology that cushions your phone on contact. It’s been rigorously third-party tested to withstand drops, extreme temperatures, chemicals, and more—so you know it’s tough.The Perfect-Clear coating resists yellowing and discoloration, keeping your case crystal-clear over time. A redesigned button layout enhances tactile response for a more satisfying click, while the raised bezel offers extra screen protection against face-down falls. Best of all, it’s backed by a lifetime warranty—because awesome should last forever.

title: Presidio2 Pro MagSafe Apple iPhone 17 Pro Case
Description: Meet the Presidio®2 Pro MagSafe®—the phone case that’s as ready for adventure as you are. With up to 13-foot drop protection and our innovative clear impact technology, this case doesn’t just talk tough—it is tough. When life gets a little clumsy, the shock-absorbing design cushions your phone to help prevent cracks, breaks, or “oh no” moments.But it’s not just about protection; the soft-touch finish feels smooth in your hand and looks sleek while resisting scratches, so your case stays looking as sharp as day one. Built-in precision magnets ensure perfect alignment with all your Apple MagSafe® chargers and accessories, making charging a breeze and snapping on gear oddly satisfying. You’ll love the ultra-responsive button covers too as they’re designed for effortless clicks and better control.Add in raised bezel screen protection (because face-down falls happen) and a lifetime warranty, and you’ve got a case that works as hard as you do—with style, confidence, and a little fun.

title: Presidio Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe with ClickLock Apple iPhone 17 Pro Case
Description: Presidio® Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe® with ClickLock™ Interlock technology is our most protective case that we’ve ever designed. Our innovative new ClickLock™ Interlock no-slip technology allowed us to create a case that enhances MagSafe® Speck products. ClickLock™ Interlock no-slip technology has a bolt that locks accessories onto your phone or your phone into place creating less friction and therefore less chance of slippage. This case now features a new button design that provides a more satisfactory click and tactile response.Features our newly innovative no-slip inverted grips, offering great longevity, durability, and a strong grip, providing more confidence when texting, talking, or taking photos.Our clear impact technology is tough for life’s rough moments. Our proprietary, clear phone-cushioning rubber compresses on impact to protect your phone and resist damage. Naturally our Presidio® Perfect-Clear Grips with ClickLock™ technology case has been real-world tested to withstand drops of up to 13 feet, so you’ll be confident knowing your phone will be protected.Plus, it features our raised bezel. This added edge helps protect your screen from scratches, chips, and the dreaded spiderweb shatter if your phone ever falls and lands face-down. And if that isn’t enough peace of mind, all Presidio Perfect Clear cases coem the Speck Lifetime warranty.

title: Presidio Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe Apple iPhone 17 Pro Case
Description: Meet the Presidio® Perfect-Clear Grip MagSafe®—our clearest, most protective case ever, and your phone’s new best friend. Engineered with cutting-edge materials, this case stays crystal clear longer, while offering unbeatable protection and durability.Enjoy a better grip on life (and your phone!) with our innovative inverted no-slip grips. They’re built to last and feel fantastic in your hand—perfect for confident texting, snapping pics, or catching up on calls. And yes, it’s still slim and sleek, with precise built-in magnets that snap perfectly into place with all your Apple MagSafe® accessories.We’ve even upgraded the buttons for an ultra-satisfying click and tactile response—because the little things should feel delightful too. Plus, the raised bezel adds an extra layer of protection for your screen, guarding against scratches, chips, and those cringe-worthy face-down tumbles.

title: Presidio Perfect-Clear MagSafe Apple iPhone 17 Pro Case

Despite its slim profile, this case offers powerful protection with our proprietary clear cushioning rubber that compresses on impact to help absorb shock and prevent damage from drops—proven to withstand falls from up to 13 feet.Built-in precision magnets ensure seamless compatibility with all Apple MagSafe® chargers and accessories, so charging and snapping on accessories is effortless. And with a newly redesigned button structure, you’ll enjoy a more satisfying click and responsive feel every time.

title: Presidio2 Grip MagSafe with ClickLock Apple iPhone 17 Pro Case
Description: The Presidio®2 Grip MagSafe® with ClickLock™ case is built to keep your phone safe and secure, no matter what life throws at it. It offers up to 13-foot drop protection by using air capsules that compress on impact—essentially acting like an airbag for your phone to absorb shock and prevent damage. title: Presidio2 Grip MagSafe Apple iPhone 17 Pro Case

title: First Responders | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Show your appreciation for the brave First Responders with this 36pc Floor Puzzle! Kids will love putting together their favorite rescue vehicles and even some furry friends. A playful and fun way to say thank you to those who help us in times of need. Floor puzzles are large puzzle pieces that can be assembled while on the floor. It makes for a fun tactile experience for the child and allows them to play in a comfortable setting.

title: Construction Zone (Floor 36pc)
Description: The diggers and dumpers are all keeping busy in the Construction Zone. Fun large size floor puzzle pieces for kids to get right in there and feel like they're a part of the project. They can call out instructions and make believe they're the foreman on site. Floor puzzles are large puzzle pieces that can be assembled while on the floor. It makes for a fun tactile experience for the child and allows them to play in a comfortable setting.

title: Unto Us | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Unto Us by Lynn Horrabin expresses the love when baby Jesus was born in the manger. Mother Mary and Joseph lovingly dote on the baby, while the farm animals surround them in curiosity.

title: Shiba's Candy Store | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Shiba's Candy Store is full of furry fun activity today! All the little pups in town have gathered inside the candy store to pick out their favourite confections. The artist, Kayomi Harai, does a wonderful job of expressing the playfulness of these adorable pups as they have fun picking our toys, playing with balls, and trying on a mask. It looks like a few feathered friends are curious as they take up residence at the gumball machine, which is a perfect place for wee birds.

title: Ducklings | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Seven Ducklings line up take a leap into the water for the first time as mother duck watches from the edge of the pond. Surrounded by beautiful pink and purple flowers, this delightful puzzle from Kayomi Harai is sure to make your wee one happy.

title: Bear and Friends | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Bear and Friends by Michelle Simpson features woodland creatures enjoying the outdoors on a sunny day. A bee hive hangs from the tree with buzzing bees. Mother fox crosses the path with her babies, just as mother bear leads her cub in the opposite direction. It's adorable to see a racoon napping in the tree's hollow, but we wonder how rested it can be with the woodpecker pecking? This is a fun forest puzzle for kids to enjoy in the classroom or on the go!

title: Beaver and Friends | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Beaver and Friends by Michelle Simpson features creatures enjoying the river. You'll find fish, frogs, ducks, herons, snails, and a dragonfly enjoying the activity on this wonderful day. There are even turtles crossing the water on logs. So much fun!

title: Fair Weather | Floor Puzzle 35pc | AI Assistance
Description: Twelve cute collages of clouds in colour backgrounds. See the sun and clouds express themselves through different moods and weather.

title: Christmas Cheer | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Jill Howarth shows us what Christmas Cheer looks like both above and below ground on a snowy winter day. Above ground, kids and animals frolic in the snow by the tree trunk, which holds the door to below ground where fireplaces warm the room as kids decorate gingerbread cookies and decorate the Christmas tree. Presents are being wrapped and stockings are being hung on the mantle. There is so much lively activity and kids will enjoy piecing this one together.

title: Friendly Neighbors | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Anna Guz has created a busytown type of puzzle with Friendly Neighbors. Animals say hello to one another from their windows, while other animals skateboard, bike, and drive through the street waving at each other. This town even has a train and hot air balloon, not to mention a crocodile on a scooter! Lots of fun things to find and animals to identify like a panda, monkey, koala, cat, pig, lion, wolf, racoon, owl, hedgehog, and more. It's a sunny day in this friendly town!

title: Animal Count | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Animal Count by Suryadi Djasman Kartodiwiryo features numbers 1 to 10 with a group of animals representing the number. This is a fun puzzle for any kid learning to count. A lion represents number one, lemur for two, zebra for three, hippo for four, giraffes for five, crocodiles for six, meerkats for seven, elephants for eight, monkeys for nine - and 10 features all the animals stacked on top of each other! How fun is that - plus a toucan!

title: In the Rainforest | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: In the Rainforest by Anni Betts features animals of all types from sloths to crocodiles to capybara. The leopard lurks as the parrot flies over the river spotting the fish swimming downstream. And the happy go lucky turtle is eyeng up the foliage with other reptiles like a snake and frogs. A very whimsical puzzle to be enjoyed in the classroom, at daycare, home or on the go.

title: Dinosaur Alphabet | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: Tinna Guo has created a beautiful Dinosaur Alphabet puzzle featuring 26 cute dinosaurs with their letter and name. The puzzle has a soft colour palette making for a calm experience for the toddler. It's a great puzzle for the classroom, daycares, home, or carry it to a friend's house since it comes equipped with a rope handle.

title: Construction Zone | Floor Puzzle 35pc
Description: The diggers and dumpers are all keeping busy in the Construction Zone. Fun large size floor puzzle pieces for kids to get right in there and feel like they're a part of the project. They can call out instructions and make believe they're the foreman on site. Floor puzzles are large puzzle pieces that can be assembled while on the floor. It makes for a fun tactile experience for the child and allows them to play in a comfortable setting. A rope handle makes it simple to transport to a classroom or a friend's house!

title: Create Your Own Floor Puzzle (35pc)
Description: A fun Floor Puzzle that lets kids use their imagination to create something unique, made by them, the budding artist! Design your own puzzle using various mediums from crayons to coloured pencils to paints. Each large puzzle piece is white on both sides, so feel free to flip it over and decorate the underneath side too. Just make note of the tiny print that does help identify each piece in case that is needed for reference. The Create Your Own Floor Puzzle measures 20" x 30" so there is plenty of room to go wild. A rope handle is included making this a great activity to transport to a friend's house for sharing. It's a great gift too! It includes 35 large size puzzle pieces.

title: Secret Solstice | 500 Piece
Description: Alaskan artist Amanda Rose Warren enjoys recording the flora and fauna of Alaska in vivid colors with whimsical touches. Amanda has her own gallery space in Anchorage and offers prints, stickers, bags, original paintings, and now puzzles! With rainbow coloured mountains, green fields, and complementary colours of blue and orange folilage, Secret Solstice quietly invites you to experience the peaceful landscape.

title: Bear Eyes: Harvest | 500 Piece
Description: Alaskan artist Amanda Rose Warren enjoys recording the flora and fauna of Alaska in vivid colors with whimsical touches. Amanda has her own gallery space in Anchorage and offers prints, stickers, bags, original paintings, and now puzzles! Bear Eyes: Harvest is a fun trio of furry faces that stare at you with pensive, questionable, and thoughtful eyes. Explore the different expressions and textures in each bear vignette decorated with foliage and mushrooms.

title: Cabinet of Curiosities | 500 Piece
Description: Sarah Richter resides in Germany and creates images that straddle the line between macabre and magical. Other Cobble Hill titles from this artist include The Summons, and Spooktacular. Tucked amongst the crystals, coral, potions, and plants - are wee mice, scorpions and - did you spot the octopus? Wait, does that astrolabe have a moon in it? Is that a galaxy trapped in a crystal ball? Enjoy finding mystical moments in Cabinet of Curiosities.

title: Bless This House | 500 Piece
Description: Is there a more Christmassy bird than a cardinal? Nuthatches and chickadees also congregate at the feeder on a fine crisp winter’s day. Bless this House by Greg Giordano is a classic puzzle image for Christmas, winter, or any time you want to enjoy a refreshing nature puzzle.

title: Merry Catmas | 500 Piece
Description: Diane Dempsey’s colourful compositions are packed with mid century high-style. Historically accurate ornaments, patterns, and textures bring the fabulous decades of style to life. Merry Catmas celebrates a cat's curiosity as it paws at a pink tree, sits in a stocking, and explores the Christmas decorated mantle that is warmed by the fireplace. If you love this style and subject but prefer a higher piece count, check out the bestselling “Christmas Cats” in the 1000 piece.

title: Country Truck in Winter | 500 Piece | AI Assistance
Description: The final Country Truck image - collect all the seasons! Here we’re attending a festive Christmas Craft Fair. Whether the truck has just completed an epic seasonal shopping spree, or is arriving to unload it’s wares, the important thing is to watch out for bun buns! This image was created by a Cobble Hill designer to be a busy but fun puzzling experiences. It uses photography from a variety of sources, including ai generated components.

title: DoodleTown: Offside Antics | 1000 Piece
Description: In the DoodleTown: Offside Antics puzzle we get to see the picnic party gang again, enjoying their snacks on the lawn. The racoon, rabbit, and Dave Whamond's sidekick are always a fun find in these humourous cartoon puzzles. This one celebrates the fun of football - or soccer, as it's called in North America. With fun signage like "How to Fake an Injury", kids building brick walls to block goals, vendors selling soccer ball ice cones, and balls playing "Kick me" jokes - you're sure to have a great time piecing this chaotically cool puzzle together!

title: Brrr! | 1000 Piece | AI Assistance
Description: Brrr! is a best selling puzzle in the 500 piece count, so we had to offer it in 1000 pieces due to demand. Two Highland cows withstand the winter wearing warm rainbow coloured knitted scarves as the snow falls softly around them.

title: Dog Thoughts | 1000 Piece
Description: Wisconsin artist Sherri Buck Baldwin loves dogs and it shows in every pen stroke. Enjoy exploring Dog Thoughts and the joyful antics of man’s best buddy. A howling good time for all seasons, with amusing musings on the nature of canine-kind woven between delightful doggy vignettes.

title: Backyard Bird Bath | 1000 Piece
Description: Greg Giordano is well known by puzzlers for his busy bird scenes, here a collection of European song birds gather to enjoy a midsummer’s day. From his home in Connecticut, Greg is much in demand with puzzle companies around the world, Cobble Hill is happy to give many of his images a good puzzle-home.

title: Tea Tin Treasures | 1000 Piece
Description: Celebrate fun tea tin packaging dreamed up by Lena Addink, a Netherlands artist who uses a combination of traditional and digital tools. A rainbow of fun with some vintage flair awaits you in Tea Tin Treasures.

title: Woodland Gathering | 1000 Piece
Description: Woodland Gathering is bursting with colour. A crow lands on a twig perhaps to see what the bunny rabbit is doing in the field. The puzzle is full of bright green bark and foliage surrounded by orange and blue flowers that are nestled around the red mushrooms. In the background, the sun is setting or rising giving the scene a beautiful glow. Nature lover and muralist, Wava Jacobchick reached out to Cobble Hill because she felt her work would make good puzzles, we agree and hope you do too!

title: Reef Life | 1000 Piece
Description: In Reef Life, the seabed comes alive with sea stars, coral, anemones, a lion fish and an octopus. Nature lover and muralist, Wava Jacobchick reached out to Cobble Hill because she felt her work would make good puzzles, we agree and hope you do too!

title: Merry Mocktails | 1000 Piece
Description: Holiday cheer without any morning-after regrets. Fix one of these festive and flavorful sips, then sit and enjoy this colourful and hydrating puzzle. Ingredient lists will give you ounces of inspiration during the season of entertaining friends and family. Zirkus Designs is also responsible for the bestselling National Park Bucket List.

title: Diner Talk | 500 Piece | AI Assistance
Description: Diner Talk serves up a heaping helping of nostalgia in a classic 1950s diner setting! This lively collage is packed with mouthwatering favorites from “two dots and a dash” (that’s bacon and eggs) to a “blue plate special” dragged through Wisconsin (yep, slathered in cheese). You’ll spot diner lingo throughout the scene, from “frogsticks” (that’s French fries) to the Atlanta special (an ice-cold Coca-Cola). Stacks of golden waffles, fluffy pancakes, and slices of apple and cherry pie make this table a feast for the eyes and there’s even a strawberry shake, or “in the hay,” to wash it all down. Look closely and you’ll spot a few playful Cobble Hill Easter eggs tucked into the ticket, menu, and more. Pull up a stool, pour yourself a coffee, and piece together the delicious language of diner culture! This collage puzzle was created for the 2025 Portland Jigsaw Masters.

title: Cats vs Puzzles | 1000 Piece
Description: Talk about a sweet 16! It’s Cats vs Puzzles, a purrfect 1000 piece celebration of chaos, cuteness, and coyness. Sixteen mischievous cartoon cats have claimed their boxes... or at least tried to! One’s napping, another’s stretching, a little grey one is tumbling, and of course, there’s that one determined kitty who can only fit his front paws in a box that's clearly too small. Our personal favourite? The sneaky black cat hiding under a box, with just his tail and paws sticking out - trying to snag a puzzle piece when no one’s looking! Rainbow coloured puzzle pieces are scattered everywhere, adding to the vibrant chaos. It's box loving mayhem at its finest, and every expression is full of feline fun. Whether you're a cat lover, a puzzle fan, or both we think you're guaranteed to smile with every piece you place - at home or during a race! ;) This adorable puzzle is by Michelle Simpson, who also created our 500 piece Cats vs. Plants.

title: Nom Nom Macarons | 500 Piece
Description: Nom Nom Macarons is a colourful treat for the eyes! Our Creative Art Director, Allegra Vernon, handpicked an assortment of macarons from a local shop, pairing each with a playful element like fruit or candy. After a fun photo shoot, she brought the sweet scene to life by adding whimsical digital doodles to each macaron’s face. The result? A vibrant puzzle full of charm, colour, and personality! This collage puzzle was created for the 2025 Portland Jigsaw Masters.

title: Sardines and Friends | 500 Piece
Description: We’re thrilled to debut Sardines and Friends at the 2025 Portland Jigsaw Masters! Created by Portland-based artist Yoko Baum, this vibrant puzzle was specially customized for the tournament and is based on an illustration she originally created for the StarChefs Rising Stars Portland issue. Look closely and you’ll even spot a warm “Welcome to Portland” tucked onto one of the quirky tins! Yoko specializes in food & drink, lifestyle illustration for editorial, advertising/branding, and publishing industries and her playful, personality-packed style shines through in every detail. With repeating blues, yellows and oranges, we expect this puzzle may be trickier than it looks! We'll be curious to see if any speed puzzlers dare to tackle the frame first? With our oversized 500 piece format, some tins and shadows may cross into the frame offering helpful hints, but we shall see!

title: Country Truck in Summer | 500 Piece | AI Assistance
Description: Country Truck in Summer is the third charming addition to our seasonal series featuring a vintage truck, furry friends, and beautifully framed scenes. This summer edition is packed with even more adorable pups than its siblings, creating a warm, fuzzy feeling that’s perfectly paired with lush florals and vibrant summer vibes. Following in the tire tracks of Country Truck in Spring and Country Truck in Autumn - both featured in past speed puzzling tournaments - this puzzle will make its debut at the 2025 Portland Jigsaw Masters. With more pups and more blooms, we’re excited to see how it stacks up against its seasonal counterparts on the tournament floor! As expected, fur and foliage posed a challenge to many speed puzzlers. But there were some excellent finish times for this one. Compared to the Spring and Autumn versions, Summer has the fastest finish times across the top three places.

title: Cobble Hill Reusable Bag
Description: An oversized bag featuring the furry felines from our popular Rainbow Cats and Rainbow Cat Quilts puzzles. The reusable bag is great for carrying groceries, gym gear, library books, and most importantly, jigsaw puzzles !!

title: Team Relay | Easy Handling 275pc
Description: Waiting for St. Nick, Summer Afternoon on the Farm, Tree of Life, and By the Pond Easy Handling 275 piece puzzles were played together as a Four Person Teams Relay in the Origins Tournament of Pieces speed puzzling competition in June 2025. They can be enjoyed on their own and purchased individually, but if combined together, one can test themselves against the winning time. The contest allowed for a total time of 1 hour to complete all four 275 piece puzzles. The team relay requires that all four people individually work on a single puzzle for five-minutes at a time, then rotate one place clockwise to the next puzzle. Only one person can work on any one puzzle at a time. If a puzzle is assembled, one person rotates out and can only coach from the side, but they may not touch the pieces until they rotate back in to puzzle. The clockwise rotation continues every five-minutes until all four puzzles are completed or the one-hour time limit is reached.

title: Waiting for St. Nick | Easy Handling 275 Piece
Description: It's a beautiful snow filled night on Christmas Eve. The kiddies are asleep, while the kitties are up Waiting for St. Nick with a cupcake and carrot at the ready. They're enjoying watching Santa Claus and his reindeer fly high across the moonlit sky above the village church as they wait with anticipation for him to stop at their home. What presents will he bring? Cobble Hill's Easy Handling 275 piece random cut puzzles are the perfect starter puzzle for any newcomer to jigsaws. The large pieces show plenty of detail so one can more easily identify where it belongs in the puzzle. The average piece size is two inches. Our seniors enjoy assembling these puzzles on their own and with grandchildren, it's a great activity for brains of all ages! It's also an easy category for a date night evening at home!

title: Summer Chorus | Easy Handling 275 Piece
Description: A pastel pink, blue, and yellow birdhouse are home to the cutest birds. They love when the flowers are in bloom and gather together to share their latest chirpings. Cobble Hill's Easy Handling 275 piece random cut puzzles are the perfect starter puzzle for any newcomer to jigsaws. The large pieces show plenty of detail so one can more easily identify where it belongs in the puzzle. The average piece size is two inches. Our seniors enjoy assembling these puzzles on their own and with grandchildren, it's a great activity for brains of all ages! It's also an easy category for a date night evening at home!

title: Night Garden | 500 Piece
Description: Imagine laying down in your Night Garden full of magical flowers and mushrooms as you stare up at the full moon on a starry night sky. The moths dance above as you listen to the quiet whisper of their wings coaxing the skulls from their petal pods. A 500 piece puzzle with a black background that has pops of colour that stand out. This puzzle was thoughtfully designed for the Tournament of Pieces 2025 event keeping in mind the challenge and the desire to make it achievable in a reasonable finish time. Yellows mostly fill the left and left top side with blues on the right. The majority of pale pink and taupe take up the bottom space. The majority of the dark black area are centered around the moon making that an area of concentration. We anticipate the mushrooms to be the most challenging area - so we look forward to seeing people's puzzles in progress pics to find out!

title: Lantern Light | 1000 Piece
Description: How many keys are hidden across Lantern Light, a 1000 piece delight by Rose Cat Khan? On this magical crescent moon night, a glowing light radiates from the lantern perched on a succulent-covered island, casting a soft shimmer over the rainbow gradients that fill the scene. Butterflies dance above lotus flowers, rainbow-colored succulents bloom with otherworldly charm, and koi fish glide gracefully beneath the water’s surface. The left side of the puzzle features a winding waterway, while the right holds the mysterious island where the lantern shines bright. Scattered throughout the scene are hidden keys. Can you find them all? With each piece, the mystery unfolds. Could the koi be their silent protectors?

title: Team Relay | 500 Piece
Description: Cats vs. Plants and Night Garden 500 piece puzzles were played together as a Four Person Teams Relay in the Origins Tournament of Pieces speed puzzling competition in June 2025. They can be enjoyed on their own and purchased individually, or played in the same manner to test your team's time. The Team Relay is a four-person puzzle event where two 500 piece puzzles are completed simultaneously. Each pair starts with one puzzle on their half of a shared table. Every five minutes, participants rotate one place clockwise to work on the next puzzle. This rotation continues until time runs out. If one puzzle is completed before time is up, the rotation still continues. Only two people may physically work on a puzzle at any given time; the other two may coach and point to pieces but are not allowed to touch them. This event was allowed 90 minutes for completion.

title: Aurora | 1000 Piece
Description: This is not a Tournament of Pieces puzzle but we did debut it at the event. So for those who saw it, sorry we sold out at the show but it’s online now! :) Aurora is a colourful gradient puzzle featuring the most magnificent night sky one could ever experience. Animals take shape in star form dancing across an aurora borealis night. Below the sky, a cabin is tucked away on the tree lined mountain and the owners have a roaring campfire blazing, ready to roast the fresh fish that is undoubtedly on board the boat returning home.

title: Dungeon Run | 500 Piece
Description: Get ready to roll for initiative with Dungeon Run, a 500 piece puzzle by Tobe Fonseca created especially for the Tournament of Pieces speed puzzling event. This fantasy-filled maze is bursting with action, perfect for puzzle warriors and D and D lovers alike. From the moment you enter the dungeon, it’s non-stop mayhem and magic. Characters dash through twisting halls, fend off mob bosses, loot treasure chests, and dive into battle with everything from daggers to determination. A flurry of activity fills every corner of the puzzle, keeping your eyes darting and your imagination racing. Packed with playful chaos and epic encounters, Dungeon Run delivers an adventurous puzzling quest that’s anything but ordinary.

title: D20 Dragons | 500 Piece
Description: D20 Dragons by artist Jacob Walker is an adorable image with dragons appreciating and loving on their D20 die. We hope you feel the magic from the variety of dragons featured here, conjuring up all kinds of fun. This puzzle was created specifically for the Tournament of Pieces 2025, which celebrated Origins 50 years of gaming!

title: Pairs Relay | Easy Handling 275pc
Description: Summer Chorus and Farm Cats Easy Handling 275 piece puzzles were played together as a PAIRS Relay in the Origins Tournament of Pieces speed puzzling competition in June 2025. They can be enjoyed on their own and purchased individually, but if combined together, one can test themselves against the winning time. The contest allowed for a total time of 1 hour to complete both 275 piece puzzles. The relay requires that two people individually work on a single puzzle for five-minutes at a time, then switch. If one puzzle is fully assembled before the other one is completed, then only one person at a time will work on the remaining puzzle in five-minute increments. After the five-minutes, the puzzlers will switch with the other person continuing to assemble the puzzle in five-minute increments. During the time where only one person can work on the remaining puzzle, the other puzzler may coach, but they cannot touch the puzzle when it's not their turn. Switching places continues until both puzzles are completed or the one-hour time limit is reached.

title: Chez Michelle & Country Friends | Easy Handling 275pc
Description: Chez Michelle and Country Friends Easy Handling 275 piece puzzles were played together as a SOLO Double Header in the Origins Tournament of Pieces speed puzzling competition in June 2025. These puzzles can be enjoyed on their own and purchased individually, but if combined together, one can test themselves against the winning time. The contest allowed for a total time of 1 hour and 45 minutes to complete both 275 piece puzzles. Which one do you think is the easier of the two? Some puzzlers told us they don’t ever want to see a cow, hahah! Good luck! And congrats to all players and the three who won, check below for their winning times.

title: Peace | 1000 Piece
Description: Any time of the year is a good time to wish for Peace. This 1000 piece collage puzzle is a celebration of peace around the world. Colourful blocks each express the word peace in a different language. What a lovely puzzle to enjoy yourself and gift to someone who desires to bring peace to their table. Top row: Japanese, Hebrew, Greek (pink), German (blue) Middle row: Swahili (red), Russian/Ukrainian/other Slavic languages with Cyrillic characters (turquoise), Afrikaans/Dutch (green), English Bottom row: Arabic, Hindi, French

title: Evening Service | Discontinued 1000 Piece (Old Big Box)
Description: IMPORTANT! Pre-2023 box design, which is 10" x 14", linen print, includes a reference poster. Note that our new boxes are compact at 8.25" x 11.25". The discontinued puzzles are not available in the new compact box. Once these are gone, they're gone. Please refer to our information tab below "BOX AND POSTER INFO" for more details.

title: Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy Collector's Edition
Description: An invitation to a planetoid on the edge of Sol reveals a singularity, a new name bestowed by the Nine, and new questions from Earth’s past. Kepler holds many mysteries, one of which is a manila envelope, its contents collected from across the sands of Kepler. The Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy Collector’s Edition includes an 1/8 scale statue of the three Guardian classes. Dynamically captured in their Super poses are the Arc Hunter, Solar Warlock, and Void Titan. This detailed statue stands over a foot tall and features beautiful gold accents. The bronze-painted characters are hewn with battle details carved along their bodies, telling the stories of the battles they engaged in, and the victories they’ve earned. Inscribed with the Guardian icons and a mysterious, inspiring quote from sources unknown, it’s the perfect tribute to the Lightbearers who stand as protectors of the Last City, humanity, and their allies. Also contained within: a full manila envelope, lost through time, with insights and secrets to explore and a badge, with its own secrets, carved with exquisite detail, and made of a heavy, patinaed metal. The Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy Collector's Edition does NOT contain a physical disc or digital copy of the game. Final product design subject to change. PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS Highly detailed statue of the three Guardian classes A manila envelope with classified contents A stranger’s metal badge, earned and treasured PRODUCT DETAILS Licensed by Bungie, Inc. title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Master 9 Eyes 1/12 Vinyl
Description: Master 9 Eyes has entered the universe of Assassin’s Creed Shadows! Inspired by the success of Ubisoft's Assassin's Creed Shadows starring stealthy ninja Assassin Naoe and powerful samurai Yasuke, Purearts has teamed up with the talented artist Daytoner to bring you the Assassin’s Creed Shadows Master 9 Eyes 1/12 Scale Vinyl Art Toy. This futuristic, chunky samurai is the perfect blend of both a badass character and perfectly designed shapes and symmetry. He is equipped with 6 samurai swords, which can be placed in his hands for battle or in his backpack. His signature look is completed by his puffed jacket and katana backpack, stylized to stun in the world of Assassin’s Creed Shadows. Description: “Nothing is true, everything is permitted.” The iconic PureArts Animus Ezio ¼ Scale Statue, now in a 1/8 Scale Statue! Master Assassin and Assassin’s Creed II protagonist Ezio Auditore stands atop an intricate base inspired by the Santa Maria del Fiore Cathedral. The quintessential PureArts animus-LED effect representing the bridge between past and present materializes from Ezio’s left side. Standing at 11 inches tall, the Animus Ezio 1/8 Scale Statue is the perfect size for any Assassin’s Creed fans’ set up! Each Animus 1/8 Scale Statue connects with the Animus Link to light up your collection! title: Assassin’s Creed Animus Eivor 1/8 Scale Statue
Description: "Odin Is With Us." The iconic PureArts Animus Eivor ¼ Scale Statue, now in a 1/8 Scale Statue! Fierce Viking raider and protagonist of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla Eivor is battle-hungry with the severed head of his enemy at his feet on an icy base. Inspired by ice crystals, the quintessential PureArts animus-LED effect representing the bridge between past and present materializes from Eivor’s left side. Standing at 11 inches tall, the Animus Eivor 1/8 Scale Statue is the perfect size for any Assassin’s Creed fans’ set up! Each Animus 1/8 Scale Statue connects with the Animus Link to light up your collection! title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Shogi Board Game
Description: The limited-edition Assassin’s Creed Shadows Shogi Boardgame blends Japanese culture and the iconic Assassin’s Creed universe to create a visually and intellectually interesting game of strategy. The standard tournament size wooden board is adorned with sculpted metal corners and accents and features the Assassin’s Creed Shadows crest to create a stunning high-quality game set. Each bamboo wood game piece shows the silhouette of an Assassin’s Creed Shadows character and can be stored in the wood drawer storage compartment. The perfect combination of culture and fandom, the Assassin’s Creed Shadows Shogi Boardgame is a must-have for both Assassin’s Creed fanatics and avid board game players. title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Geralt of Rivia 1/6 Scale Premium Articulated Figure
Description: “The world doesn’t need a hero. It needs a professional.” – Geralt of Rivia The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Geralt of Rivia 1/6 Scale Articulated Figure is hand-crafted and highly detailed, complete with wool rooted hair, battle-worn armor, and expertly tailored real clothing to create an extremely realistic rendition of the White Wolf. title: DAYTONER // Enslaving Humanity in Style - Artbook
Description: ORDER A MASTER 9 EYES GRAVITY OR ANTI-GRAVITY 1/6 RESIN ART TOY FOR A FREE ENSLAVING HUMANITY IN STYLE ARTBOOK! CLICK HERE TO SHOP M9E! Only available in the US & Canada! Please email support@purearts.com to arrange shipping if you're outside these regions! From the brilliant mind that created Master 9 Eyes, Daytoner: Enslaving Humanity in Style is a complete compilation of the concept art Daniel Hahn created over the past few years under his alias Daytoner, short DTNR. Robots, mechs and character designs are Daniel's big passions and DTNR, is his outlet and home for this obsession. In this book he pairs his creations with short stories that look back at a possible future. The project started as a small blog in 2012 when Daniel moved to Los Angeles and is a journey through the depths of his unhinged creative mind and the world of his robots. Only available in the US & Canada! Please email support@purearts.com to arrange shipping if you're outside these regions! Product Information Qty: 1 book 212 Pages Book Height: 10.5 in (26.67 cm) Book Width: 1 in (2.54 cm) Book Depth: 12 in (30.48 cm) Book Weight: 3.8 lbs (1.72 kg)

title: Munchkin Warhammer 40,000: Grudges and Gore *PRE-ORDER*
Description: ETA Q1 2026Munchkin Warhammer 40,000 is expanding! Again! This 112-card set features three more Armies: the towering golden champions of the Adeptus Custodes, the resourceful Leagues of Votann, and the traitorous legion of the World Eaters. Will you defend the Imperium, destroy the false Emperor, or hold a grudge against any who wrong you? Whichever path you choose, your games of Munchkin Warhammer 40,000 will be bigger (and gorier) than ever!

title: Chainlink *PRE-ORDER*
Description: ETA Q4 2025Viral on TikTok: Inspired by the popular TikTok trend, ChainLink is the ultimate battle of quick thinking and word association, where players race to connect words before their minds go blank.Whether you're linking "Coffee" to "Date" or "Dog" to "Bite," the challenge gets trickier with each turn and the pressure is on to keep up!Race to Complete the Chain: Players take turns guessing the missing links in the word chain. Grab your friends and your family and begin your race to the bottom, ChainLink is ideal for anyone who loves word games, fast paced games, and board games.WHAT'S IN THE BOX: 450 Cards With 900 Unique Words, RulebookWhy You'll Love It: Easy to play, fast paced party game, great for big groups and family game nightsFor ages 15+ | 3+ players | 30+ min

title: Splendor Kids *PRE-ORDER*
Description: Designer Marc André Publisher Space Cowboys Players 2-4 Playtime 30-30 mins Suggested Age 6 and up Additional Info 453472/splendor-kids http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/453472/splendor-kids/forums/63 Play travelers that deliver food across the kingdom. Splendor is a game of chip-collecting.On your turn, you may (1) collect chips (food), or (2) move forward on the paths.If you collect chips, you take either three different kinds of chips, two chips of the same kind or one joker chip, which you can use as any food.If you move forward, you pay its price in chips and add it to your playing area.Some place on the board let you take food that you can use and reactivate, some place let you play again.Be the first to reach the Palace of Splendor and earn the Queen’s Medal!

title: Zenith: Secret Agents *PRE-ORDER*
Description: Designer Grégory GrardMathieu Roussel Publisher PlayPunk Players 2 Playtime 25-35 mins Suggested Age 12 and up Additional Info 453941/zenith-secret-agents http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/453941/zenith-secret-agents/forums/63 ETA Q4 2025 Refresh your deck and your tactics with a compact add-on for Zenith. The Secret Agents booster introduces new Agent cards that plug straight into the base game, unlocking fresh lines of play and tighter decision space with minimal rules overhead. Designed for 2–4 players (ages 12+, ~25–35 min), it’s an easy way to diversify strategies and boost replayability between missions to the Senate.

title: Potion Explosion: Collector's Edition *PRE-ORDER*
Description: Designer Stefano CastelliAndrea CrespiLorenzo Silva Publisher Horrible Guild Players 2-6 Playtime 30-45 mins Suggested Age 8 and up Additional Info 453174/potion-explosion-collectors-edition http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/453174/potion-explosion-collectors-edition/forums/63 ETA Q4 2025 Potion Explosion celebrates its 10th anniversary with a bang! This lush big box edition of the marble-drafting, tonic-brewing classic includes all the components from the core game, both The Fifth Element and The Sixth Student expansions, all mini-expansions released so far, as well as a brand new unique Potion, while also upgrading all tokens to wood.

title: Starship Interstellar (Minor Damage)
Description: Designer Davide CalzaAndrea Crespi Publisher Pendragon Game Studio Players 1-4 Playtime 90-120 mins Suggested Age 14 and up Expansions Starship Interstellar: Danger from KuiperStarship Interstellar: Anti MatterStarship Interstellar: Halley's Comet Additional Info 334827/starship-interstellar http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/334827/starship-interstellar/forums/63 2357: in stark contrast to mankind’s hopes, violent astronomical events and the unregulated use of the new “solar extraction” technology have greatly accelerated the growth rate of our star during the recent decades. Now the Sun is nearing the end of its life cycle, and its fate -as any other star of its category- is to transform into a Red Giant.This will result in an exceptional increase in volume that will cause it to engulf Mercury, Venus, and possibly Earth itself.In the best-case scenario, the increase in volume will stop short of our planet’s destruction, but life as we know it would have already been destroyed due to radiation and the dramatic increase in surface’s temperatures.Our only hope, as mankind, is to build a colossal interstellar spaceship that would allow a fraction of humanity to evacuate on a “new earth” we have located in the Trappist star system during our search for viable extrasolar planets.Such a project, however, is far from simple: the resources we need can’t be found on our planet, and the few made available from the solar extraction technology are still insufficient. The only way to complete this monumental task is to harvest the materials needed directly from the other planets of our solar system.Every player will guide a Nation with the aim of becoming the foremost contributor in the race for the interstellar spaceship. If mankind is to be saved, whichever nation will be deemed the greatest contributor will have the honor of guiding humanity on this new Earth.—description from the publisher

title: The Witcher: Old World (Deluxe Edition) (Minor Damage)
Description: Designer Łukasz Woźniak Publisher CD Projekt RED Players 1-5 Playtime 90-150 mins Suggested Age 14 and up Additional Info 331106/witcher-old-world http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/331106/witcher-old-world/forums/63 In The Witcher: Old World, you become a witcher — a professional monster slayer — and immerse yourself in the legendary universe of The Witcher franchise.Set years before the saga of Geralt of Rivia, The Witcher: Old World explores a time when monsters roamed the Continent in greater numbers, creating a constant peril that required the attention of expertly trained monster slayers, known as witchers. Five competing schools trained their adepts through brutal regimes, and once fully prepared, these now-recognized witchers set off to explore the land, seeking trouble and adventures and helping others for coin.In this competitive adventure board game, 2-5 players travel across a vast map, embarking on masterfully penned quests, encountering and making ambiguous moral choices, fighting monsters — and sometimes brawling with other witchers to defend their school's honor!The game lets players construct their own unique decks of cards by choosing from a wide range of abilities: attacks, dodges, and witcher combat magic — known as "signs". Through card synergy, players aim to achieve powerful combos as they utilize their witcher school's hallmark abilities to their full potential. Quests, battles, and even dice poker allow each player to earn money, obtain new items, and train their skills.The first player to acquire 4-6 trophies, with the number being set at the start of play, wins the game instantly. You can obtain trophies by killing monsters, instigating and winning chaotic tavern brawls against another witcher, training attributes to their highest level, and resolving certain quests throughout their adventure.The game will include a Solo Mode that will allow for a solitaire adventure on the Continent.

title: Velonimo: Legends
Description: Designer Bruno Cathala Publisher asmodee Players 2-5 Playtime 30-40 mins Suggested Age 7 and up Additional Info 366238/velonimo-legends http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/366238/velonimo-legends/forums/63 6 promo cards to add to the game, offered at conventions and by board game stores.Rules5 Legendary Sports ManagersEach player receives a random Legendary Sports Manager Card at the beginning of the game and place it in front of them.You may use it only if you don't own the Peas-and-Carrots Jersey. When you use your card, flip it face down.The player with the fewest points may reactivate their Sports Managers Cards at the end of the round.Broom WagonAt the end of each round, the player who finished last takes the card and place it face up in front of them.Once per round, they may play it to add +5 to their attack.The Broom Wagon cannot be played with a Baroudeur (Hare).

title: Vikings: Raid & Conquer
Description: Designer Derek HodginsDave PhelpsJonathan Thwaites Publisher High Roller Games Players 2-5 Playtime 60 mins Suggested Age 13 and up Additional Info 205419/vikings-raid-and-conquer http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/205419/vikings-raid-and-conquer/forums/63 Description from the publisher:Raid & Conquer is based on the hit TV series, Vikings. This strategic deck building card game is designed to bring out the Viking in any fan and even challenge the most skilled gamers. Experience the life and times of an ambitious Viking in the course of an hour. There are shaky alliances and brutal betrayals. You can battle each other or work together and travel to newly discovered lands to Raid and Pillage. Are you willing to share the plunder when you're in command?Your goal is to become the next Viking legend. Play as one of the 5 main characters from the show: Ragnar, Lagertha, Rollo, Floki or Bjorn. Go on raids, attack other characters and collect treasure!The game ends when a player has collected 5 Raid Cards. This does not mean that the player has won the game. Rather, all characters count their total Legend Points found in each of the Treasure cards and Raid cards.If you are the player with the most Legend Points, you become Viking king and win the game of Raid & Conquer! Congratulations! You are now the most legendary Viking of all time. The stories of your bravery and ambition will be told for generations to come.This is Season 1, Episode 1 of your Viking adventure. What happens next... is up to you.

title: Vindication: Rectification Kit
Description: Regretfully, a few production errors were made on the Chronicles expansion and the fully loaded version of the Archive of the Ancients box. This replacement kit is intended to make your copies of the game everything they were intended to be. Summary:Wooden Rapport TokensIf 10 of your 15 rapport tokens did not come with printed icons, keep the printed one in color. Replace the 10 tokens that are blank on both sides with the 10 printed ones in this kit. Legendary Title CardsThere should be a total of 30 legendary title cards, 5 each of 6 types. Add these 24 to the 6 included in your game to total 30. In some instances, we have incorrectly referenced these as "legendary power" cards. Renown TokensThe correct renown tokens should be double-sided with a "-2" honor and red background on one side. Replace all 32 renown tokens with the 32 included here. Cheat SheetThe original base game cheat sheet (with the top reading "A Player's Turn) ha been updated to refernce the unified rulebook. Replace yours with the ones included.

title: Undergrove - Tile Holders

title: Topoum: Bratatatata – Expansion Deck I
Description: Designer Perepau Llistosella Publisher Looping Games Players 2-4 Playtime 60-90 mins Suggested Age 14 and up Additional Info 205600/topoum-bratatatata-expansion-deck-i http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/205600/topoum-bratatatata-expansion-deck-i/forums/63 Topoum: Bratatatata – Expansion Deck I consists of: 49 cards in 7 new types 1 farmer card 1 Event card 4 player aids card 1 rulebook

title: Room 25: VIP – Raptor Promo Tile
Description: Designer François Rouzé Publisher Matagot Players 1-8 Playtime 30 mins Suggested Age 10 and up Expansion For Room 25Room 25: VIPRoom 25 Ultimate Additional Info 256782/room-25-vip-raptor-promo-tile http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/256782/room-25-vip-raptor-promo-tile/forums/63 A bonus tile for Room 25 : VIP. With this tile you can use the Raptor miniature included in the boardgame "RAPTOR". Or you can use just a pawn if you didn't own this game.Rules:Place a Raptor in this room when revealed.Each time a character enters a room (player or robot) occupied by the raptor immediately applies this effects:• If the new arrival is from a blue or red room the raptor stay in the room and eliminate him.• If the new arrival is from a green or yellow room the raptor escape into the room he come from and eliminate all character in it.

title: Run Run Run! - Deluxe Acrylic Standees
Description: Deluxe upgrade pack for your Run Run Run! base game. This set features the full set of 11 acrylic standees to replace the wooden version found in the base game. It includes 4 cat adventurers, 3 boss dog mummies, and 4 regular dog mummies. Requires the base Run Run Run! game to play.

title: Quick!Quick!Quick!
Description: Designer Liu Xianmiao Publisher Activate Players 1-8 Playtime 1-8 mins Suggested Age 5 and up Additional Info 261120/quickquickquick http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/261120/quickquickquick/forums/63 As a rescue expert, the player needs quick and effective dismantling and rescue at the scene after the earthquake.Quick!Quick!Quick! is a race speed puzzle game, the experience is very tense and exciting, the game has a lot of different level of level, a single rule and multi person rules and cooperation rules, with different time length requirements, suitable for push new, but also suitable for different strategic difficulty needs of players.

title: Philosophy: Sage Expansion
Description: Designer Galen Goodwick Publisher Quality Beast Players 2-3 Playtime 15-45 mins Suggested Age 10 and up Expansion For Philosophy Additional Info 371046/philosophy-sage-expansion http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/371046/philosophy-sage-expansion/forums/63 This expansion adds a sage-colored set of tiles to enable Philosophy to be played with three players.

title: Philosophy: Amber Expansion
Description: Designer Galen Goodwick Publisher Quality Beast Players 2-3 Playtime 15-45 mins Suggested Age 10 and up Expansion For Philosophy Additional Info 371047/philosophy-amber-expansion http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/371047/philosophy-amber-expansion/forums/63 This expansion adds an amber-colored set of tiles to enable Philosophy to be played with three players.

title: Phantom Ink
Description: Designer Mary FlanaganMax Seidman Publisher Resonym Players 2-8 Playtime 10-15 mins Suggested Age 13 and up Honor 2022 Golden Geek Best Party Game Nominee2023 Mensa Recommended2024 GEEKS d'OURO Family/Party Board Game of the Year Nominee2024 Gra Roku Best Party Game Nominee2024 Spiel des Jahres Recommended Additional Info 330592/phantom-ink http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/330592/phantom-ink/forums/63 Renowned mediums are competing to figure out a secret object and prove they can connect with the "World Beyond". The first team to figure out the secret object wins!To set up Phantom Ink, divide players so that the Sun team and the Moon team each have one Spirit and up to three Mediums. The mediums on a team share a hand of seven question cards, and the spirits begin the game by choosing one of the five objects on a card as the secret object. On a turn, the mediums pass two question cards to their spirit, with sample questions like "What color is it most commonly?", "What fictional character has it or uses it?", and "If it were a musical instrument, what would it be?"The spirit discards one question card face up, then returns the question card it's going to answer to their mediums, then slowly writes the answer one letter at a time for all to see. As soon as the mediums think they know what this clue word is, they yell "Silencio", and the spirit stops writing. The other team of mediums might see only the letter "Y", but if you know the question is "What color is it?", then you know the clue must be "yellow". To end your turn, draw two new question cards.On a turn, instead of handing over question cards, you can attempt to guess the answer — and to do so you write like the spirits, one letter at a time. If you write an incorrect letter, the spirits will stop you, marking out your error, with your partial guess giving the other team more information. If you guess the entire word correctly, you win!Awards & Honors:Game Makers Guild - Seal of ApprovalThe Dice Tower - Seal of Approval

title: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid – Forever Red Pack
Description: Designer Jonathan Ying Publisher Renegade Game Studios Players 2-5 Playtime 45-60 mins Suggested Age 14 and up Expansion Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid Additional Info 417415/power-rangers-heroes-of-the-grid-forever-red-pack http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/417415/power-rangers-heroes-of-the-grid-forever-red-pack/forums/63 Includes 10 different combat cards (2 copies each) that you can use to customize your deck for any Red Ranger, celebrating the long history of the often-times leaders of Power Ranger teams.

Perfect for hot sleepers, these sheets will help you stay cool all night long. The Hardcore Bundle is the easiest way to maximize comfort in one step and includes a Core Sheet Set (1 Fitted Sheet, 1 Flat Sheet, and 2 Pillowcases), extra Pillowcases, and a Duvet Cover.

A mix of premium fabrics and yarns blend together in this polka-dotted, colorful pattern that brings life and dimension to any space. Mixed premium fabrics and yarns blend together in a basket-like weave to create dimensional texture, warmth, and softness you’ll want to take with you everywhere. Material: 53% Alpaca, 24% Cotton, 17% Polyamide, 6% Wool Made In: Peru Care: Dry clean only

Description: We all love the support of something beautiful, and our Prism Alpaca Lumbar Pillow does just that. title: HexMill Tabletop Salt & Pepper Grinder Set
Description: You’ve spent a lot on steak, only to watch as your guests reach for… stale, pre-ground pepper? Nope. Set out our luxe new HexMill Tabletop Salt and Pepper Grinders instead. They’re 18 percent bigger (think: easier to turn) so they hold more salt or pepper. And our high-tech burr grinder ensures more seasoning per crank.

title: End Grain Walnut Charcuterie Board
Description: Charcuterie, anyone? This artisanal board looks almost too fancy to cut on, but it’s designed for just that. It’s stunning and its end grain composition is gentler on knives than common edge grains. Due to its thickness of 1.5 inches, it won’t warp. Thanks to its checkerboard pattern, it looks incredible in any kitchen. *Free shipping to contiguous US

title: Griddle Tool Set, 8-pc
Description: Everything you need to be a griddle master. Designed for use with our Hybrid griddle pans, these tools can handle the heat. Make juicy smash burgers, perfect sunny side-up eggs for breakfast sandwiches and more. Griddle Spatula: Long, narrow silicone spatula features a beveled edge–ideal for chopped steak and teppanyaki flat-top cooking. Wide Turner: Ideal for burgers or pancakes; flexible silicone head easily slides under food, making flipping a cinch. Tongs: Silicone-tipped tongs have a gravity locking mechanism for easy one-handed locking and unlocking. Egg Rings: This set of four, silicone rings produce a perfectly round egg, ideal for sandwiches and silver dollar pancakes. Smash Burger Press: Heavy-weight burger press is ceramic nonstick-coated for no sticking and easy cleanup. Even pressure creates juicy, flavorful smashed burgers.

title: Hybrid Fry Pan Set With Lids, 6-pc
Description: Here’s an ideal starter set of pans, whether you’re a novice or a pro cook investing in "the good stuff” for the first time. These are the three that home cooks reach for the most. There’s an 8" pan ideal for scrambled eggs, a 10" number for solo meals and a 12" skillet for sizzling up steaks, chops, veggies or chicken. *Free shipping to contiguous US

title: Kitchen Utensil Set, 9-pc
Description: It’s time to finally upgrade that mishmash of kitchen utensils you’ve been using forever. This set of tools specifically designed for our cookware–from a big basting spoon to a nimble fish spatula–features high-grade stainless steel, high temperature–resistant silicone, top-notch craftsmanship and a PVD* gunmetal finish. (Think: Fewer fingerprints.) Sleek and modern at once, a meticulously designed matte black ceramic crock with a silicone liner and nonslip base lend the whole set a polished look. Heat-resistant up to 450ºF and dishwasher-safe, they upgrade your whole kitchen in a seamless way. 9-piece Set Includes: Turner: Featuring just the right amount of flexibility to get under any food that needs to be flipped, this silicone turner stands up to the heat, and is ideal for searing and griddles. Spoon: Large silicone spoon head with a flexible edge enables scraping, mixing and serving. Naturally nonstick, it can handle even the thickest mashed potatoes. Ladle: The six-ounce ladle’s perfect-pour edge means no more dribbling–ideal for soup, stew, chili, sauce or even punch. Pasta Server: Specially designed tines grab and lift pasta for even portioning and easy release, especially of longer noodles such as fettucini. Spatula: Flexible silicone blade is nimble enough to fold whipped egg whites, scrape bowls, scramble eggs and turn omelets or crepes. Whisk: French-style, 12-wire whisk mixes, aerates and emulsifies ingredients with ease. Use it for cake batters, vinaigrettes, sauces and whipped creams. Fish Spatula: Thin, flexible stainless-steel head with long slots, this spatula is designed to easily under fish fillets (and burgers!) without damaging them. Wok Spoon: Jumbo stainless-steel perforated spoon lifts and drains with speed–perfect for deep-frying dumplings, seafood boils and wok cooking. Crock: Matte black ceramic holder with silicone liner and nonslip base keeps all the utensils you need close at hand. * What is PVD? PVD (Physical Vapor Deposition) is a metal finishing process that results in a lustrous, extremely durable, fingerprint-resistant metallic finish.

title: Walnut Cutting Board, Large
Description: Our double-sided Walnut Cutting Boards, featuring stunning contrasting grains, have exactly what you want in a wooden cutting board. Known for its exceptional density and durability, walnut can withstand the impact of cutting tools–and resist deep knife scratches–better than softer woods. Walnut’s natural antimicrobial properties can help inhibit the growth of bacteria, too, which is crucial for cutting boards that come into contact with raw meat and produce. Plus, our Walnut Cutting Boards will (when properly cared for) outlast their plastic counterparts. And best of all, they’re now even more of a workhorse in your kitchen and on your table: One side features a juice groove to keep juice and jus from running all over your counter, while a flat side provides a broad chopping surface. Handles make lifting a cinch, so the board can also double as a sleek charcuterie serving piece. Luxurious, high-end walnut boasts a rich, dark color, is extraordinarily durable, and has antimicrobial properties that help inhibit bacterial growth. One side of the board features a groove for collecting juices, while recessed “handles” make lifting and moving the board from counter to the table a breeze. Thanks to its density, walnut minimizes the visibility of scratches – thus reducing the chance of deep crevices that could harbor bacteria. Walnut can actually self-heal, closing its grain when exposed to oil, when cared for properly. Additionally, its dense structure helps repel stains over time. The wood has a mild, pleasant aroma and is naturally resistant to absorbing food odors. Size: 13.75-inch x 19.5-inch *Free shipping to contiguous US

title: Eco Modern Market Bag (Azure)
Description: Meet your new go-to carry-all: Our Eco Modern Market Bag has the bells and whistles that a regular old canvas tote can only dream of. Made from durable, 100% recycled HexTwill™ fabric, it’s roomy enough for Sunday farmers’ market runs, gym visits and even a day at the beach. Plus, with exterior and interior pockets—and a zipper pouch to keep valuables safe—the Market Bag keeps your things in their proper place. It even lays flat for easy storage in your car, bike, closet or wherever else you need a reusable bag within reach. And four snappy color and pattern options mean you can reduce your impact on the environment and look good doing it. Features: Each Market Bag body is made out of HexTwill™ recycled fabric, 100% rPET (recycled polyethylene terephthalate), keeping 47 plastic bottles out of landfills. Comfortable, durable and machine-washable. Ideal for carrying fresh fruit and vegetables. Versatile for everyday chores, gym visits and more. Pockets (2 exterior, 6 internal) and a smart zipper pouch offer plenty of secure storage options. Choose your carrying style: Two sets of straps give the option of toting the bag over the shoulder or by hand.

title: Eco Modern Apron (Pinstripe, Cream)
Description: Care about the planet? Here's the apron for you. Made from our super-durable recycled HexTwill™ fabric, our Eco Modern Apron looks good from every angle. Each is made from plastic bottles that have been melted and spun into a sustainable yarn which is as stylish and functional as it is eco-friendly. Slim-fitting not to mention resists most cooking liquids, it features details you didn't know you needed. Think: A top phone pocket that snaps shut. Long lasting leather-tipped straps. Extra-wide utility pockets. A towel loop. Even a chart that'll help you when you forget your butter conversion! There's a lot to love here. Features: Each apron body is made out of HexTwill™ recycled fabric, 100% rPET (recycled polyethylene terephthalate), keeping plastic bottles out of landfills. Material resists water and most cooking liquids, staying cleaner longer. Top hexagonal pocket snaps shut and can fit a standard size phone or mini notepad. Extra-wide waist pockets big enough for a bench scraper, tasting spoon or tweezers. Adjustable neck strap and extra-long waist ties with durable leather tips all for the perfect fit. Convenient towel loop for easy access to keep things clean. Cooking conversion chart printed on the underside of each apron, plus a printed QR code linked to hundreds of HexClad recipes. Packaged in a HexTwill recycled bag that doubles as a tote bag. One size fits all.
