title: Hybrid Domed Lid, 14"
Description: The HexClad 14" Lid fits both our 14" Hybrid Pan and 14" Hybrid Wok. It features a stainless steel exterior with a tempered glass center. Tempered glass construction also helps protect against cracks and breaks. *Free shipping to contiguous US

title: Damascus Steel Starter Knife Set, 2-pc
Description: An ideal knife starter set, this dynamic duo comprises two of our most popular knives in smaller, more nimble sizes. There’s a petite, 6-inch chef’s knife ideal for everyday slicing, dicing and mincing, plus a versatile serrated sandwich knife perfect for cutting crusty bread, sandwiches, tomatoes and bagels. (The latter has a round, broad, blade for spreading, too; it’s the knife equivalent of the everything bagel!) Both knives are forged from 67 layers of Japanese Damascus steel for a harder blade–a 60 Rockwell rating–and a sharper edge that stays sharp longer, for effortless slicing. What's Included: 6-inch chef’s knife is a smaller, more agile chef’s knife for everyday prep. 5-inch sandwich knife has scalloped serrations designed to cut through the crispy, soft crust of breads and bagels, and effortlessly through delicate-skinned fruits and vegetables. Knives utilize the 3-step Honbazuke sharpening method–plus an advanced heat treatment to enhance hardness and corrosion resistance–resulting in a super-sharp, 12-degree edge. Arched design and amazing ergonomic grip features a unique green Pakkawood handle, infused with resin to increase resistance to moisture, cracking and splintering.

title: Steamer Basket Set, 2-pc
Description: Eating more healthfully can be simply a matter of having the right gear–making delicious food easier to execute. We all know that steamed veggies, dumplings, fish and the like are better for us than their butter-sauced equivalents (though those are great, too!) So make it a snap to get there: Our set of steamer baskets–ideal for your 3-quart and 8-quart pots–look stunning and can handle heat up to 425ºF. (You can even drain pasta with them!) They also collapse and nest, meaning you can tuck them into a drawer even if cabinet space is in short supply. Features: Two collapsible steamer baskets that fit into our 3-Quart and 8-Quart Hybrid pots. Steam vegetables, fish or seafood; rinse berries; drain pasta. Nonslip handles for easy handling in and out of the pot. Made of food-safe silicone and stainless-steel; heat-resistant up to 425ºF. Space-saving; stores flat when not in use. Dishwasher-safe. *Free shipping within Canada

title: Spicewalla: Black Peppercorn, Whole
Description: The best peppercorns quickly become an integral part of your cooking routine. When these small, spiky berries are freshly ground, they release a rich, pleasantly spicy bite with hints of fruitiness. They add depth to cacio e pepe and are—along with salt—a stellar costar in fresh salads. A few grinds of these peppercorns enhance everything from a classic au poivre sauce to every pasta recipe you love. One 14.9 oz (420g) container of black peppercorns Superior flavor with a spicy, fruity bite that is released when ground Imported from Southern India and Sri Lanka

title: Spicewalla: Pink Himalayan Salt, Coarse Grain
Description: The prettiest salt around gets its blush from trace minerals—more than 80 of them!—that also impart a slightly spicy note. Harvested under the Himalayan Mountains in Pakistan, it’s delightful on everything from salad greens to homemade potato chips. Use our HexMill salt grinder to keep it coarse for warm chocolate chip cookies, or grind it finely for your favorite pasta dish. Extra-coarse granules 34 oz (964g) per package Naturally enriched with more than 80 minerals Imported from the Himalayan mountains in Pakistan

title: Pizza Steel Accessory Set, 3-pc
Description: Pizza obsessives, the must-have gear set of your dreams is here. Designed especially for use with our Hybrid Pizza Steel, it includes a 16” cutting surface that doubles as a charcuterie board, a 15” rocking pie cutter, and a slice server. It is the ideal gift for the “pizzaficionado” in your life.

title: Hybrid Oval Dutch Oven, 6.5-Qt
Description: A kitchen workhorse for all your low-and-slow needs, the HexClad Oval Dutch Oven makes cooking longer cuts of meat, braises and stews foolproof. Some of us love an oval Dutch oven’s aesthetics, and how it makes your famous roast chicken, brisket or mussels look, from oven to trivet. Others appreciate that its oval shape offers more room for airflow and a more even cook around longer cuts such as pork tenderloin. Its 6.5-quart size is slightly larger than our original Dutch oven (think: more leftovers) but features all the same durability and reliable temperature control. Our patented Hybrid technology and the pot’s relatively light weight–a fraction of cast-iron competitors–make it easy to sear meat on the stove for a beautiful crust, then finish it in the oven for a meltingly tender finish.

title: Small Hybrid Roasting Pan with Rack
Description: Lovers of crisp-skinned chicken, rejoice! This is the small roasting pan of your dreams. It’s ideal for smaller birds like chicken, duck and Cornish game hen, and comes with a rack so you can circulate hot air around every part of the luscious finished product. Like our larger roasting pan, this roaster features our Hybrid surface, which combines stainless steel and our proprietary TerraBond™ ceramic nonstick for the ultimate in even cooking and easy clean-up. This is also a great size for pork tenderloin, small- to medium-sized roasts, pork rib roast and beef tenderloin. Pro tip: Either fill the pan with potatoes or root vegetables to soak up the delightful roast juices or turn them into gravy.

title: Dish Drying Mat, 2-pk
Description: From the clutter in the corners to the dishes situation, it’s challenging to keep a kitchen clean and dry. A rumpled towel to air-dry dishes isn’t gonna cut it any more, because this isn’t college. Meet the new HexClad Dish Drying Mat. Made from an absorbent, quick-drying material that can hold up to a cup of water, it’s just the thing to throw under a dish-drying rack, spread out on the counter for extra silverware, or use as a protective layer under small appliances. Its waterproof backing keeps moisture from seeping through, you can trim the extra-large surface to fit your counter–it won’t fray–and it’s machine-washable. A stable, slip-resistant backing and a low-profile surface help keep stemware stable. Bonus: It’s good-looking, and made in the USA. Includes a two-pack of extra-large 19" x 24" mats. Absorbent, odor-resistant fabric can hold up to 8 oz. of liquid. Ultra-thin design allows moisture to evaporate quickly. Provides a protective layer when placed under a dish rack or small appliances. Waterproof, slip-resistant backing prevents moisture from seeping through. Cut to fit with scissors; mat won’t fray. Low-profile mat keeps stemware and other delicate items stable. Easy-to-clean, machine-washable, and made from 50% recycled polyester fibers. Made in the USA.

title: Hybrid Stock Pot with Lid, 12-Qt
Description: Hosting? Holidays? Soup season? You’re gonna need our 12-quart stock pot, a big-batch wonder and the newest addition to our popular line of Hybrid nonstick pots. It’s ideal for starting a soup base, simmering up Sunday sauce, batching out turkey gumbo or making seafood boils for a crowd. (And consider how wonderful a huge pot of spiced cider is in winter, perfuming your home.) So go ahead and make your homemade chicken broth–you can fit the whole bird in here!–or a giant batch of your famous chili, ratatouille or fresh tomato sauce. Freeze small portions in ice cubes trays, put the cubes in plastic bags, and break out small amounts as you need them for risotto, pizzas and the like. Your future self will thank you.

title: Hybrid Fry Pan, 12"
Description: The HexClad 12" Pan is ideal when you’re cooking for a crowd. When it’s time for a family dinner or a group of friends for brunch, this spacious pan can handle the job. Whip up a frittata or easily cook two steaks at a time. Cook up at least four salmon fillets with room for veggies. There’s no stopping your culinary prowess with a pan that offers so many possibilities.

title: BBQ Tool Set, 8-pc
Description: You love to grill: You splash out on grass-fed beef, local produce, organic chickens, and high-end steaks. But your grilling gear has seen better days. Our BBQ tool set comes with all the bells and whistles a grill maestro like yourself could ever desire. A spatula, fork and locking tongs feature rust-resistant, stainless-steel construction, soft-grip handles and handy hanging loops. A silicone basting brush is heat-resistant to 425ºF. And the four extra-long, 15-inch skewers are flat, so your beloved veggies won’t roll across (or off!) the grill. When you’re done wowing your family and guests, you can pop these utensils in the dishwasher. Talk about a weeknight-friendly meal. 8-piece Set Includes: 18” grill spatula 18” locking tongs 17” silicone basting brush 18” grill fork Four 15” flat stainless-steel skewers *Free shipping to contiguous US

title: Splatter Screen
Description: You’ve just fried chicken right on the stovetop. (Go, you!) But then you see a fine mist of grease everywhere. Sigh. Enter: our new, folding splatter screen. Built to last, this heat-resistant silicone screen features a durable stainless-steel skeleton for added support; it also fits pans up to 12½ inches wide. The wonderful thing about a grease splatter screen is that it shields you and your cooking surface from sputtering hot fat without trapping in moisture (as a lid does). That keeps food crunchy and crispy–instead of soggy. When you’re done cooking, pop the splatter screen right in the dishwasher. It’s a win-win. Designed for pans up to 12½” wide, including our 10” & 12” pans and woks as well as our 3.3-QT, 4.5-QT, 5.5-QT and 7-QT deep sauté pans. Compact folding design for easy storage. Ideal for pan-frying, deep-frying and searing. Opens so the cook can conveniently add ingredients to the pan while cooking. Made of heat-resistant (up to 480ºF) silicone with a durable stainless-steel structure. Stay-cool silicone handle with stainless-steel locking hinge. Dishwasher-safe.

title: Eco Modern Apron (Slate)
Description: Care about the planet? Here's the apron for you. Made from our super-durable recycled HexTwill™ fabric, our Eco Modern Apron looks good from every angle. Each is made from plastic bottles that have been melted and spun into a sustainable yarn which is as stylish and functional as it is eco-friendly. Slim-fitting not to mention resists most cooking liquids, it features details you didn't know you needed. Think: A top phone pocket that snaps shut. Long lasting leather-tipped straps. Extra-wide utility pockets. A towel loop. Even a chart that'll help you when you forget your butter conversion! There's a lot to love here. Features: Each apron body is made out of HexTwill™ recycled fabric, 100% rPET (recycled polyethylene terephthalate), keeping plastic bottles out of landfills. Material resists water and most cooking liquids, staying cleaner longer. Top hexagonal pocket snaps shut and can fit a standard size phone or mini notepad. Extra-wide waist pockets big enough for a bench scraper, tasting spoon or tweezers. Adjustable neck strap and extra-long waist ties with durable leather tips all for the perfect fit. Convenient towel loop for easy access to keep things clean. Cooking conversion chart printed on the underside of each apron, plus a printed QR code linked to hundreds of HexClad recipes. Packaged in a HexTwill recycled bag that doubles as a tote bag. One size fits all.

title: Pothos Albo
Description: The Pothos Albo (Epipremnum pinnatum ‘Albo’) is a highly sought-after variety known for its unique variegation. Each leaf is one-of-a-kind, with patterns that range from bold, marbled streaks to delicate speckles. Left to trail, it cascades beautifully from shelves or hanging planters. Given climbing support, its leaves will grow larger and may even develop fenestrations as it matures! NOTE: Variegation may naturally vary from plant to plant, with some showing more white or green than others. However, with bright light and consistent care, the variegation often becomes more pronounced in new growth over time! Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Medium plant measures 8" to 14" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice

title: Monstera Esqueleto Skeleton Plant
Description: The Monstera esqueleto, also known as the 'Skeleton Plant', is a rare member of the Monstera family, prized by collectors for its delicate, lace-like foliage. Its leaves showcase intricate fenestrations with smaller openings near the center and larger cut-outs along the edges. From shelf plant to statement piece, its oversized, lacy leaves mature into an airy, sculptural focal point that elevates any room. NOTE: Fenestrations may vary from plant to plant, especially in younger specimens, but with optimal care, bright indirect light, and support for climbing, the holes will grow larger and more defined over time. Each plant is unique; size and shape fluctuate by season so all measurements are shown as a range Medium plants measure between 8" to 12" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled into your planter choice, if purchased

title: Ficus Shivereana
Description: The Ficus Shivereana is a rare cultivar of the popular Ficus elastica, also known as the rubber tree. Unlike its cousins, this variety stands out with stunning, speckled foliage in shades of pale green, creamy yellow, and soft peach. Each leaf is uniquely patterned—no two are the same! Low-maintenance and perfect for both collectors and first-time plant parents. Pro Tip: Bright light helps its colorful leaves stay vibrant, while the occasional trim can encourage branching for a fuller shape. Each plant is unique; size and shape fluctuate by season so all measurements are shown as a range Medium 6-inch plant measures between 8" to 12" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice

title: Philodendron Black Billietiae
Description: The Philodendron billietiae 'Black' is a collector’s gem, known for its elongated, heart-shaped leaves and burgundy-black petioles and undersides. This rare hybrid makes a bold statement indoors—and when mature, its leaves can grow up to three feet long! As it grows, you might want to add a coco coir pole to give it something to climb—or simply to keep its size in check. Climbing support, plenty of bright indirect light, and a bit of extra humidity can help it thrive and mature even faster. Like what you see? Pair it with one of its parent plants, the Philodendron Billietiae, known for its vivid orange petioles, for a standout duo in your growing collection! Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Medium plant measures 12" to 24" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice

title: Waxed Amaryllis Bulb
Description: Our Waxed Amaryllis Bulb is equal parts effortless and eye-catching — the perfect gift (or treat-yourself moment) for anyone who loves big blooms with zero fuss. No soil, water, or green thumb required! Each bulb is hand-dipped in wax, with unique finishes like the Picasso Amaryllis adorned in rose petals or white and red varieties wrapped in preserved moss. Just set it somewhere sunny and let the magic happen — soon, this sleek bulb will unfurl into vibrant blooms worthy of any gift table (or your own windowsill). Features & Benefits Zero Maintenance: No watering, soil, or fuss—just place and enjoy watching it grow! Long-Lasting Blooms: Produces stunning flowers that can last for weeks, brightening up any space with ease. Perfect for Gifting: Ready to display and easy to care for, making it an ideal gift for plant lovers and beginners alike. Display Tips Place your Waxed Amaryllis Bulb in a sunny spot and let it do the rest. It’s the ultimate no-fuss bloom—perfect for your holiday table, office desk, or anywhere that could use a pop of fresh color. Please note: Plant size can vary depending on environment.

title: Adjustable Plant Stand (LGL)
Description: Elevate your favorite houseplants with our adjustable plant stand. Stylish, mid-century modern design made from sustainable bamboo and hand-finished. This sturdy, adjustable stand can be used on either side, giving you two different heights to choose from, and it can adjust in diameter from 8 to 12 inches to fit medium and large planters up to 10 inches wide. Adjustable plant stand Bamboo, hand finished Closed measurements: 8" W x 13.5" H Extended measurements: 12" W x 13.5" H Can be used on either side: 4.5” depth on top, 7.5" depth on bottom Holds up to 35 lbs. Compatible with our Large Pallas Planter, Medium Hyde Planter, Medium Grant Planter

title: Variegated Whale Fin Snake Plant
Description: Meet the Variegated Whale Fin Snake Plant (Sansevieria masoniana variegata)—named for its large, paddle-shaped leaves that look just like whale fins! This rare beauty flaunts bright yellow variegation that really pops in bright, indirect light (though it can tolerate low light, too). Perfect if you want a statement plant that’s easy to love and even easier to care for. This plant propagates by producing adorable little “pups” that emerge from the soil near the base of the mother plant. These pups can happily grow alongside the mother or be separated when they’re a bit more mature. You might notice your plant leaning as new pups form—totally normal! Let her do her thing, or gently adjust her when it’s time to repot or divide. Each plant is unique; size and shape fluctuate by season so all measurements are shown as a range Medium plant measures between 8"-12" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice

title: Snake Plant Hahnii Gold
Description: Most snake plants grow tall and slender, but the Snake Plant ‘Hahnii Gold’ keeps it compact with a charming rosette shape. This variety stays small, only reaching about 12 inches tall, making it perfect for desks or shelves. Its light green centers are beautifully accented with bright yellow edges, adding a pop of color to any space. Snake plants also have proven air-purifying qualities, helping to remove toxins and improve indoor air quality! Each plant is unique; size and shape fluctuate by season so all measurements are shown as a range Small plant measures between 2"-3" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice

title: Teddy Bear Cactus
Description: Meet the Teddy Bear Cactus! A quirky twist on your classic cactus with soft, fuzzy “fur” and an eye-catching, wavy stem. Despite its wild appearance, this cactus is surprisingly easygoing and low-maintenance, thriving in bright light and needing just occasional watering. Perfect for plant parents who want a conversation starter that’s as tough as it is adorable. Each plant is unique; size and shape fluctuate by season so all measurements are shown as a range Small plants measure 2-4" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice

title: Calathea Vittata
Description: The Calathea Vittata brings bold style to your space with sleek, white-striped leaves that look hand-painted. Native to South America, it thrives in medium to bright indirect light and loves humidity, making it a great choice for bathrooms or kitchens. Pet-friendly and non-toxic, it's as safe as it is stylish! Each plant is unique; size and shape fluctuate by season so all measurements are shown as a range Small plants measure between 3"-5" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage and arrives in a 4" grow pot Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice

title: Peace Lily Party Pack
Description: Delight plant lovers with 6 Peace Lilies — their lush foliage, fun flowers, and forgiving nature make them an ideal choice for styling events, offices, and shared spaces. Wherever they're placed, they add a welcoming touch. Peace Lilies (Spathiphyllum), native to tropical regions of the Americas and Southeast Asia, are celebrated for both their air-purifying qualities and low-maintenance care needs. Low-lasting and reliable, they've earned their spot as a favorite for homes and workspaces alike. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Plants arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 8"-12" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage

title: ZZ Plant Party Pack
Description: Our ZZ Plant Party Pack includes 6 hardy, glossy-leaved ZZ Plants that flourish with almost no upkeep. Perfect for styling long events, brightening busy workplaces, or grounding lower-level apartments, these low-light-tolerant and drought-tolerant plants add lasting green without worry. ZZ Plants (Zamioculcas zamiifolia), native to eastern Africa, are prized for their thick, waxy foliage and remarkable resilience. They have a reputation for being one of the most reliable and fuss-free indoor plants to grow. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Plants arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 9"-12" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage

title: Echeveria Party Pack
Description: Bring charm to any celebration with our Echeveria Party Pack, available in sets of 6 or 12. These rosette-shaped succulents make thoughtful favors, swoon-worthy gifts, or striking additions to a potted arrangement. Compact, resilient, and fuss-free, they’re as rewarding for beginners as they are for long-time plant lovers. Echeveria succulents, native to semi-desert regions of Central and South America, thrive in bright light and need to be watered only when the soil has fully dried. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Succulents arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 2"-3" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Variety may change depending on time of year; we do our best to match your assortment to what is pictured

title: White Flowering Party Pack
Description: This curated pack includes 3 white Orchids and 3 white Anthuriums — two tropical favorites grown for their long-lasting blooms and rich symbolism. Style them together for a bold monochrome display or spread them out to tie your space together. Their complementary white flowers also make perfect pairings for showers, weddings, or other special events. What is an Anthurium? Anthuriums (often called “flamingo flowers”) can hold each bloom for up to eight weeks, with fresh ones popping up often. What looks like the flower is actually a waxy, heart-shaped leaf called a spathe, while the true blooms are the tiny structures on the central spadix. What is an Orchid? Phalaenopsis Orchids, or "moth orchids," are prized for their arching stems and intricate flowers. Symbolizing grace and new beginnings, Orchids typically bloom once or twice a year; however, bloom cycles can last up to three months. After flowers drop, the plant is simply recharging to bloom again. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Orchids arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure 20–28" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Athuriums arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure 12–16" from the soil line to the top of the foliage Orchids may arrive with a few buds not yet open; warmer indoor settings will help them unfurl

title: Fun Ficus Party Pack
Description: Jumpstart your Ficus collection with a curated set of 6 plants, featuring two or more different species. Each mix includes both green and variegated varieties, making it a fun way to fill empty planters at home or a thoughtful gift for fellow plant lovers. Ficus plants, also known as fig trees, are native to tropical and subtropical regions worldwide. They thrive in bright, indirect light and prefer to dry out between waterings. With proper care, Ficus plants can grow into long-term companions. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Plants arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 7"-11" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage

title: Watercolor Orchid Party Pack
Description: Bring a burst of color to any celebration with our Watercolor Orchid Party Pack — 6 orchids as fun, funky, and joyful as the event itself. Perfect for styling tables, brightening décor, and delighting guests to take home as favors, these orchids keep the celebration going. Choose from two color options: Assorted, with bold blooms in pink, purple, blue, green, and orange; or Aqua, with a serene ombré of ocean blues. These unique colors come from a safe dyeing process. When they re-bloom, they’ll return to their natural white or light pink color. Pro tip: You may notice a few blooms on arrival — these will open quickly in a warm indoor setting. Phalaenopsis orchids typically flower once or twice a year for up to three months. After a blooming cycle, flowers will drop as the plant stores energy to re-bloom again later this year or next. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Orchids arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 20–28” tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Bloom colors may vary slightly depending on time of year; we do our best to match your assortment to what is pictured

title: Orchid Confetti Party Pack
Description: Bring a splash of color to any space with our Orchid Party Pack, a set of six Phalaenopsis orchids in assorted hues — from soft pastels to bold, vibrant tones. Their long-lasting blooms are perfect for extending that summer feeling indoors this fall, or for styling showers, birthdays, and other celebrations. Easy to care for and fun to decorate with, Orchids brighten homes, events, and every corner in between. Pro tip: You may notice a few blooms on arrival — these will open quickly in a warm indoor setting. Phalaenopsis orchids typically flower once or twice a year for up to three months. After a blooming cycle, flowers will drop as the plant stores energy to re-bloom again later this year or next. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Orchids measure between 20"–28" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Bloom colors may vary slightly depending on time of year; we do our best to match your assortment to what is pictured

title: Fancy Philodendron Party Pack
Description: Host your own potting night, surprise a fellow plant lover, or finally fill those empty planters with our Fancy Philodendron Party Pack of 6 foliage all-stars. This collector's mix includes two Ring of Fires, two Pink Princesses, and two White Variegated Philodendrons. Philodendrons are beloved for their lush, sculptural leaves and adaptable nature, and this curated assortment is no exception. Thriving in bright, indirect light (with some varieties tolerating lower light), they’re content with minimal care: let the soil dry a bit between waterings, and they’ll reward you with steady growth and standout style. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season All plants arrive in 5" nursery grow pots Ring of Fire measures between 7"-12" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Pink Princess measures between 4"–9" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage White Variegated measures between 7"-12" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Plant type may vary slightly depending on time of year; we do our best to match your assortment to what is pictured

title: Colorful Anthurium Party Pack
Description: Brighten their day (or yours!) with our party pack of 6 Anthurium plants, sporting heart-shaped blooms in shades of pink, red, and white. They're a little retro, a little bold, and way longer-lasting than any bouquet. You can even snip the blooms and enjoy them in a vase with water for weeks. Anthuriums are known as the world’s longest blooming houseplant — each bloom can last up to eight weeks, with new ones appearing regularly. Fun fact: those flowers are actually waxy, modified leaves called spathes. To keep the color coming, give them bright, indirect light. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Plants arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 12–16" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Variety may change depending on time of year; we do our best to match your assortment to what is pictured

title: Calathea Rattlesnake Party Pack
Description: Celebrate in style with our Calathea Party Pack, featuring six Calathea 'Rattlesnake' full of color, texture, and natural movement. Easy to care for and endlessly eye-catching, they’re a meaningful way to celebrate, decorate, and gift green. Even better — they’re pet-friendly, making them a safe and stylish choice for households with curious pets. Calatheas are tropical plants known for their bold, patterned leaves that raise and lower from day to night, a phenomenon called nyctinasty and the source behind their nickname prayer plant. They thrive in bright, indirect light but can tolerate moderate to low light conditions. Allow the top half of soil to dry between waterings and try to provide a humid environment to keep them extra happy. Each plant is unique; size and shape fluctuate by season so all measurements are shown as a range Small plants measure between 3"-6" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in 5" nursery grow pots

title: White Anthurium Party Pack
Description: Our White Anthurium Party Pack features 6 Anthurium plants with long-lasting white flowers. Style them together for a striking centerpiece, bring life to empty vessels at home, or share them as favors at weddings and celebrations. Anthuriums are known as the world’s longest blooming houseplant — each bloom can last up to eight weeks, with fresh ones appearing regularly. For best results, give them bright, indirect light to keep the blooms coming. Fun fact: the Anthurium's flowers are actually waxy, modified leaves! Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Plants arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 12–16" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage

title: Norfolk Island Pine
Description: Norfolk Island Pine: Your Indoor-Friendly, Festive Tree If you're dreaming of a tree that brings forest vibes without the forest footprint, the Norfolk Island Pine is your answer. With soft, tiered branches and an elegant symmetry, it's like a pine tree in party clothes — perfect for year-round charm or seasonal decorating. Why You'll Dig It: Indoor-Adapted: Thrives indoors (or out) with bright, indirect light — no need for freezing winters or mountain climates. Easygoing Style: Low-maintenance and slow-growing, this evergreen doesn’t demand much but delivers serious style. Festive Potential: Many folks deck it out during the holidays as a unique Christmas tree — no needles on the floor, either. Container Champion: Although this variety can grow large if planted outdoors, it'll happily stay compact in pots. Add a splash of green indoors, or on porches and patios! Care Basics: Light: Bright, indirect light — a sunny window works wonders. Water: Let the top inch of soil dry between waterings. Think misty mornings, not rainforest floods. Humidity: Appreciates a bit of humidity, especially in dry homes — mist occasionally or buddy it up with other plants. Bring home the Norfolk Island Pine and enjoy a little evergreen elegance — no forest required.

title: Double White Single Amaryllis
Description: Double White Amaryllis: Holiday Elegance in Bloom Brighten your space with the snow-white double blooms of the Double White Amaryllis—a festive favorite that brings instant charm and cheer. Each lush flower layers petal upon petal, resembling a fully fluffed snowflake ready to steal the holiday spotlight. Pre-planted in a 6-inch green pot, it's ready for gifting, decorating, or giving your own home a seasonal upgrade. No wrapping, no waiting—just set it out and enjoy the show. Blooms indoors—perfect for tabletops, mantels, or bright windowsills Low-maintenance holiday décor—just water and watch it grow Double blooms add an extra layer of elegance Whether you're sharing the joy or sprucing up your own winter nest, this amaryllis is a no-fuss way to add natural beauty to the season. Please Note: Plant size can vary depending on environment.

title: Red and White Single Amaryllis
Description: Red and White Single Amaryllis: Make Your Holidays Magical Looking for an easy holiday wow-factor? The 'Minerva' Amaryllis brings bold beauty with its striking red blooms brushed with crisp white centers. Each pre-potted bulb arrives ready to grow in a festive 6-inch green container—no digging, no fuss. This winter stunner makes a cheerful gift or a vibrant accent for your seasonal décor. Simply place it in a sunny indoor spot and enjoy the show as its trumpet-shaped blooms burst to life. Perfect for tabletops, mantels, or brightening up the office. Why You'll Love the Red and White Single Amaryllis Pre-potted and gift-ready Classic red-and-white blooms ideal for the holidays Grows indoors—just add sunlight and water Perfect container size: 6-inch green decorative pot that fits any space Please Note: Plant size can vary depending on environment.

title: Little Ragu® Sweet Bay
Description: Little Ragu® Sweet Bay – Big Flavor, Smaller Package Little Ragu® Sweet Bay serves up that classic Mediterranean magic in a space-saving size. This compact, upright shrub or small tree keeps things tidy with deep green, aromatic leaves that pop against reddish stems—yes, it’s as good-looking as it is useful. Use the dried leaves to bring bold, savory flavor to soups and sauces (hello, homemade perfection). Beyond the kitchen, it’s an easy-care evergreen that fits right in whether you’re growing a formal topiary, low hedge, or just letting it do its handsome thing. The cherry on top? This holiday-perfect plant comes complete with festive, plaid container wrapping to make gift-giving and decorating simple! The wrap comes off after the holidays so you can continue enjoying your plant. Bonus: It thrives in containers, making it a stylish pick for patios, balconies, or sunny windows where you want beauty with a side of utility. Compact form perfect for small spaces Highly aromatic foliage with culinary value Evergreen structure—great year-round presence Ideal for hedges, topiary, or natural shapes Container-friendly for patios and indoor use

title: Red and White Trio Amaryllis
Description: Get Festive With the Red and White Trio Amaryllis Bring a bold burst of cheer to your space with this pre-potted Red and White Trio Amaryllis. Nestled in an 8-inch festive green container, three top-quality 'Minerva' bulbs are ready to grow and show—no digging, no mess, just instant holiday spirit. Each bulb sends up striking red blooms with snowy white centers, creating a candy-cane contrast that brightens windowsills, tablescapes, or desks. Since it arrives pre-planted, it's a thoughtful gift that says "wow" without needing a watering can wrapped in a bow. Perfect for indoor displays during the colder months, these amaryllis thrive in containers, delivering big color with minimal care. A natural centerpiece for holiday decorating or winter gifting—just add sunlight and watch the magic unfold. Why You'll Love the Red and White Trio Amaryllis: Ready to grow: Pre-potted and convenient for gifting and decorating Perfect colors: Classic red-and-white blooms for the holidays Easy care: Just add sunlight and water & watch it bloom! Tons of blooms: Enjoy three bulbs for three times the flowers! Please Note: Plant size can vary depending on environment.

title: Wilma Goldcrest Lemon Cypress
Description: Get Zesty Golden Foliage With Wilma Goldcrest Lemon Cypress With its zesty lemon scent and glowing golden-green foliage, the Wilma Goldcrest Lemon Cypress is a sunshine-packed pick-me-up for your garden or patio. Its naturally narrow, upright shape makes it a space-saving star—perfect for borders, pathways, or adding vertical interest in containers. This cheerful evergreen thrives in full sun and well-drained soil, showing off best when it’s soaking up the rays. Cold hardy in USDA Zones 7–10, it’s also a seasonal favorite for bringing indoors—think tabletop tree or holiday accent with a citrusy twist. If you're short on space but big on brightness, Wilma’s got you covered—no pruning needed to keep its tidy shape. Golden, lemon-scented foliage for year-round charm Ideal for containers, borders, or indoor seasonal décor Low-maintenance and drought-tolerant once established Don't wait to add this gorgeous, golden delight to your yard or patio!

title: Holiday Cactus
Description: Holiday Cactus: A Festive Showstopper That Lasts The Holiday Cactus, also known as the Thanksgiving Cactus, is your go-to fall and winter bloomer, delivering a burst of colorful flowers just when most plants are taking a break. It’s like holiday magic—on a stem! Blooms in winter: Just when you need a pop of color, this cactus comes alive with vibrant flowers in November, and often lasting through March. Low-maintenance love: Despite its delicate looks, this cactus thrives on neglect—perfect for busy folks or plant newbies. Indoor superstar: Loves bright, indirect light and cozy indoor temps. Ideal for adding cheer to windowsills or tabletops. Long-living legacy: With a little care, your Holiday Cactus could outlive your holiday decorations, offering long-lasting interest. Container friendly: Grows beautifully in pots, making it a space-saving solution for apartments and indoor gardens. If you're dreaming of a green Christmas (with a dash of floral flair), the Holiday Cactus delivers year after year. It’s not just a plant—it’s a festive tradition with roots! Please Note: Actual bloom color may vary from what is pictured.

title: Tiny Tower® Dwarf Alberta Spruce
Description: Need a low-maintenance showstopper that stays neat and compact? The Tiny Tower® Dwarf Alberta Spruce keeps it tight with its naturally dense, pyramidal shape—no shears required. This slow-growing evergreen shines in small gardens, urban landscapes, and containers where space is at a premium. Its bright green needles mature to a cool gray-green, adding year-round texture and color. Whether you're flanking an entryway, building a patio display, or crafting a formal topiary, this compact conifer delivers tidy structure without the fuss. And what's more is that this spruce comes decorated with festive, plaid container wrapping to make gift-giving as easy as can be! The wrap comes off after the holidays so you can continue enjoying your plant. Form: Tight, pyramidal habit with dwarf growth Foliage: Bright green turning gray-green with age Use it for: Specimens, containers, topiary, or structured garden design Evergreen: Holds color and shape all year

title: Ivory Prince Hellebore
Description: Ivory Prince Hellebore: Grow Garden Royalty Winter got you down? Meet the Ivory Prince, also known as the Christmas Rose—your cold-season hero that kicks off the garden party in early spring. This hellebore is one of the first perennials to bloom, flaunting upright, creamy-white flowers with hints of pink and chartreuse. Compact and classy, it's a natural fit for shady borders and woodland gardens, but it really shines in a container by the front door—where you’ll actually see it blooming through winter's gloom. The best part? This plant comes complete with festive container wrapping to make holiday gift-giving and decorating a breeze! The wrap comes off after the holidays so you can continue enjoying your plant. Blooms: Early spring Light: Part to full shade Height: 12 inches Low maintenance & deer resistant Perfect for containers or shady garden beds If you’re craving color while everything else is sleeping, Ivory Prince steps up—no royal fuss required.

title: Baby Blue Eyes Spruce
Description: Baby Blue Eyes Spruce: Your Ideal Compact Evergreen Picea pungens 'Baby Blue Eyes' is a compact showstopper for tight spaces offering big character. This semi-dwarf spruce tree grows just a few inches each year, making it perfect for smaller landscapes, foundation plantings, or as a standout specimen in a container garden. Its dense, silvery blue-green needles keep their color beautifully through every season—no fading here. With time, it forms a broad, pyramidal shape that adds structure and year-round interest to your outdoor space. Our favorite part? This spruce comes decorated with festive, plaid container wrapping to make gift-giving as easy as can be! The wrap comes off after the holidays so you can continue enjoying your plant. Dramatic Foliage Color – Striking silvery blue-green needles that hold their hue Easy Care – Low-maintenance and fuss-free Waterwise – Adaptable to drier conditions once established Deer Resistant – Not on the menu for browsing wildlife Rabbit Resistant – Unappealing to nibbling critters Slow and steady wins the landscape game—especially when you’re working with the tidy, evergreen charm of Baby Blue Eyes.

title: Double White Trio Amaryllis
Description: Double White Trio Amaryllis: Festive, Pre-Planted Decor Brighten your winter days with the snowy charm of the Double White Trio Amaryllis. Pre-potted in a festive 8-inch green container, this trio of bulbs is your all-in-one ticket to effortless holiday decorating—or a ready-to-go gift that delivers serious wow factor. Why You'll Love It: Snowy Showstoppers: Each flower layers crisp white petals like a fluffed-up snowflake, creating a double bloom effect that’s pure winter magic. Instant Holiday Cheer: Pre-planted and party-ready—just place it on a mantel, table, or windowsill and let the blooms do the decorating. Low-Maintenance Joy: Water, wait, and watch it flourish. No green thumb needed. Triple the Blooms: With three bulbs in one pot, you’ll enjoy a fuller, more vibrant floral display. Whether you’re gifting a loved one or decking your own halls, the Double White Trio Amaryllis makes it easy to add seasonal sparkle—naturally. Please Note: Plant size may vary depending on growing conditions.

title: GrowScripts House & Patio Plant Care Kit
Description: Grow Boldly with the House & Patio Plant Care Kit Say goodbye to guesswork—and hello to thriving plants. The House & Patio Plant Care Kit is a complete, eco-smart fertilizer system designed for container plants indoors and out. Whether you’re greening up a sunny balcony or a cozy living room, this all-in-one kit makes feeding as easy as “sprinkle and water.” What’s Inside? 3 packs of slow-release fertilizer—your plant’s long-term meal plan 6 packets of liquid concentrate—a quick boost when they need it most Seasonal feeding calendar—grow smarter, not harder Why It Works This is professional plant nutrition—no harsh chemicals, no complicated steps. The system’s meal-prep approach combines science-backed ingredients with an easy routine. Just apply and get back to your day. Safe for kids, pets, and Mother Nature too. Benefits at a Glance Consistent results: Healthy, happy plants—every time All-in-one convenience: No mixing, no measuring Indoor & outdoor use: Works on everything from indoor favorites to patio showstoppers Grow Different. Grow Confident. Be the plant parent you were meant to be. The House & Patio Plant Care Kit takes plant feeding to a whole new level, giving you a reliable, natural system that delivers every time.

title: Ice Cream Bean Tree
Description: Ice Cream Bean Tree: A Unique, Sweet Treat The Ice Cream Bean Tree brings a tropical twist to your backyard or container garden—no passport required. With long, velvety pods that taste like vanilla ice cream (yes, really), this fast-growing tree is a double treat: edible and ornamental. Why You’ll Dig It: Fast-growing shade: Get lush, feathery foliage and filtered light in record time. Delicious pods: Sweet, cottony pulp inside each pod tastes like vanilla dessert—fresh off the branch. Pollinator-friendly: Its fragrant, puffy white flowers attract bees and beneficial insects. Grow It Your Way: Outdoors in warm zones (USDA 9–11): Plant directly in the ground where it can stretch up to 30+ feet tall with a wide canopy. Containers in cooler climates: Keep it pruned and portable—bring it indoors to a sunny spot when temps drop below 40°F. Indoor-friendly: Grows surprisingly well as a patio or sunroom plant with regular pruning and good drainage. The Ice Cream Bean Tree is more than a novelty—it's a conversation starter, a snack station, and a natural shade-maker all in one. Whether you’re building a tropical vibe in your yard or bringing the jungle indoors, this tree delivers on flavor and function.

title: GrowScripts Lemon Tree Care Kit
Description: GrowScripts Lemon Tree Care Kit: Feed Your Lemon Tree Like a Pro Give your lemon tree the VIP treatment with this all-in-one care kit that takes the guesswork out of citrus care. The 3-in-1 Lemon Tree Care Kit is packed with exactly what your plant craves—from root to fruit. Smart Nutrition: Includes NPK plant food fertilizer, essential trace elements, and a calcium nutrient spray to support blooming and fruiting. Zero Guesswork: Pre-measured doses make feeding fast and foolproof—just follow the included calendar. Kid, Pet & Eco-Friendly: A safe, earth-friendly formula that’s tough on nutrient gaps but gentle on everything else. Backed by Science: Every ingredient is 100% proven to support citrus health and production. Perfect Ratios: You'll get 2 packets of each nutrient mix made with just the right ratios for optimal plant health. Ideal for indoor or patio-grown lemon trees. Whether you're chasing your first bloom or a full basket of backyard lemons, this kit’s got your tree covered—root, shoot, and fruit.

title: GrowScripts Olive Tree Care Kit
Description: Olive Tree Care Kit: 3-in-1 Nourishment Grow your olive tree like a pro—no orchard required. This complete 3-in-1 Olive Tree Care Kit is designed for potted and patio trees, giving them everything they need to thrive in containers, from root to fruit. Why You'll Love It Time-Release Plant Food: A balanced NPK fertilizer with essential micronutrients. Coated to feed your tree gradually over several months—so you can skip the guesswork and just enjoy the growth. Essential Trace Elements: Think of these like vitamins for your olive tree. They boost vigor during transplanting and encourage steady, strong growth through all stages. Calcium Nutrient Spray: A foliar boost with calcium, magnesium, and boron to support hearty blooms and fruit set. It’s like a fruit-building formula your tree can sip right through its leaves. Perfect Ratios: You'll get 2 packets of each nutrient mix made with just the right ratios for optimal plant health. Why It Works This kit is built for container-grown trees—where nutrients can wash out fast or run low. Each component targets a key phase of growth, from root development to fruit production, helping your olive tree stay healthy, productive, and patio-proud. Great For: Potted olive trees on patios, balconies, or decks Newly transplanted or container-mature trees Growers looking for a simple, all-in-one care system

title: Classic Orchid Party Pack
Description: Brighten up empty containers at home or surprise loved ones with our Classic Orchid Party Pack: 6 orchids in your choice of timeless white, bold purple, or (our most popular hue) sunrise. Keep them right in their grow pots and simply drop them into any container — when it’s time to water, just pour out the excess. Pro tip: You may notice a few blooms on arrival — these will open quickly in a warm indoor setting. Phalaenopsis orchids typically flower once or twice a year for up to three months. After a blooming cycle, flowers will drop as the plant stores energy to re-bloom again later this year or next. Each plant is unique; size and shape vary by season Orchids arrive in 5" nursery grow pots, and measure between 20–28" tall from the soil line to the top of the foliage Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled in your planter choice Bloom colors may vary slightly depending on time of year; we do our best to match your assortment to what is pictured

title: Citrus Lovers Bundle
Description: Meet the Citrus Lovers Bundle: an Improved Meyer Lemon Bush and a Key Lime Bush, paired up for double the homegrown goodness! Sweet, fragrant lemons meet tart, tangy limes — perfect for brightening up recipes, cocktails, or anyone who loves the idea of harvesting fresh fruit at home. Easy to care for, this duo brings lush greenery, fragrant blossoms, and plenty of zest right to your space. Why You'll Love It: Compact Size: Container-friendly and great for patios, balconies, or small gardens. Year-Round Interest: With glossy evergreen leaves, fragrant flowers, and vibrant fruit, they're a four-season showstopper. Abundant Fruit: Both the Meyer Lemon and Key Lime bushes can produce generous harvests, giving you plenty of fresh citrus to enjoy throughout the season. What's "Improved" About the Meyer Lemon? The “Improved" in Improved Meyer Lemon Bush refers to advancements made to this variety of lemons to be more disease-resistant, which was a major issue for the original Meyer Lemon trees. Overall, the Improved Meyer Lemon Bush is a very low-maintenance fruit tree, requiring nothing special beyond sunlight and water (if you want to coo some sweet nothings to it, I'm sure it won't complain). Care Notes: For folks in zones 8 through 11, these plants can stay outdoors all year-round, so go ahead and plant it in the ground if you'd like. For folks in cooler climates, down to zone 4, we recommend planting this in a container so you can move it indoors when the weather cools.

title: Grant Planter
Description: Our Grant is an earthenware bowl planter designed by our team and manufactured by a women-owned pottery company. It does not have a drainage hole. Place your plant in grow pot directly into the Grant planter, à la cachepot, making watering a breeze. Or, to pot your plant directly into the planter, line the bottom with lava rocks or similar to create drainage before potting. Choice of small (5” diameter) or medium (7” diameter) Earthenware planter No drainage hole If using as a cachepot, remove excess water after watering as you would with a saucer If potting directly into the planter, line the bottom with lava rocks or similar to create space for excess water to drain into Indoor/Covered Outdoor Move inside if below 32°F

title: Plant Of The Month Club
Description: For a limited time, get our jumbo tote FREE with your first box. Looking to add some low-maintenance greenery to your home? Our Plant of the Month Club subscription box makes it simple. Every month, subscribers receive a fresh plant paired with a chic ceramic planter — delivered right to your door. Whether you’re a new plant parent learning the ropes or a seasoned pro growing your collection, the club is designed to keep your space thriving. Two ways to join: Classic: Tried-and-true, unique, and sometimes rare varieties, perfect for effortlessly expanding your collection. Pet-Friendly: A new, non-toxic houseplant each month, ideal for homes with curious fur babies. * Only pay $60 up front for your first box. After that, you’ll be billed monthly — skip, pause, or cancel anytime from your account. (Subscription boxes ship free.) A new plant each month with a chic ceramic pot Switch planter colors anytime, skip a month, or gift a month to a friend Flexible terms: pause, reschedule, or cancel whenever you need Sizing: medium plants in 6" grow pots, set inside 7" ceramic planters Plant variety changes every month — no repeats

title: Ruck Plate Carrier 3.0
Description: MAXIMIZE YOUR WALK WITH A STREAMLINED PLATE CARRIER The Ruck Plate Carrier (aka RPC) houses a Ruck Plate and is worn high and tight on your back for natural stability. Your chest stays open so you can breathe better to ruck longer. The RPC is built for comfort under weight, with a padded top handle, cushioned plate pocket, ergonomic lumbar support, and a non-abrasive back panel and shoulder straps — so comfortable you can wear it against your skin, no friction burn, no problem. Features Lumbar padding supports the natural curve of your back Ruck Plate® compatible Shoulder straps are extra padded to carry heavier weight more comfortably Padded top lid protects during dynamic movements Padded Top Handle Durable ballistic nylon bottom panel Includes adjustable Training Sternum Strap The Ruck Plate Carrier™ is patented. For more information, visit www.goruck.com/patents. Specs + Materials Primary Material: 1000D CORDURA® Back Panel & Shoulder Strap Underside Material: 210D HT (High Tenacity) CORDURA® Bottom Panel Material: 1050D Ballistic CORDURA® Lumbar Support: 10MM EVA Foam Padding Ruck Plate® (Standard) Pocket Dimensions: 9.75"W x 11.75"H x 1.5"D Ruck Plate® (Long) Pocket Dimensions: 10"W x 15.25"H x 1.5"D Shoulder Strap: 16.8"L x 2.8"W Sternum Strap: 17" - 7.5"L x 1"W 20MM padding on bottom of Long 45LB RPC Ruck Plate Compatibility The Ruck Plate Carrier (Standard) is ideal for carrying 10LB, 20LB, or 30LB Standard Ruck Plates. It’s the perfect place to start if you’re new to rucking or want to add some extra suck to your workouts. The Ruck Plate Carrier (Long) fits a 30LB Long or 45LB Long plate and is ideal if you’re a larger guy. 10LB (Standard) 20LB (Standard) 30LB (Standard) 30LB (Long) 45LB (Long) RPC (Standard) Standard Pocket ✅ ✅ ✅ X X RPC (Long) Long Pocket ✅ ✅ ✅ ✅ (best fit) ✅ (best fit)

title: Patch - Gremlins Ruck
Description: In the 1984 black comedy, Gremlins, a gadget salesman buys a special gift for his son at a store in Chinatown. The shopkeeper reluctantly sells him a cute but mysterious creature known as a “mogwai,” with a warning to never expose him to bright light, water, or to feed him after midnight. When his son fails to heed these rules, he accidentally unleashes a horde of malevolent creatures on a small town. Welcome to the Gremlins Ruck! For this month’s Halloween-themed 80s callout, you and your team will similarly fail to heed the shopkeeper’s warnings, unleashing some mischievous Good Livin’ on your city. First of all, you’ll need to step off after midnight. Then, you’ll ruck to a body of water; it could be a creek, a fountain, a pond, or even a splash pad. What matters is that you all get completely immersed…or at least drenched from head to toe. (Bonus points if you all do hydro-burpees as a team!) Then head out to ruck 4 miles or more together. If you want to add an extra challenge with some Gremlin-style shenanigans, include an after-midnight food challenge! Line up everyone for a rucks-on bear crawl race, set out a matching number of hot dogs (or a snack of your choice) at the turnaround point, then have everyone bear crawl 25 yards out, devour the food, and then quickly bear crawl back to the starting line! Details 4 participants or more Minimum distance is 4 miles Must begin AFTER midnight Must get completely soaked/immersed at the beginning of the ruck Bonus cool points for hydro-burpees as a team Food challenge (optional) 25 yard bear crawl race, wolf down a hot dog (or snack of your choice), bear crawl back Share on social media using #RUCKCLUBCALLOUT and tag @goruck

title: Patch - Shadow Selection Anti-Virtual Challenge
Description: PRE-ORDER ENDS 9/30/2025, SHIPS OCTOBER You’ve watched GORUCK Selection and thought, “I could do that.” Now’s your chance to find out - from wherever you are. Shadow Selection Anti-Virtual Challenge lets you take on three Cadre-designed evolutions inspired by real moments from this year's GORUCK Selection. Complete one, two, or all three on your own turf, on your own time (but not too much time). Track your effort. Share your suffering. Earn the patch. Worldwide accountability. No cadre yelling. Just you vs. the standard. How It Works How to Register: Purchasing the patch will automatically register you for the Shadow Selection Anti-Virtual Challenge. Local to Jacksonville? Join us for the LIVE SHADOW SELECTION at GORUCK HQ on 9/20/2025 and earn 3 unique, never-for-sale patches. How will the Virtual Event work?: During the month of September, execute the 3 Shadow Selection Evolutions at your own time and pace. Recommend picking a date and getting your friends to knock out all 3 in one day with you - makes the after-event beverage taste better. Can I do this solo or does it have to be completed with a group?: You can complete the Shadow Selection Anti-Virtual Call Out by yourself. Although we highly recommend doing it with some friends (rucking with buddies is a lot more fun). Details What you'll need: A rucksack (Rucker recommended) Ruck Plate (or equivalent) in your rucksack = You pick the weight Sandbag = You pick the weight. Some exercises go better with more or less weight. The choice will be yours, what to use, and when Water/Hydration. 1L minimum required. A Hydration Bladder and a Nalgene bottle are recommended. How will the Virtual Event work?: A Participant Packet explaining the Shadow Selection Anti-Virtual Challenge is linked HERE for you to follow.

title: Gym Bag - X-PAC
Description: FUNCTIONAL GYM BAG Everything you need for your sweat session all in one place. From belts, to water bottles, your sweaty Ballistic Trainers, and more, our new Gym Bag is purpose built to help you organize all of your stuff so you can focus on performing at your best. Now built from X-PAC, a highly waterproof fabric designed for high-performance racing sails. Keep your gear safe and dry with a material that has proven itself on the open ocean, where dependability and performance are everything. Features Built out of X-PAC VX21, the most waterproof material we've ever used. Flexible Shoe Compartment: Keep your smelly shoes away from the rest of your gear, and cinch it up for more room when not in use. Adjustable, padded shoulder strap Waterproof YKK AquaGuard exterior zippers YKK zippers with silent, glove friendly zipper pulls constructed from parachute 550 cord 3 External Pockets: 1 long front pocket with rain flap, 1 side pocket, and 1 adjustable shoe pockets 2 Internal Pockets: 1 mesh pocket, 1 hanging pocket Backed by our Scars Lifetime Guarantee Specs & Materials Primary Material: X-PAC VX21 30L Dimensions: 17.5”W x 11.5”H x 9”D 45L Dimensions: 20.5”W x 14” H x 11.5” D 30L Shoe Compartment Dimensions: 9”W x 11” H x 11”D 45L Shoe Compartment Dimensions: 11.5”W x 13” H x 11”D 30L External Long Pocket Dimensions: 17.5"W x 11"D 45L External Long Pocket Dimensions: 20"W x 12"D 30L Internal Pocket Dimensions: 11"W x 5"D 45L Internal Pocket Dimensions: 11.5"W x 5"D Webbing Handles: 1.5"

title: Double Compartment Bullet Ruck - XPAC
Description: “BUILT FOR EVERYTHING” GETS AN UPGRADE The Double Compartment Bullet Ruck is the most simple and streamlined ruck to use during travel. It offers all the pockets and organization you need to travel light and hands-free—including a bombproof laptop compartment to keep your tech protected. Use it as a daypack or your go-to carry-on. With more pockets, more liters, and a second exterior compartment for even better organization, it’s built to replace your rolling bag and go anywhere. Now with X-PAC and AquaGuard zippers, your gear will be safe from storms, dust, sand–whatever lies on the road (or jungle path) ahead. The bag that was built for everything has gotten an upgrade. FEATURES Opens Flat: Easy to pack and organize. Special Forces medical rucks share a similar design. YKK AquaGuard zippers to keep out moisture and dirt and sand. Rainproof: X-PAC VX21 is our most waterproof material, paired with some of the best zippers on the market. Bombproof Laptop Compartment next to your back is extra reinforced and has a false bottom so that when you set your ruck down, your laptop won't even notice Lumbar Support: added padding supports the natural curve of your back Frame Sheet: supports the integrity of the pack as you weigh it down and allows you to carry a heavier load more comfortably Extra Padded Straps: Shoulder straps and top handle are extra padded to carry heavier loads more comfortably 2 Compartments: Inner compartment with 2 pockets and an outer compartment with 3 pockets and a built-in field pocket Small hidden Quick Access Pocket underneath the handle SPECS + MATERIALS Primary Material: X-PAC VX21 Interior Material: 400D Pack Cloth Dimensions: 16L: 17.5”H x 10.75”W x 7”D 18L: 18.5”H x 11.75”W x 7”D External Slant Pocket: 16L: 12”H x 8.75”W 18L: 12”H x 10.5”W Internal Mesh Pocket: 16L: 10”L x 9.25”W 18L: 10”L x 11”W Internal Mesh Pocket 2: 16L: 13”L x 9.25”W 18L: 13”L x 11”W Built-in Field Pocket: 16L: 3.5”L x 8”W 18L: 3.5”L x 8.5”W Internal Cordura Pocket: 16L: 5”H x 8.25”W 18L: 5”H x 10”W

title: Patch - GORUCK TAKEOVER 5K
Description: *Not optimized for new site* The GORUCK TAKEOVER is more than your typical ruck meet-up - it’s a high-energy, full-send community event built to bring people together and show them what the GORUCK life is all about. Think grit, teamwork, and unforgettable vibes - with full support from GORUCK HQ to make it happen. GORUCK COMMUNITY 5K Social Fitness Active Recovery Training Gets You Outside - in the real world. Description: *Not optimized for new site* The GORUCK TAKEOVER is more than your typical ruck meet-up - it’s a high-energy, full-send community event built to bring people together and show them what the GORUCK life is all about. Think grit, teamwork, and unforgettable vibes - with full support from GORUCK HQ to make it happen. title: Patch - Recon Ruck
Description: Back in the 80s, kids learned that “Knowing is half the battle.” And you all know that consistency is key when it comes to weekly Ruck Club events. But sometimes we all get stuck in a rut, rucking the same routes over and over. That’s why we’re looking to expand your knowledge of the rucking options in your area by bringing you the Recon Ruck! This concept is simple: do some reconnaissance and scout out a NEW location you haven’t rucked before, then bring your crew there for some miles and smiles. That’s it. Just change it up! It could be someplace in town like a park you’ve not visited before, or a route through a different neighborhood, or it could even be an off-road trail you’ve not rucked before as a club. Then enjoy the new sights and sounds with your team. As always, cap it off with beers (or the celebratory beverage of your choice) at ENDEX. Details Minimum distance is 4 miles 4 participants or more You decide how much weight you carry in your ruck Share on social media using #RUCKCLUBCALLOUT and tag @goruck

title: Patch - Glow Ruck
Description: As temperatures soar in the midst of summer, sometimes it’s best to get those miles and smiles after the sun goes down. That’s why we’re bringing you the Glow Ruck! Our goal with each GORUCK Club Callout is to encourage you to do something that you might not normally do with your Ruck Club. All you have to do this month to earn your Callout Patches is hold one of your monthly rucks between the hours of sunset and sunrise, and outfit your crew with lightsticks and glow necklaces for safety...and fun! GORUCK has run overnight events since the beginning and there’s something special that happens when most people are headed home for the evening and you get the trails and the miles to yourself. Some of you already ruck at night and that’s awesome. Here’s where it may become challenging for you: for groups to earn their patch they must ruck with at least 5 people (total) and cover at least 5 miles. This one might take a little longer than some of the others, so plan accordingly. The good news is that you have until the sun comes up. Light up your team with some chemlights, then head out and enjoy the cooler night air together! Details Must begin after sunset Add chemlight glowsticks, necklaces, and bracelets Minimum distance is 5 miles, bonus cool points for 10 miles or more! 5 participants or more You decide how much weight you carry in your ruck Follow night safety protocols (headlamps, reflectors, road guards as necessary, etc) Share on social media using #RUCKCLUBCALLOUT and tag @goruck

title: Patch - Green Beret Youth Initiative Anti-Virtual Rucking Challenge
Description: PRE-ORDER ENDS 10/31, SHIPS EARLY NOVEMBER Step up to the challenge and honor history with the Green Beret Youth Initiative Anti-Virtual Rucking Challenge - a rucking event that pushes you to cover 12 miles in one month. Whether you split up the miles over weeks or go all in for a single brutal ruck, you’ll be carrying more than just weight. You’ll be carrying a piece of history. Embrace the suck, keep moving forward, and push your limits. A portion of the proceeds will benefit Green Beret Youth Initiative, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to hosting after-school and weekend programs, the Green Beret Youth Initiative STL empowers kids to make a change in their lives and communities. How It Works How to Register: Purchasing the patch will automatically register you for the Green Beret Youth Initiative Anti-Virtual Challenge. How will the Virtual Event work?: During the month of October, ruck 12 miles at your own pace. Can I do this solo or does it have to be completed with a group?: You can complete the Green Beret Youth Initiative Anti-Virtual Rucking Challenge by yourself. Although we highly recommend doing it with some friends (rucking with buddies is a lot more fun). Local to St. Louis, MO - Register for the LIVE Event HERE Details Green Beret Youth Initiative has teamed up with GORUCK to bring you the Green Beret Youth Initiative Rucking Challenge in October 2025. About Green Beret Youth Initiative The core mission of the Green Berets is to train and assist partner forces. We are using this model in close relationship with our community partners, to turn the tide of the problems children and families face today and win together. We have a no-fail attitude – MOVING FORWARD is our motto. R³ RESPECT – RELIABLE – RESPONSIBLE. We live and lead by R3. “Building strong youth. Strengthening strong communities.” Visit https://greenberetyouthinitiative.org/ to learn more.

title: Join or Die Tee - Tri-Blend
Description: Designed by Ben Franklin, the Join or Die cartoon was one of the first representations of colonial unity. More than 250 years later, it still symbolizes the idea that we're better together. Specs + Materials Made with premium tri-blend: 50% polyester, 25% cotton, 25% rayon

title: BRAGG LIVE EVENT 2026
Description: BRAGG - THE KING OF ALL RUCKS The “King of all Rucks” as designated by GORUCK Nation, Bragg Heavy was the first ever GORUCK Heavy dating back to 2012, and GORUCK Cadre execute it annually in and around the hallowed ground of Fort Bragg, NC, where all Special Forces soldiers are put to the test. This Heavy is modeled after Special Forces training that awards soldiers the Green Beret, “A symbol of excellence, a badge of courage, a mark of distinction in the fight for freedom” — JFK

title: Padded Hip Belt
Description: Hip Carry for Long Rucks + Heavy Loads The ability to shift the weight around different parts of the body can be a lifesaver on a long ruck. The Padded Hip Belt allows you to rest more of your ruck’s weight on your hips with the added comfort of hip padding. When rucking significant distances or time (like at a GORUCK event), having a Padded Hip Belt lets you give your shoulders a break from time to time. A padded stabilizer belt pulls the bottom of your rucksack inward around your hips or belly and keeps it in place, minimizing side-to-side sway and stabilizing the load on your back. With 210 HT Cordura on the underside of the hip belt, you don’t have to worry about irritation on the skin or damage to clothing. That means no friction burn and longer, more powerful rucks. NOTE: Hip Belts are compatible with Side MOLLE webbing on rucks, like GR1, GR2, and Rucker. Rucks without Side MOLLE webbing, like GR3,RPC, and Bullet are not compatible with Hip Belts. Hip Belt Attachment Instructions Features Attaches to side webbing of ruck via MOLLE attachment system Padding built into the belt on your hips Transfers pressure out across your body, minimizing rubbing Includes three rows of MOLLE on outside of belt for additional attachments Specs + Materials Primary Material: 1000D CORDURA® Underside Material: 210D HT (High Tenacity) CORDURA® Solid 2" military grade buckle Large Dimensions (each side): 9.5" x 4.25" x 0.75" Small Dimensions (each side): 7" x 3.25" x 0.75"

title: Ballistic Beer Jacket - GORUCK
Description: You can call it a drink jacket, a collapsible cooler or a coozy/koozie. We call it cold beer. Ballistic Beer Jackets are tougher, keep your beer colder longer, and look cool. Customize your drink with your favorite patch, and know you’ll have the toughest koozie built out of Special Forces proven 1000D CORDURA. Specially designed by our talented Scars team here at home – because they know how cold a beer should be. Pro Tip: Always bring two koozies. One for you, one for your buddy. Features Fits any 12oz can GORUCK embroidered on the side 2x3 velcro patch panel One grommet on the bottom Specs + Materials Primary Material: 1000D CORDURA Height: 4 in. Circumference: 10 in.

title: GR2 Field Pocket - Waxed Canvas
Description: Waxed Duck Canvas Field Pocket with Red Wing Leather GR2 Field Pocket, now built with heritage waxed canvas and premium leather handle to match perfect with your GR2. Organize your electronics, use as a dopp kit, for camera gear, or with your rucksack for additional space and organization. The padding keeps contents inside protected and the additional 3 interior pockets keep you organized. Sale products are final sale and not eligible for returns, exchanges, or discounts, including GOVX. Specs + Materials Primary Material: 10.10 oz Army Duck Waxed Canvas Dimensions: 9”W x 8”H x 3”D Capacity: 4L

title: Patch - Cooler Ruck
Description: There’s no better way to kick off the summer than enjoying some ice cold refreshments with friends. It’s even better if you’re all tired and sweaty. So this month, we are bringing back a summer favorite: the Cooler Ruck. Plan your route and bring a fully-loaded cooler with you, filled to the brim with hydration (whatever that looks like to you). It needs to be a FULL SIZE cooler which will require a two-person carry. This means you’re going to either need fresh bodies to switch out as you go, or you’re going to end up moving slowly. And yes, we expect ALL empty space to be filled with ice. Bonus cool points for 10 miles or more! Details Minimum distance is 3 miles 2 participants or more The cooler should be a two person carry—fully loaded One cooler for every 8 participants You decide how much weight you carry in your ruck Share on social media using #RUCKCLUBCALLOUT and tag @goruck

title: Shoe Bag - Ripstop ROBIC®
Description: FUNCTIONAL SHOE BAG We know GORUCK Nation works out hard, and that means your shoes end up a tad sweaty after your thrasher session. Enter the Shoe Bag. Stay organized and keep your dirty gear separate from your clean gear until you have time to wash everything and get after it again. Features Built out of 420D ROBIC® Ripstop Nylon. Super water resistant and ultra lightweight. Opens Flat making it easier to pack and organize Mesh on the front for ventilation Top handle for easy grab and go YKK AquaGuard zippers with silent, glove friendly zipper pulls constructed from parachute 550 cord 1 Internal Mesh Pocket Backed by our Scars Lifetime Guarantee Specs + Materials Primary Material: 420D Robic Small Shoe Bag: 11.5" L x 8.5" W x 4" D Large Shoe Bag: 16" L x 9" W x 4" D

title: Double Compartment Bullet Ruck - Ballistic Nylon Cordura - 18L
Description: DUAL COMPARTMENT BULLET RUCK The Double Compartment Bullet Ruck is the most simple and streamlined ruck to use during travel. It offers all the pockets and organization you need to travel light and hands-free—including a bombproof laptop compartment to keep your tech protected. Use it as a daypack or your go-to carry-on. With more pockets, more liters, and a second exterior compartment for even better organization, it’s built to replace your rolling bag and go anywhere. Ready for anything. Proudly overbuilt and backed by our Scars Lifetime Guarantee. Features Bombproof Laptop Compartment next to your back is extra reinforced and has a false bottom so that when you set your ruck down, your laptop won't even notice Lumbar Support: added padding supports the natural curve of your back Frame Sheet: supports the integrity of the pack as you weigh it down and allows you to carry a heavier load more comfortably Opens Flat: Easy to pack and organize. Special Forces medical rucks share a similar design Extra Padded Straps: Shoulder straps and top handle are extra padded to carry heavier loads more comfortably YKK AquaGuard zippers with silent, glove-friendly zipper pulls constructed from parachute 550 cord 2 Compartments: Inner compartment with 2 pockets and an outer compartment with 3 pockets and a built-in field pocket Small hidden zipper pocket underneath the handle Specs + Materials Primary Material: 1000D Cordura Back Panel & Shoulder Strap Underside Material: 210D HT (High Tenacity) CORDURA® 18L Dimensions: 11.75” W x 18.5” H x 7”D 18L Weight: 3.25 lbs Laptop Compartment 18L: 17” H x 10.5” W Lumbar Support: 4.5” H x 10.5” W x 0.6” D External Slant Pocket: 12” H x 10.5” W Internal Power Mesh Pocket 18L: 18” L x 11” W Built-in Field Pocket: 3.5” L x 8.5” W Mesh Pocket 1 18L: 10” L x 11” W Mesh Pocket 2 18L: 13” L x 11” W Quick Access Pocket 18L: 9” L x 4” W x 3” D

title: Indestructible Challenge Windbreaker
Description: Midweight Performance Windbreaker The Indestructible Challenge Windbreaker thrives during your adventures through hell on a windy day (or a GORUCK Challenge), which end up at your favorite watering hole, none the worse for the wear. Complete with a streamlined hood (no dangling strings), off-shoulder seams, and a zippered chest pocket. Built out of the same tough as nails fabric as our Challenge Pants that has been tested and proven at the world's toughest endurance event. Features Super fast-drying and moisture wicking ToughDry® fabric is the same material used in our Challenge Pants No liner = No excess Packs down to nothing Abrasion resistant with two-way stretch Off shoulder seams for less friction under ruck straps Full-zip front with lock down zipper Two external front pockets at the perfect height for your hands Zippered chest pocket Subtle reflective GORUCK spearhead on the left chest Built in the USA Fabric + Care ToughDry®: Built to last and dries really fast. It's lightweight and can practically fold down to the size of a 12oz can of beer. Specs + Materials: 94% nylon, 6% Elastane Weight:125 GSM Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, only non-chlorine bleach when needed, hang dry.

title: Patch - Ruck Club Day Off Ruck
Description: “Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.” –Ferris Bueller In the 80s cinema classic, Ferris Bueller’s Day Off, high school senior Ferris stays home “sick” to plan a legendary day off with his friends in downtown Chicago, while being pursued by Principal Rooney. Together, they “borrow” a classic 1961 Ferrari 250 GT California Spyder and embark on an audacious tour of the city, challenging authority and bluffing their way through an unconventional day of fun. Welcome to Ruck Club Day Off. For this Callout, you and your team will reenact the “day off” path taken by Ferris, Sloane, and Cameron, but adjusted for your own hometown. Details Ruck distance: 3 miles minimum. Ideally, you’re looking at something more in the 5-10 mile range with a number of fun places to stop along the way, but do what works best for your city and your crew. Choose a few waypoints that replicate the Chicago landmarks seen in the film, but make it work for your city. Here are a few thought-starters: A museum (instead of The Art Institute of Chicago) A sports stadium (instead of Wrigley Field) A restaurant (instead of Chez Quis) Bonus cool points if you make reservations under the name of “Abe Froman, Sausage King of Chicago.” Join a parade (carry as many American flags as possible) Perform a spontaneous rendition of “Twist & Shout” with some locals Be creative! Tailor your waypoints to create a fun walking tour of your town! Bonus cool points if you get your team photo in front of a 1961 Ferrari 250 GT California Spyder! Use your regular training weight 3 participants or more Share on social media and use #RUCKCLUBCALLOUT and tag @goruck

title: Men's USA Long Sleeve Performance Tee - ToughMesh
Description: TOUGHMESH™ FABRIC — THE ITALIAN JOB A featherweight training shirt that excels during a long ruck and your toughest workouts, dries lightning fast to keep you moving. We built these tees to our exacting standards using proprietary, made-in-Italy ToughMesh™ fabric. “Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication” - da Vinci ToughMesh™ is our world-class, featherweight fabric milled at the foothills of the Italian Alps, not far from where da Vinci painted The Last Supper. It took us five years to develop, test and prove a fabric that could thrive in our way of life — no cost, time, or rigor was spared to create a line of apparel that’s tough enough to endure the demands of rucking and training and will dry long before you could drink your first beer, which will be well earned. We’re proud of the outcome and hope you wear it hard. Designed, tested, proven, and built in the USA by American craftsmen and women, all GORUCK apparel comes with our Scars Lifetime Guarantee. Features Built out of world-class, featherweight ToughMesh™ Small GORUCK spearhead on chest Off-the-shoulder seams for minimal friction when rucking Built in the USA Specs + Materials Charcoal: 80% Nylon, 15% Elastane, 5% Polyester Black & Ranger Green: 85% Nylon, 15% Elastane About ToughMesh™: “Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication” - da Vinci. T’s transition easily from the driveway to the streets to the bar. With and without a ruck on your back. ToughMesh™ weighs only 100GSM (grams per square meter). That’s 30-40% less weight than normal performance fabrics. To make the fabric tough enough, we use nylon (then add a little stretch). The polyester version repeatedly failed our testing and cost us an extra year that we’ll never get back. Every roll of fabric takes 6 hours to complete, using 44 gauge needles. Standard fabric takes 45 minutes and uses 20 gauge needles. Quality takes time. Mini-perforations are woven into the fabric to increase airflow, speed up dry time and decrease weight. They’re small and mighty but do not dominate the aesthetic of the shirt. Antimicrobial treatment is added into the fibers themselves, before the fabric is woven in Italy. This process ensures a significantly longer lifespan of odor resistance across repeated washings. Lesser fabrics are simply “coated” after they’re milled - which wears off in just a few cycles of a high powered washing machine. UPF 35 (this provides 97%+ coverage) to protect your skin from the sun. Off-the-shoulder seams remove friction while wearing a ruck - which we hope you do often.
