title: GR2 Waterproof X-PAC
Description: ANYTHING-PROOF RUCK The GR2 was designed as the bag you could travel the world with. Now, with X-PAC and AquaGuard zippers, GR2 is ready for the worst-case scenario where the elements are concerned. Crafted from a fabric initially designed for high-performance racing sails. X-PAC is lightweight, ultra-durable, and waterproof—key features needed to withstand the intense forces of the open ocean. This is what we take to Costa Rica - the most bio-intense space, according to National Geographic. This bag is ready for anything—from the rain-soaked trails of Costa Rica to city streets, giving you the confidence to carry your gear in all conditions. Features Exterior built out of X-PAC® VX21: A tough, lightweight, waterproof material (all colors except Multicam) Opens Flat, making it easier to pack and organize Extra Padded Shoulder straps and top handle to carry heavier loads more comfortably Bombproof Laptop Compartment next to your back is extra reinforced and has a false bottom so that when you set your ruck down, your laptop won't even notice. Plus, with the YKK AquaGuard zipper your laptop will be kept dry. A removable, hard plastic frame sheet stabilizes the laptop compartment and allows you to carry more weight comfortably Small hidden zipper pocket underneath the handle Multiple Pockets: 3 internal pockets: 1 large elastic pocket, 1 large mesh zippered pocket, and 1 small go-to pocket External Slant Pocket: 1 external slant pocket for quick access to keys, snacks, and other small items MOLLE Attachments: 3 rows of internal MOLLE webbing let you customize GR2 how you want YKK AquaGuard zippers to keep out rain, dirt, and sand Weatherproof: X-PAC VX21 is our most waterproof material, paired with some of the best zippers on the market Perfect Travel Size: TSA Compliant and fits under the seat in front of you Scars Lifetime Guarantee: The best guarantee on the market Specs + Materials Primary Material: X-PAC VX21 (All colors except Multicam) Multicam Primary Material: X-PAC X33 Interior Material: 400D Pack Cloth YKK AquaGuard Zippers 34L Dimensions: 12.5"W x 20.5"H x 9"D Laptop Compartment: 34L: 12"W x 18.5"H External Slant Pocket: 34L: 11"W x 11"H Internal Elastic Pocket: 34L: 12.5"W x 12"H Outer Compartment Mesh Pocket 1: 34L: 11"W x 11.5"H Outer Compartment Mesh Pocket 2: 34L: 11.5"W x 12.5"H Outer Compartment Cordura Pocket 1: 34L: 9"W x 5.5"H Outer Compartment Cordura Pocket 2: 34L: 10"W x 5.5"H

title: Kit Bag - X-PAC
Description: SPECIAL FORCES FLIGHT BAG The Aviator’s Kit Bag is used on all Airborne flight operations (jumping out of planes or helos). Special Forces and other units started using the Aviator’s Kit Bags as travel bags, pilot flight bags, and deployment bags because of the large opening at the top, which is big enough to comfortably allow body armor to fit inside. Our Kit Bags are inspired by classic aviator kit bags, which are also used by Special Forces teams to transport a small army’s worth of gear (per person). We've modernized the aviator's kit bag and added functionality, not for jumping out of airplanes, but for daily use, travel, and storage. Ditch your rolling bag and travel hands-free with a Kit Bag that is tougher than steel. This Kit Bag is built with highly waterproof X-PAC VX21. Originally designed for high-performance race sailing, X-PAC had to be tough and–most importantly–dependable. Proudly overbuilt and backed by our Scars Lifetime Guarantee. Features Exterior built out of X-PAC® VX21: A tough, lightweight, waterproof material (all colors except Multicam) Includes Adjustable Padded Shoulder Strap Opens wide for easy access when packing and traveling 32L external pockets: Two external side pouch pockets 1 external 14"W x 11"D zipper pocket (32L only) Three (3) interior zipper pockets Re-designed internal pocket with enough space to fit any phone TSA Carry-on compliant Customize with the patch of your choice Specs + Materials Primary Material: X-PAC VX21 (All colors except Multicam) Multicam Primary Material: X-PAC X33 Back Panel & Shoulder Strap Underside Material: 210D HT (High Tenacity) CORDURA® 32L Dimensions: 17.5”W x 11.5"H x 9”D Weight: 1.5lbs

title: GR0 - X-PAC
Description: ANYTHING-PROOF RUCK GR0 is one of our original three rucks (previously known as the GR Echo). It retains the functionality of the GR1, built for smaller frames. When you’re carrying weight, where the bottom comes into contact with the back matters, and ideally it stays above the belt line–which is why we built the GR0. Now with X-PAC, this GR0 is built to withstand any environment. Crafted from a fabric initially designed for high-performance racing sails. X-PAC is lightweight, ultra-durable, and waterproof—key features needed to withstand the intense forces of the open ocean. Tested in Central American rainforests and the deserts of New Mexico, this rucksack protects your gear from water, sand, dust, and whatever else gets in your way. This GR0 is for anyone who likes to pack light and travel far, no matter the environment. Features Exterior built out of X-PAC® VX21: A tough, lightweight, waterproof material (all colors except Multicam) Opens flat, making it easier to pack and organize Extra padded shoulder straps and top handle to carry heavier loads more comfortably Bombproof Laptop Compartment next to your back is extra reinforced and has a false bottom so that when you set your ruck down, your laptop won't even notice. I love it when I am outside on the move with some weight on my back, that’s my form of mental health, but I have no interest in even having a dermatologist, let alone being on their Christmas card list. You gotta keep the rays at bay and this is how I do just that.” — Jason, GORUCK CoFounder Featherweight performance ToughMesh with UPF 30+ sun protection that breathes and wicks like crazy, dries with little to no breeze, and packs down to practically nothing. Designed, tested, proven, and built in the USA by American craftsmen and women, all GORUCK apparel comes with our Scars Lifetime Guarantee. That’s 30-40% less weight than normal performance fabrics. To make the fabric tough enough, we use nylon (then add a little stretch). The polyester version repeatedly failed our testing and cost us an extra year that we’ll never get back. Every roll of fabric takes 6 hours to complete, using 44-gauge needles. Standard fabric takes 45 minutes and uses 20-gauge needles. Quality takes time. Mini-perforations are woven into the fabric to increase airflow, speed up dry time, and decrease weight. They’re small and mighty but do not dominate the shirt's aesthetic. Antimicrobial treatment is added into the fibers themselves, before the fabric is woven in Italy. This process ensures a significantly longer lifespan of odor resistance across repeated washings. Lesser fabrics are simply “coated” after they’re milled - which wears off in just a few cycles of a high-powered washing machine. UPF 35 (this provides 97%+ coverage) to protect your skin from the sun. Off-the-shoulder seams remove friction while wearing a ruck - which we hope you do often.

title: Men's USA Long Sleeve Performance Full Zip Hoodie - ToughMesh
Description: TOUGHMESH™ FABRIC — THE ITALIAN JOB A featherweight training jacket that excels during a long ruck and your toughest workouts, dries lightning fast to keep you moving. We built these to our exacting standards using proprietary, made-in-Italy ToughMesh™ fabric. “Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication” - da Vinci ToughMesh™ is our world-class, featherweight fabric milled at the foothills of the Italian Alps, not far from where da Vinci painted The Last Supper. It took us five years to develop, test and prove a fabric that could thrive in our way of life — no cost, time, or rigor was spared to create a line of apparel that’s tough enough to endure the demands of rucking and training and will dry long before you could drink your first beer, which will be well earned. We’re proud of the outcome and hope you wear it hard. Features Built out of world-class, featherweight ToughMesh™ Small GORUCK spearhead on chest Off the shoulder seams for minimal friction when rucking 2 Slanted front pockets Specs + Materials Charcoal: 80% Nylon, 15% Elastane, 5% Polyester Black & Ranger Green: 85% Nylon, 15% Elastane Acid Lime: 85% Polyamid, 15% Elastane About ToughMesh™: “Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication” - da Vinci. T’s transition easily from the driveway to the streets to the bar. With and without a ruck on your back. ToughMesh™ weighs only 100GSM (grams per square meter). That’s 30-40% less weight than normal performance fabrics. To make the fabric tough enough, we use nylon (then add a little stretch). The polyester version repeatedly failed our testing and cost us an extra year that we’ll never get back. Every roll of fabric takes 6 hours to complete, using 44 gauge needles. Standard fabric takes 45 minutes and uses 20 gauge needles. Quality takes time. Mini-perforations are woven into the fabric to increase airflow, speed up dry time and decrease weight. They’re small and mighty but do not dominate the aesthetic of the shirt. Antimicrobial treatment is added into the fibers themselves, before the fabric is woven in Italy. This process ensures a significantly longer lifespan of odor resistance across repeated washings. Lesser fabrics are simply “coated” after they’re milled - which wears off in just a few cycles of a high powered washing machine. UPF 35 (this provides 97%+ coverage) to protect your skin from the sun. Off the shoulder seams remove friction while wearing a ruck - which we hope you do often.

title: Radio Ruck USA Throwback
Description: Radio Ruck, a GORUCK Classic One of our original rucks, the Radio Ruck takes inspiration from the size of the primary radio used by Special Forces. It maintains almost the same 21L capacity as GR1 with added depth and width, but is shorter. This is ideal to keep the bottom of the ruck away from the beltline, so it is off your butt and high on your back. Radio Ruck is built in the USA and designed for versatile use during day adventures, all while providing reliable protection for your laptop. Features Opens Flat making it easier to pack and organize Extra Padded Shoulder straps and top handle to carry heavier loads more comfortably YKK zippers with silent, glove friendly zipper pulls constructed from parachute 550 cord Bombproof Laptop Compartment next to your back is extra reinforced and has a false bottom so that when you set your ruck down, your laptop won't even notice Multiple Pockets: 3 internal pockets: 1 large elastic pocket, 1 large mesh zippered pocket, and 1 small go-to pocket External Slant Pocket: 1 external slant pocket for quick access to keys snacks, and other small items MOLLE Attachments: 2 rows of external and internal MOLLE webbing let you customize how you want Rainproof: Our rucks are highly water resistant aka rainproof Perfect Travel Size: TSA Compliant and fits under the seat in front of you Specs + Materials Primary Material: 1000D Cordura Dimensions: 12"W x 17"H x 6"D Volume: 20L Laptop Protection: Up to 14" External Slant Pocket: 12"W x 9"H Internal Elastic Pocket: 12"W x 10.5"H Internal Mesh Pocket: 12"W x 8"H Internal Cordura Pocket: 11.25"W x 6.5"H

title: Heritage 2.0 Bike & Skate Helmet
Description: With more ventilation for cooler riding, an integrated magnetic tail light option for increased safety, and a more comfortable design to fit more riders of all backgrounds, Heritage 2.0 is the next generation of our classic collection.

title: Just-in-Case Kit
Description: Rides don’t always go as planned. Stay ready for anything with a Just-in-Case Kit. You never know when your ride will run long (or be cut short!). This kit has you covered with accessories that keep you comfortable, confident, and ready for anything. Includes: Water Bottle Water Bottle Holder GUB PRO-3 Phone Mount Rad Portable Tire Inflator Roadside Repair Tool Kit Battery Travel Case Rad Mirror Compatibility: All ebikes except for RadRover 6 Plus and RadCity 5 Plus due to limited handlebar space. RadTrike - Mounts only to handlebars, there are no frame bosses for water bottle cages.

title: Magnetic Helmet Light
Description: MAGNETIC HELMET LIGHT Increase your visibility day or night with a magnetic helmet light. Designed exclusively for use with our Heritage 2.0 helmets.

title: Chapter Helmet Visor
Description: CHAPTER HELMET VISOR Whether you build your Chapter helmet for high-visibility or for classic style, our interchangeable visors will help you customize your look while keeping your vision clear for the road ahead.

title: Reflective Stickers
Description: REFLECTIVE STICKERS Grown up stickers, made for your ride. Customize your helmet (or anything else!) with these reflective and weather-resistant stickers.

title: Thousand Jr. Toddler Helmet
Description: Keep your little one safe on their very first ride (and every one to come). Created for kids ages 1 and over, the Thousand Jr. Toddler helmet is designed to keep budding riders comfortable, safe, and encourage the joy of riding no matter what they ride. Family adventures are just around the corner.

title: Chapter MIPS Helmet
Description: Engineered for performance, the Chapter Collection integrates elevated utility into your daily riding uniform to always keep you moving forward.

title: Thousand Jr. Helmet Stickers
Description: Encourage kids to dream big, express themselves, and create their own world with reflective, removable stickers so they can customize their helmet with the passions that make them unique.

title: Comfort Kit
Description: Relax. We got you. Bundle up and save over $50! Enjoy a cushioned ride with a plush Comfort Saddle. And to make sure you’re not sweating the small stuff, this kit comes with a water bottle combo, a mirror, and a phone mount for extra peace of mind. Includes: Comfort Saddle Water Bottle Water Bottle Holder Rad Mirror GUB PRO-3 Phone Mount Compatibility: All ebikes except for RadRover 6 Plus and RadCity 5 Plus due to limited handlebar space. RadTrike - Mounts only to handlebars, there are no frame bosses for water bottle cages. RadRunner Plus, RadRunner 2, and RadRunner 1 require a replacement seatpost that has seat rails (sold separately) Comfort Saddle not compatible with the RadRunner Passenger Package RadTrike - Replacing the Trike saddle will result in removal of the backrest as it is all one assembly.

title: Discovery Mindblown Kids Model Engine Kit
Description: LET YOUR CHILDREN GET HANDS ON: With the Discovery #Mindblown Model Engine Kit! This mini replica of a classic four cycle internal combustion gasoline car engine teaches young minds all about the wonderful world of mechanical engineering in one immersive set. It's the perfect holiday or Christmas gift for any child!ALL THE TOOLS THEY NEED TO SUCCEED: Your child will have a great time constructing this comprehensive model engine toy! Tinker with the cranks, pulleys, belts, and exhaust valves to make this little gadget come to life right in front of their eyes!REV IT UP: Deliver the action of a classic car engine thanks to the powerful pistons and interactive cables! title: MAGNA-TILES® Travel Set Deluxe 55-Piece
Description: Our original 26-Piece Travel Set was such a sensation that we had to dream bigger! This larger, 55-piece version takes on-the-go play to the next level! Perfect for car rides, vacations, restaurants, and beyond, this set features a convenient travel case so you can bring magnetic fun wherever life takes you. With tiles 75% smaller than traditional MAGNA-TILES, it's perfectly sized for portability. Fully compatible with all MAGNA-TILES sets, you can seamlessly expand your collection for frustration-free building fun. Designed with signature safety features like fastening rivets and lattice design, the Travel Set keeps playtime secure while enhancing fine motor skills, problem-solving, and hands-on STEAM learning. Bigger, better, and ready for adventure, the 55-Piece Travel Set Deluxe is your ultimate companion for imaginative fun on the go! What's Included: 55 microMAGS magnetic tiles, including: 6 Right Triangles, 6 Isosceles Triangles, 8 Equilateral Triangles, 34 Squares and 1 Rectangle Baseplate. The metal tin packaging provides both convenient storage and baseplate for builds on the go. What Makes It Unique: This set is a must-have travel companion for family trips - whether by plane, train or automobile - and restaurants, too! Developmental: Encourages the development of hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills, while spurring creativity. Great for Gifting: Makes a great gift for kids ages 3+ who want to build anywhere and everywhere. More to Explore: MAGNA-TILES microMAGS + Classic sets are a winning combo! Always Compatible: All pieces are compatible with and complementary to all other MAGNA-TILES sets, including all Classic MAGNA-TILES sets. Safety Guaranteed: All MAGNA-TILES pieces are built to withstand countless hours of playtime. Our signature lattice prevents cracking, while fastening rivets keep magnets safe and secure. Superior Quality: MAGNA-TILES pieces are made from food-grade, non-toxic MABS plastic that are free from BPAs, phthalates, and latex. Our magnets are selected with kids in mind, letting them easily pull apart tiles for safe, frustration-free building. Made With Purpose: MAGNA-TILES sets are loved by builders ages 3-99 and designed for kids to enjoy, without instructions or adult assistance. We're advocates for Meaningful Play that is Fun and Engaging, Experience Based, Child Led and Developmental.

title: TRI RING // MK-1
Description: NEO-CYBER WRING // MK-1 The Future of Retro-Tech Adornment is Here. Crafted from high-density space grey poly-alloy, the TRI RING // MK-1 is engineered for the next-gen cyber-rebel. A seamless fusion of 80s tech aesthetics and neo-industrial minimalism, this ring embodies the raw power of analog circuitry with the precision of digital evolution. Designed for off-grid innovators, synth-wave junkies, and chrono-punks, this lightweight yet durable artifact feels like it was ripped straight from a 1986 prototype lab—before the corporate overlords shut it down. Wear it. Decode the signal. Engage the system. // SYSTEM STATUS: ACTIVE// ERROR: TIMESHIFT DETECTED// WELCOME TO THE FUTURE PAST.

title: Warranty Repair
Description: Do not purchase this unless instructed to. If purchased without reaching out first, we will cancel and refund this.Please reach out to us with any questions and we will direct you to the best way to proceed with any warranty or refinishing need. -Warranty for future need - LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTYWhat do you get with our Limited Lifetime Warranty?WOOD RINGS WARRANTYFree touch ups on day-to-day wear and tear for the lifetime of your ring. This includes things such as small scratches, nicks, dings, dents, or chips that could happen.If we find the ring is beyond these "day-to-day" issues, then we do charge a fee of $100 for repairs.**IMPORTANT** Please contact us as soon as you notice any type of blemish with your ring. If you wait, this will void your warranty as the damage could evolve into something more serious that will no longer be repairable. This is the "limited" part of our lifetime warranty:- If you've had a ring personalized, it cannot be exchanged due to sizing issues.- Loss of the ring- Changes in size needed due to hand swelling or weight gain.- Cracks or breaks in the ring due to impact.- Damage to the ring due to misuse or not due to a manufacturing defect. (For example, if your dog chews the ring. This has happened numerous times. Dogs love our rings!).- Exposure to harsh Chemicals (Including, but not limited to: Chlorine, Adhesives, Salt Water, Acetone, Overexposure to Hand sanitizer etc.)- Damage to the ring due to lack of maintenance. For example, a small chip is covered under your warranty, but if left unattended, it can lead to damage which is not covered by your warranty.How do I know if my issue will be covered?The best thing to do is contact us. We can let you know the next steps.What if my ring issue is not covered by the warranty?Still reach out and let us know. Our goal is to make your experience with us and your ring as amazing as possible.

title: Mens Wood Wedding band made from Ebony
Description: Ring + Grove co // Mens Wood Wedding Band Feat Ebony Enjoy a luxurious Wooden Wedding Band made from Ebony. Ebony is prized for its rich dark color. If your looking for a ring with Wood grain, this ring may not be your best choice. Ebony can be extremely dark, although looking closely you will notice some grain. As wooden rings have gained popularity, we feel we've really mastered the recipe for a great wooden ring.Quality consistent wood to work from, a quality clearcoat that allows for a glossy smooth finish, its waterproof, re-finishable, and re-sizeable up or down half a size. One of our most popular wooden rings to date! Please know that our team crafts each ring as the order comes in. •Photo shows a ring size 10.5 with 8mm width**Please write us with any questions regarding wooden rings for an almost immediate response! We take a lot of pride in our customer service**FAQ :Q :Are your rings waterproof?A: Yes! Hand washing, Showering, swimming is fine! Q: How durable are your rings?A: I say they are pretty durable considering they are wood! We have never had one of our rings crush, but the odd accident may crack the finish...but not beyond repair! Simply send the ring back and let me send it back looking brand new!Q: What if I order the wrong size?A: Ring sizing is very important. I can resize up or down half a size, but I always encourage that you get a professional ring size by visiting a jeweller -Warranty- We have a lifetime repair warranty for the clearcoat on the ring. If the clearcoat gets damaged, please let us know right away! -Resize Policy- As we are a small team crafting these rings to the highest level of quality possible, we have to have a more strict return policy than other large retailers. Most companies online are reselling products which dont have the time and care put into them as Ring and Grove rings. We do know this policy sounds strict but this is just the best policy to keep us motivated to providing the highest quality wood rings on the market. Rings can only be returned if they are 8mm wide, and have not been worn.__________________________________________________________No returns will be accepted if-Modifications have been made to the design of the ring-Engravings have been requested-Rushes have been made in order to complete your ring. -Our exchange policy-We offer free resizing 1/2 size up or down. If the resizing is larger or smaller than 1/2 size, a new ring will have to be remade for 50% of the retail value.

title: Thin Evryday Hoop Earrings
Description: Timeless and effortlessly sleek, these thin hoop earrings are your go-to pair for everyday shine. Lightweight and easy to wear, they offer a clean, minimal look that complements everything from casual basics to elevated outfits.

title: Layered Snake & Bead Chain Necklace
Description: Make a sleek yet playful statement with this layered necklace featuring a smooth snake chain paired with a delicate beaded strand. The dual textures add dimension and shine, making it the perfect accessory for layering or wearing solo for an elevated everyday look.

title: Dainty Chain Link Necklace
Description: A dainty gold-tone chain with small flat links that catch the light just right. Lightweight and sleek, perfect for layering or wearing solo for a clean, minimal look.

title: Sharp Chain Necklace
Description: This sleek, high-shine chain features angled links that give off a subtle edge. Lightweight and minimal with just the right amount of shimmer for layering or everyday wear.

title: Lock Pendant Necklace
Description: A sleek padlock charm hangs from a minimalist chain, adding a bold, edgy twist to any outfit. Wear it solo or stack it up—either way, it’s a statement you’ll keep coming back to.

title: Single Pearl Drop Necklace
Description: Simplicity meets elegance with this minimalist necklace featuring a single luminous pearl anchored at the center of a delicate chain. Perfect for layering or wearing solo, it adds a timeless touch to any outfit.

title: Beaded Hand Chain
Description: Elevate your everyday style with this elegant beaded hand chain. Designed with a delicate cable link and spaced bead accents, it drapes effortlessly from wrist to finger for a graceful, minimalist statement. A subtle yet striking piece that pairs perfectly with rings and bracelets alike.

title: Princess Crystal Station Bracelet
Description: Dainty yet dazzling, this station bracelet features a trio of geometric crystal charms set along a slim gold-toned chain. The clean-lined square bezels give it a sleek and modern finish—perfect for stacking or wearing solo.

title: Initial A Crystal Bracelet
Description: A delicate and timeless piece designed just for you. This dainty bracelet features a personalized initial charm accented with pavé-set crystals for subtle sparkle. The perfect everyday accessory or a thoughtful gift that adds a personal touch to any look.

title: Crystal C Initial Charm Necklace
Description: Show off your sparkle with this crystal-studded initial necklace. Featuring a petite letter charm accented with round-cut crystals, this necklace adds a personalized touch to your everyday look. The slim chain and lightweight design make it perfect for layering or wearing solo for a minimalist statement. Ideal as a gift or a keepsake you’ll never want to take off.

title: Crystal C Initial Bracelet
Description: Add a subtle personal touch to your wrist stack with this crystal initial bracelet. The dainty chain features a sparkling letter charm paved with round-cut crystals for a refined, eye-catching finish. Perfect for everyday wear or meaningful gifting, this bracelet blends elegance with individuality for a look that's effortlessly chic and personal.

title: Crystal A Initial Necklace
Description: Make it personal with this crystal initial necklace. Featuring a bold block letter encrusted with 9 round-cut crystals, this charm pendant shines with just the right touch of sparkle. Its delicate chain balances the look, making it ideal for everyday layering or solo statement wear.

title: Cowboy Boot Crystal Charm Necklace
Description: Add a little Western flair to your jewelry collection with this Cowboy Boot Crystal Charm Necklace. Featuring a detailed boot pendant accented with round-cut crystals in a pavé setting, this piece brings sparkle and personality to any outfit. Whether you're headed to a concert or dressing up your everyday look, this playful charm necklace is the perfect blend of country and chic.

title: Crystal B Initial Necklace
Description: Show off your sparkle and your initial with this Crystal Initial Necklace. This necklace is accented with round-cut crystals set in a pavé style for maximum shine. Whether worn alone or layered, it's the perfect personalized piece to add a touch of glamour to your everyday look.

title: Delicate Ball Chain Hand Bracelet
Description: Elevate your style with this Delicate Ball Chain Hand Bracelet, crafted with a fine gold-toned chain and subtle ball accents. The elegant design loops gracefully from wrist to finger, creating a sleek and minimal silhouette that’s perfect for layering or standing out on its own. Lightweight and comfortable, this hand bracelet adds a contemporary twist to your everyday jewelry.

title: Double Layer Beaded Chain Bracelet
Description: Elevate your everyday stack with this double-layer beaded chain bracelet. Featuring two delicate strands accented with evenly spaced bead details, it offers a refined layered look in one simple piece. Whether worn solo or with your favorite stack, this bracelet brings subtle texture and shine to any wrist.

title: Pavé Crystal B Initial Bracelet
Description: Personalized elegance meets delicate design in this pavé initial bracelet. Featuring a dainty letter charm encrusted with round brilliant-cut crystals, it’s set on a fine adjustable chain with a slider closure for a custom fit. Perfect for stacking or wearing solo, it adds a meaningful and sparkling touch to your everyday style.

title: Triple Layer Chain Necklace Set
Description: Layered and effortless, this triple chain necklace set features a bold mix of herringbone, curb, and elongated link chains. Designed to be worn together, it creates instant dimension and shine—no styling required. An easy way to elevate your neckline, whether you're dressing up or keeping it casual.

title: Rounded Link Chain Bracelet
Description: Simple, sleek, and endlessly versatile, this rounded link bracelet adds just the right amount of shine to your everyday look. Its classic chain design is perfect for stacking with other pieces or wearing on its own for a clean, minimal vibe. Finished with a delicate charm detail at the clasp for a subtle signature touch.

title: Dual Strand Box Chain Bracelet
Description: Understated and refined, this dual strand bracelet features two delicate box chains that add subtle texture and movement to your wrist stack. Perfect for everyday wear or layering with your favorite bangles and cuffs, it's a timeless piece that brings just the right touch of polish to any outfit.

title: Crystal Heart Outline Necklace
Description: Sweet and sparkly, this heart outline necklace features a delicate open-heart pendant covered in shimmering crystals. Suspended from a classic chain, it’s the perfect romantic accent whether worn alone or layered with your everyday favorites. A go-to piece for gifting or keeping close to your own heart.

title: Chunky Round Link Chain Necklace
Description: Bold and unapologetic, this chunky chain necklace features polished round links that bring instant edge to any outfit. Whether you're layering it with delicate pieces or letting it shine solo, this chain adds just the right amount of attitude and shine to your everyday style.

title: Solitaire Crystal Necklace
Description: Timeless and elegant, this solitaire crystal necklace features a single round-cut stone set in a four-prong setting. Suspended from a simple chain, it adds just the right amount of sparkle to your everyday look. A must-have staple that pairs perfectly with everything from tees to dresses.

title: Crystal Bar Stud Earrings
Description: Modern and minimal with a touch of sparkle, these bar stud earrings feature a sleek rectangular design set with a row of round-cut crystals. Their geometric shape and polished finish make them the perfect pair for everyday wear or layering with multiple piercings for a stacked look.

title: Pearl Pendant Necklace
Description: Timeless and refined, this necklace features a single organic-shaped pearl pendant suspended on a twisted rope chain. Its natural texture and soft glow make it a go-to piece for effortless elegance—perfect for layering or wearing on its own for a delicate, polished look.

title: Triple Chain Mixed Link Bracelet
Description: This triple chain bracelet combines sleek textures and classic shapes for a bold yet refined look. Featuring a mix of figaro, curb, and herringbone chains, it gives the illusion of layering in one easy piece. Perfect for elevating casual outfits or stacking with other wristwear for added edge.

title: Crystal Heart Stud Earrings
Description: Sweet and simple, these heart stud earrings feature a single crystal set at the center of a smooth, puffed heart design. Perfect for everyday wear or gifting, they add a touch of sparkle and love to any look—whether worn solo or layered with your favorite stack.

title: North Star Crystal Studs
Description: Add a celestial sparkle to your ear stack with these radiant North Star Crystal Studs. Featuring a classic eight-pointed star design set with dazzling round-cut clear crystals, these studs strike the perfect balance of charm and boldness. A must-have for starry-eyed jewelry lovers.

title: Stacked Linked Crystal Band Ring
Description: Make a statement with the Linked Crystal Band Ring—a bold, all-in-one piece that gives the illusion of stacked rings. Featuring multiple linked bands in smooth and textured finishes, it’s accented with sparkling crystals for added shine. Designed for effortless layering and modern edge in one striking silhouette.

title: Copenhagen Sunglasses
Description: Whether you're cruising under palm trees or strutting through the city, the Copenhagen shades add instant glam to every outfit. Designed to flatter every face shape, they bring that perfect mix of high fashion and everyday comfort.

title: Sydney Sunglasses
Description: Turn up the heat with the Sydney Sunglasses — your fresh everyday pick for daring, sun-filled style. Featuring oversized square frames and a seductive gradient brown tint, these shades perfectly blend retro glam with a modern vibe. Plus, they offer UV400 protection to keep your eyes safe in the sun.

title: Oslo Sunglasses
Description: Turn heads with the effortlessly bold Oslo Sunglasses, where vintage charm meets modern edge. Featuring a sleek oval silhouette, glossy black frame, and warm amber lenses, these shades are perfect for city strolls, beach days, or elevating any outfit with a statement piece that never goes out of style.

title: Moonlit Earrings
Description: These rhinestone drop earrings are the perfect mix of classy and unique. Sparkle elegantly with the Moonlit Earrings and turn heads evrywhere you go

title: Ivy Ring
Description: The Ivy Ring is basically your jewelry box’s plot twist — two dazzling pear-shaped diamonds wrapped in a golden embrace that curves like destiny itself. It’s giving "twin flames meet luxury runway." It’s bold, poetic, and just a little bit dangerous (in the best way).

title: Perfect Match Necklace
Description: Celebrate harmony in every detail with the Perfect Match Necklace, where contrasting metals meet in flawless balance. Polished sterling silver beads punctuate a sleek gold snake chain, creating a versatile two‑tone look that transitions seamlessly from casual to formal.

title: Starlight Ring
Description: Say hello to your new spotlight stealer. The Starlight Ring is the moment — like, Beyoncé-in-the-front-row level drama. She’s bold. She’s brilliant. She’s got a center stone that practically winks every time the light hits it (which, by the way, is always).

title: You're Glowing Necklace
Description: When you need jewelry that shines as bright as you do, reach for the You’re Glowing Necklace. An emerald-cut center crystal is surrounded by a halo of pavé stones—framed in polished gold—for a look that’s all about luminous elegance.

title: Halo Necklace
Description: The Halo Necklace is a masterclass in understated elegance. Featuring delicately spaced gold beads along a finely woven chain, this piece creates a soft, halo-like effect around your neckline—effortless yet undeniably polished.

title: Deco Dreams Earrings
Description: The Deco Dreams Earrings are what happens when vintage glam and modern energy collide. With that art deco-inspired ripple and fluid shape, they’ll instantly elevate any outfit—think Gatsby meets power blazer meets main character energy.

title: Linked Ring
Description: Meet the Linked Ring — your new golden partner-in-style. She’s got curves, she’s got twist, and oh honey, she knows how to shine. That rope-like texture? Yeah, it's giving "I woke up like this" but make it gold. Stack it up or let it steal the spotlight solo — either way, it’s serving effortless glam with a wink. Lightweight, bold, and a lil’ bit flirty, this ring plays well with others but doesn't need the attention. (It gets it anyway.)

title: Starlight Necklace
Description: Channel celestial vibes with the Starlight Necklace. A single emerald‑cut crystal floats atop a luxurious snake chain, offering refined brilliance and a modern minimalist silhouette.

title: Evermore Ring
Description: The Evermore Ring is where contemporary design meets everlasting symbolism. Featuring a brilliant teardrop-cut stone set into a sleek, sculpted gold band, this ring makes a statement of quiet confidence and enduring love. With smooth, seamless curves and a high-polish finish, it reflects light — and your unique essence — with every movement.

title: Old Hollywood Earrings
Description: Lights, camera, sparkle. The Old Hollywood Earrings are here to turn your life into a red carpet moment—yes, even if you’re just heading to brunch. These bold, sculpted gold stunners are drippin’ in crystal glam and vintage drama, because being extra is basically a love language.

title: Unbroken Ring
Description: The Unbroken Ring is a powerful ode to resilience and connection. Designed with interlocked links to form a continuous loop, it redefines the traditional ring silhouette by drawing inspiration from the timeless beauty of chain links. Each link flows organically into the next, creating a sculptural masterpiece that embodies both strength and unity.

title: Purity Ring
Description: The Purity Ring blends minimalism and grace in one flowing, open-band design. The gentle curve meets a shimmering trail of petite stones, representing clarity, balance, and beauty in restraint.

title: Aurora Ring
Description: The Aurora Ring is a modern take on the classic signet, with a sleek, polished gold band and a brilliant round-cut stone that steals the spotlight. It’s the kind of statement piece that doesn’t need to shout to be heard.

title: Old Money Bangle
Description: This adorable Old Money Bangle features a unique bangle design adorned with stunning bezel rectangle stones, adding a touch of elegance to any outfit. Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. Upgrade your jewelry collection with this cute and stylish bangle.

title: Vienna Necklace
